kyis 'di mthong ngo / /bder gshegs gsung ni zhi ba rab zhir gsung / /dga' ba yangs pa chen po rnam par skyed/ /sems can mos pa ji bzhin de dag shes/ /'di ni sgra rnams
sgrog pa'i dbyangs kyis thos/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams rgyas byas shing / /sangs rgyas byin rlabs rgya chen rab tu 'byung / /rgyal ba'i sngon gyi spyod pa dag kyang ston/ /
kun tu dri zhim 'od dpal 'di la 'jug /ma rungs sems can yon tan med pa'i rnams/ /myos shing 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba dag /de dag la ni thams cad mkhyen lam ston/ /
'phags pa'i 'od kyi 'khor gyis 'di mthong ngo / /sems can ma rungs sbyor ba spyod pa rnams/ /bskal pa bye bas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /gzhan ni bder gshegs skad
cig gcig gis lta/ /ro yi 'od kyi lha yis 'di mthong ngo / /de la ri'i lha rin po che'i rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ bsam gtan zhi zhing yangs
la dben pa'i snang ba la rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /ri'i lha nags tshal sna tshogs me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar
pa ni| 'gro ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa'i byams pa sgom pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /ri'i lha kun nas shin tu 'phags pas rnam par
snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnam par lta ba'i dbang po la 'jug pas mngon par snang ba zhes bya'o/ /ri'i lha rdul
thams cad dang mi gnas pas dri ma med pa'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas par mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus kyis rab tu sbyor ba zhes
bya'o| |ri'i lha snang bas phyogs su gsal ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rnam par bstan pa ston pa zhes bya'o/ /ri'i lha
stobs la thub pa med pa'i snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gti mug yongs su sel ba'i 'od ces bya'o/ /ri'i lha kun
nas gzi brjid dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ chags pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i rgyan gyis sdug bsngal yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya'o/ /ri'i
lha snang ba'i rdul chu bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa'i yon tan snang ba yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/ /ri'i lha kun tu
mngon par lta ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi rmi lam gyi mthar yang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /ri'i lha kun nas sra ba'i
rdo rje'i mtshams kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ don rgya mtsho rgya chen po mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas ri'i lha rin po che rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas
bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus ri'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul mi
zad tshad med ltos/ /sngon tshe spyod rab mtha' yas rgyal bas spyod/ /rnam thar zhing gi rdul snyed bsgoms mdzad pas/ /'gro ba ma lus dga' ba'i shugs kyang bskyed/ /sangs
rgyas spu nas dri med dpal bkye ba/ /yan lag mtshan rgyan 'gro ba kun bkang zhing / /byams tshul mtha' yas 'jig rten kun la ston/ /nags tshal rgyas pa'i gtsug gi rnam thar
to| |sangs rgyas sku ni mtha' yas 'gro bar mngon/ /'jig rten kun tu phyogs bcu bkang zhing 'phags/ /dbang po dang ba'i sems can rangs shing dga'/ /rnam thar 'di la
'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan 'jug /rang byung mkha' mnyam 'jig rten chos ma chags/ /bskal pa kun spyod brtson 'grus stobs mi skyo/ /sna
tshogs khams 'gro sbyor ba ma lus 'dul/ /dga' ba dri med gtsug phud rnam thar to/ /'jig rten kun ni ldongs gyur mun stug zhugs/ /thugs rje der bskyed sangs
rgyas 'od bkye zhing / /'gro khams yun ring nyal ba sad par mdzad/ /rig nas dga' 'od lha yi rnam thar to/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor spyad pa sngon spyod tshe/ /zhing rdul mnyam
pa'i sems can gtso mchod pas/ /de dag dgyes bzhin sems can byang chub bkod/ /zhi ba'i sa 'di stobs 'chang lha 'jug go /las kyi sprin sgrib g.yogs shing
bsgribs pa rnams/ /srid par sems can sdug bsngal 'khor gzigs nas/ /de dag mun pa ye shes 'od kyis bsal/ /gzi brjid dpal 'od rnam thar 'di sems
so| |rgyal ba'i spu las sangs rgyas yon tan kun/ /phyogs dbyings sems can bsam pa bzhin du grag /rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bskal pa kun tu gnas/ /'od mang rdul
gyi chu bo'i lha 'jug go /sems can kun spyod dge ba rgya mtsho kun/ /de la phyogs bkang sangs rgyas mngon par snang / /sna tshogs thabs kyis 'jig rten chos kyang ston/ /
tshul mngon mig gi lha yis de thos so/ /chos sgo rgya mtsho mi zad tshad med pa/ /sangs rgyas gsung gcig sems can kun la gsung / /bskal pa kun brjod 'jig rten mang
la ston/ /rdo rje tshul mig 'di yi gnas la 'jug /de la sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ skad cig skad cig cing sems can
thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/ /sa'i lha bsod nams brtan pa shin tu bsags pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can
thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi stobs dang shugs kyi rgyan ces bya'o/ /sa'i lha sems rin po ches rgyas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs sgom pa rnam par 'byed
pa dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/ /sa'i lha dus dus su dge ba'i mig rab tu ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad dga' zhing bde ba dang rtse ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /
sa'i lha gser gyi mig gi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ lus thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa'i tshul ston pa zhes bya'o/ /sa'i lha spu las spos kyi 'od rnam par 'gyed
pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par sgom pa brjod pa zhes bya'o/ /sa'i lha sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba sgrog pa'i rnam par
thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad smra ba'i sgra rgya mtsho'i byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya'o/ /sa'i lha me tog gi glang po sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par
thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/ /sa'i lha kun nas rdo rje'i rdul gyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i byin gyi rlabs kun nas rgyu zhing 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /sa'i lha khyim dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
kyi tshul la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi rgyun sgom pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pas sangs rgyas kyi
mthus sa'i lha'i dpal gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sngon chad skad cig skad cig bder gshegs
kyis| |brjod du med pa'i snying rje'i sgo rnams dang / /byams pa'i sgo yang mi zad bsgoms pas na/ /de phyir sangs rgyas sku ni mi shigs sra/ /dus gsum gtogs pa'i
sems can bsod nams dang / /ji snyed byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dag /rgyal ba'i spu gcig de snyed bsod nams 'od/ /bsod nams de mthong rab tu dga'
bar 'gyur/ /'byung ba med cing byon pa gang yang med/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba rgya mtshor rab tu zhugs/ /sems can rgyan gyi sa 'di rab tu ston/ /'di ni sna tshogs shing gi ze ba'i sa
yin no/ /sngon chad thub pas spyod pa spyad pa dang / /'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnam par zlog pa ni/ /rin chen bkram pa'i 'od kyi sa yin te/ /rnam thar de la dga' bar lha lta'o/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sa ni mtha' yas te/ /'jig rten kun tu skad cig skad cig ston/ /dus tshod yang dag ston pa'i sa yi lha/ /dga' bar sangs rgyas yul la rnam par lta/ /sangs
rgyas gsung ni mtha' yas bsam mi khyab/ /sems can kun bsgrags nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad/ /gser 'od mig gi dpal ni rab dga' bar/ /sangs rgyas yon tan
mtha' yas mnga' ba ste/ /sangs rgyas sprul pas rnam pa kun gzugs su/ /phyogs kun chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par mdzad/ /spu las dri zhim 'od kyi sa yi lha/ /sangs rgyas
sems can 'dul ba de la lta/ /phyogs rnams yid 'ong dbyangs kyis gang byas shing / /'gro ba 'di ni phyi mtha'i bskal par brjod/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs sa yi lha/ /
rab tu dga' bar sangs rgyas dbyangs la nyan/ /rgyal ba'i spu las sems can mnyam pa yi/ /spos kyi 'od bkye 'jig rten kun bkang zhing / /sems can ma lus yongs
su smin mdzad pa/ /me tog gtsug phud 'phyang bas yang dag mthong / /de bzhin gshegs sku rdo rje lta bu ste/ /mtshams su mi phyed sra ba'i ri bo 'dra/ /
'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas bskyod mi nus/ /rdo rje rdul gyi lha ni des dga' 'o/ /de la grong khyer gyi lha rin chen rtse mo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can la phan pa
yang dag sbyar ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba'i dbang po yongs su smin par byed pa'i 'dul ba 'byung
ba zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dri med shin tu dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad bsod nams dang dga' ba myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /
grong khyer gyi lha slos pa'i mya ngan thams cad spong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ skyob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha sgron ma shin tu
rgyas pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ shes rab kyis kun tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha 'od 'phro ba'i dpal mngon par 'bar ba'i rnam par thar
pa ni| thabs kyi sgo kun nas ston pa'i mthu zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha bsod nams kyi shugs snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams
'byung bas snang ba zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha lus dri ma med pas mnyam pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can rmongs pa thams cad la rmi lam rnam par ston pa'i 'od
ces bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha spos kyi rgyal mtshan gtsug phud kyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ nyon mongs pa dang mi dge ba'i dri ma rnam par sel cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
dri yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i 'od ces bya'o/ /de
nas grong khyer gyi lha rin po che'i rtse mo'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus grong khyer gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /mgon po'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /snang ba brnyes shing phyogs su rnam par mdzes/ /sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin mdzad pa'i//
sangs rgyas 'gro ba kun la mngon du snang / /sems can thams cad dbang po sna tshogs te/ /de dag ma lus rgyal bas 'gro bar mkhyen/ /rnam thar 'di ni rab tu thob pa'i phyir/ /sna
tshogs 'od 'byung lha yang rab tu dga'/ /rgyal bas bskal pa mtha' yas yang dag spyad/ /sngon chad rgyal bas chos kyang yang dag bzung / /dga' ba'i yid kyis rtag tu de dag
blangs| |rnam thar 'di ni dga' ba'i 'od kyis thob/ /'gro ba 'dir ni thugs rje byams bskyed cing / /de bzhin gshegs pas sngon chad sems can
rnams| |kun gyi mya ngan mtha' yas rnam par bzlog /nyon mongs yongs su sbyong ba 'di la dga'/ /rgyal ba'i shes rab rgya che mtha' yas te/ /tshad med nam mkha' 'dra zhing
mtshungs pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab rnam spyod pas/ /mar me me tog 'od kyi lha dga' 'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro mnyam sku gzugs rnams/ /'gro
ba kun gyi bsam pa rnams la bstan/ /de 'dra'i tshul la rab tu sgom pa yis/ /mngon du 'od 'phro'i lha de rab tu dga'/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen mtha' yas pa/ /sngon chad
de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su sbyangs/ /de 'dra'i rnam par thar la rnam lta bas/ /bsod nams dpal gyi 'od de rab tu dga'/ /srid par rab tu rmongs pa'i sems can
rnams| |'khor gyur rab rib ldongs pa gzigs pas na/ /de dag phan phyir sangs rgyas mngon du byung / /dri med 'od kyis rnam thar 'di thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
rdzu 'phrul stobs la ltos/ /'gro la sprin 'dra mtha' dang dbus kyang med/ /de dag bstan cing 'gro ba rnam par 'dul/ /spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo / /sems
can rmongs pa mun pas ldongs gyur cing / /rnam pa sna tshogs sgrib pas bsgribs gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par kun shes 'gyur/ /rtse mo'i 'od kyi lha ni 'di la 'jug /
de la snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa yang dag par 'byung zhing sngon gyi smon
lam gyi rgyan ston pa zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha ri rab spo'i rin po che'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad dang mngon sum du byang chub kyi spyod pa yang dag par
sgrub cing 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la sangs rgyas ston
cing / rmi lam gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ dka' ba
thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha 'od 'phro mang po shin tu dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'dul ba'i
sems can yongs su smin par byed cing / snying po byang chub phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi phreng ba 'od kyi gtsug
phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bzhin du chos tshul zab mo dran pa ston pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha rin
po che'i rgyan gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba yang dag par myong ba mtha' yas pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha mthu
dam pa spos kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha rdo rje sna tshogs kyi
sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ snying po byang chub kyi lha rnam pa mtha' yas pa yang dag par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha pad+mo'i shing snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam
par thar pa ni/ byang chub kyi shing yongs su zhi bas phyogs rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs rnam par ston pa'i 'od kyi rnam par
thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sna tshogs yang dag par rgyu ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan
gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus snying po byang chub kyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bskal
pa mang po mtha' dang dbus med par/ /de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar sngon spyad dran/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsgrubs pas na/ /de phyir de yi bsod nams nam mkha'i
tshad| |zhing rnams mtha' yas tshad med 'dra med par/ /mi zad gtong ba'i sgo nas sngon btang bas/ /ri bo'i spo yi 'od kyi lha de ni/ /bder gshegs dran zhing rab tu dga' bar
'gyur| |bder gshegs sprul pa rnam pa mtha' yas pa/ /de dag zhing rnams kun tu rab tu rgyu/ /'gro bar sangs rgyas rmi lam bzhin ston cing / /sprin gyi sgra dbyangs lha de rab
tu dga'/ /mtha' yas bskal par dka' ba rab spyad de/ /dang ba'i spyan gyis 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ /rgya mtsho'i spyan yang yongs su sngon btang ste/ /de la me tog mig gi lha
dga' 'o/ /yon tan rin chen 'od 'phro mtha' yas sprin/ /'gro ba kun tu snying po byang chub nas/ /rab tu bkye ba'i sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /'od 'phro 'gyed pa'i lus kyi lha
yang dga'/ /sems can rnams kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ste/ /de la rgyal ba chos kyi char yang 'bebs/ /ji ltar mos par nem nur rnam par sel/ /de yis gtsug phud 'phyang ba dga'
ba thob| |rgyan gyi char 'bebs mig bzang lha de ni/ /sems kyi skad cig gcig gis tshad med pa'o/ /chos don dbyings kyi bye brag mtha' yas pa/ /rgya mtshor tha dad yang dag
shes pas 'jug /zhing rnams brjod du med pa thams cad du/ /'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas legs brjod pas/ /de phyir yon tan sangs rgyas zhing
kun grags/ /de ni rjes su spos mig lha yang dran/ /mtha' yas shing gi rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /byang chub shing la kun kyang ma lus bstan/ /rdo rje sna tshogs sprin gyi
lha de ni| |byang chub shing la dga' bar rnam par lta/ /sangs rgyas ye shes snying po byang chub la/ /phyogs rnams kun tu mtha' dang mu med de/ /pad+mo snang zhing gsal ba'i lha
de ni| |rnam thar rnam yangs 'di la rab dga' 'o/ /sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs dag bsam mi khyab/ /snying po byang chub 'dir ni kun kyang grag /yang dag bsgrubs
pas byung ba de dag ni/ /thams cad sna tshogs snang ba'i 'od nyan to/ /de la rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba yangs pa rin po che'i
char gyis kun tu khyab pa zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro pad+mo snang ba'i 'od zer gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku 'od zer gyi kha dog pad+mo'i dra ba thams cad du
ston pas dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro me tog gtsug phud kyi dpal dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la de bzhin gshegs
pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs dang / rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro shin tu mdzes par gnon pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ gom pa 'dor ba thams cad du
sems can mtha' yas pa 'dul ba'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ skad cig gcig gis pad+mo'i dra ba sna tshogs sprul
pa byed cing rin po che'i char pa dang / dbyangs dang / snang ba kun tu 'gyed pa zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro dga' ba'i dbyangs snyan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba'i shugs
dang nyams bde ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro shing tsan+dan gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du spos kyi ngad sprin
du ldang ba zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro pad+mo yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ pad+mo'i gseb thams cad nas yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dbyangs 'byung bas snang ba skyed pa
zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro rdul gyi shugs kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ lus kyi 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi dra bas snang ba 'byed pa zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis
'gro me tog mang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtshos yang dag par bskul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas rkang gis
'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgyas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rkang gis 'gro'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas
nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dga' ba rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi shugs bskyed cing / /bskal pa mtha' yas sngon chad spyod pa mdzad/ /zhing rnams kun rdul
shin tu phra mnyam pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mchod/ /skad cig sems la pad+mo brjod yongs pa/ /dri zhim sna tshogs mngon par sbrul mdzad
nas| |zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba gshegs mdzad pa/ /snang ba'i 'od zer lha des rab tu mthong / /'dren pa rnams kyi chos nyid bsam mi khyab/ /'khor rnams kun tu
'byams klas mtha' yas pa'i/ /rnam par 'phrul pa mi zad rab tu ston/ /me tog gtsug phud lha des de mthong ngo / /phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus pa/ /
thams cad kun tu gshegs shing bzhud pa yis/ /sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin par mdzad/ /shin tu mdzes pas dga' bar de mthong ngo / /sems can
snyed kyi sprul pa kun 'phros pa/ /re re'i sku yis chos kyi dbyings kyang 'gengs/ /rin chen dri med 'od kyang rab tu gtong / /rkang 'gro dpal gyi mtshan gyis 'di mthong ngo / /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mtha' yas te/ /'khor du rgyal ba chos kyi char yang 'bebs/ /bder gshegs de yi 'khor na dgar gnas shing / /dga' sgra dbyangs kyis
rnam thar de mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas dbyangs ni mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag yon tan kun dang ldan/ /'jig rten kun bkang sems can rnam par 'dul/ /tsan+dan
shing gi 'od ni de la nyan/ /spu rtse kun nas rgyal ba rnam 'phrul dang / /dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i mtshan gyi rnams/ /sgra bsgrags thos shing dga' ba skyer 'gyur te/ /
de ni rdo rje 'od kyi lhas mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs sku bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /gom pa gom par yon tan rgya mtsho ston/ /de dag sems can ji ltar mos pas mthong / /rdul
gyi 'od kyi lhas ni de mthong ngo / /'jig rten mgon po rnam 'phrul rnam mang gis/ /phyogs bcur sems can yang dag skul bar mdzad/ /me tog 'khor mang rkang pas 'gro
ba'i lha| |mthong zhing dga' ba yangs pa rab tu thob/ /de la lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha 'od zer phyogs su snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi
khams mu med par sangs rgyas kyi 'od rnam par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgras 'dul ba rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi rnam
par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad la brjod cing yang dag par bskul bas dga' ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i
lha rgyan bzang po'i me tog gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kun nas rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes
bya'o| |lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spyod yul mtha' yas dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul 'gro ba rnams la yang dag par ston pa'i mthu
zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha snang ba'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad gso ba dang 'dres pa'i mdangs kyis dga'
ba zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spos dri ma med pa'i sprin las char 'bebs pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma
mngon par sel ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha srung 'dzin yongs su sdud pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bdud kyi las dang
rmongs pa rnam par zlog pa zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgo kun nas yongs su gnon pa la mngon du gyur pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po
thams cad kyi gnas su rgyal ba rnam par dmigs par mngon du ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dpal mi g.yo ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar
pa ni| sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing yang dag par sbyong ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel
dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ri rab rdul phran shin tu phra snyed kyi/ /bskal pa de dag pha snga'i bskal pa ni/ /rdul ces bya bar 'od mdzes 'od zer rgyal/ /mchod de smon lam btab
pa bdag gis dran/ /sangs rgyas sku las 'od 'phro rab bkye ba/ /de yi 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyu/ /rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba sems can 'dul/ /'od 'phro 'od zer lha yis de
mthong ngo / /dbyangs kyi yan lag yon tan kun rgyas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni zhing rnams kun tu sgrog/ /'gro ba ma lus thams cad yang dag skul/ /dbyangs kyis 'dul ba
de la dga' bar nyan/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni rab tu zhi la ltos/ /sku gzugs du ma'ang mtshan nyid mi mnga' ste/ /'gro ba kun na'ang bzhugs par rab tu
snang / /me tog gtsug gis ji bzhin nyid du mthong / /'dren pa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /sems can de dag dad pa ji bzhin du/ /la la bzhugs dang bzhengs
dang gshegs par mthong / /de yang spyod lam 'byung ba'i lhas mthong ngo / /rgyal ba'i tshems kyi mtshams rnams thams cad nas/ /dri zhim 'od 'phro sgron ma'i sprin bkye
bas| |'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs zhi bar 'gyur/ /dri med spos kyi sprin gyis de mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas mgon po 'gro ba'i skyabs su byung / /nyon mongs rmongs shing sdug
bsngal gzir ba rnams/ /mgu bar mdzad cing nyon mongs thams cad bcil/ /snang ba'i phreng ba 'chang bas 'di mthong ngo / /'dren pa bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu dkon//
rang byung 'jig rten don mdzad skyes pa ni/ /'jig rten kun gyi dbul ba rnam par sel/ /khrel yod dpal gyi 'od snang de skad smra/ /sems can nyon mongs sgrib pas nyon
mongs shing / /bdud kyi las kyis dkrugs te 'phyan pa'i rnams/ /de dag rgyal ba rnam thar lam ston te/ /srung zhing skyong ba'i dpal gyis de mthong ngo / /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba ltos/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings mnan cing / /'jig rten dbang po gnas su sems can 'dul/ /kun sgo'i mig gi dpal gyi spyod yul
lo| |de la lag na rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ yon tan mtha' yas pa dang gzugs kyi sku rnam par dpyod pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/ /lag
na rdo rje nyi ma'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ba spu las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje
ri rab me tog 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rnam par 'phrul ba rgya chen po bstan pas yon tan mtha' yas pa'i lus su 'phrul ba zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje rnam dag sprin gyi dbyangs
kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs mtha' yas tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje dbang po shin tu mang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig
rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam
par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings rab tu phye ba thams cad ma lus pa la yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje shing gi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/
shing gi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rgyan yid du 'ong bas brgyan pa zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje seng+ge'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor yangs pa'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'od ces bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje 'od 'phro stug po dpal gyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can mi
rungs pa'i rgyud la lus 'jigs 'jigs ltar rab tu ston cing kun tu rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje rin chen gtsug phud pad+mo 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub
sems dpa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi char mngon par 'bebs pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas lag na rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang
po'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /chos
rgyal chos kyis mdzes pa yi/ /chos nyid de la rnam par ltos/ /yon tan mtha' yas sku gzugs kyis/ /'jig rten kun tu rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas ba spu thams cad
nas| |'od zer dra ba bsam mi khyab/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste/ /phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de dag gis/ /chos kyi dbyings su khyab
byas shing / /'gro ba kun gyi mngon sum du/ /mi zad sku ni shin tu ston/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /zhing rnams kun tu rab tu sgrog /gsung gi sems can thams cad
kyi| |bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'gengs/ /'jig rten dbang po kun gnas na/ /thub pa rab tu bzhugs par snang / /de dag thams cad 'khor rnams la/ /'dren pa dag ni chos ston

mdzad| |rgya mtsho chos kyi sgo bskul bas/ /gzhan dang gzhan gyi tshul dag gis/ /thams cad chos kyi bye brag don/ /rgyal ba zad med rab tu ston/ /rgya chen mtha' med tshul dag la/ /rgya mtsho 'khor rnams rab
tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas 'od zer rab 'dres pas/ /kun gyis 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul snyed du/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun mchod pas/ /bsod nams rgya chen nam
mkha' bzhin/ /kun gyis 'dren pa rab tu mthong / /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul ma 'dres pa/ /thams cad zhing du ston pa mdzad/ /'gro la sangs rgyas mngon sum du/ /byang chub snying
por rnam par mdzes/ /'od zer sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'od 'phro sprin ni kun tu snang / /chos dbyings kun tu khyab byas shing / /sangs rgyas spyod yul rab tu ston/ /
bam po lnga pa/ de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ tshul gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug
ste| 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba la mthar thug par mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i rnam
par thar pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pas yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa nas sar smon lam rgya mtshos rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / sgo thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings su
bdag gi lus kyi sprin rdul snyed mtha' yas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / zhing thams cad du rang gi ming bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor
lo sgrog pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi sbubs su byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mtha'
dang dbus med pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / dus gsum gyi bskal pa skad cig gcig tu ston pas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa rab tu 'byung ba
zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho'i yul phan tshun du 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par
thar pa dang / gang 'di chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par rang gi lus kyi sprul pas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / gang 'di
byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyi tshul phan tshun du ston pa rgya chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa bdag go /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug cing / sangs rgyas kyi
mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing rnams rgyal bas dri med rnam par sbyangs/ /mkha' yangs
rdul bzhin yon tan tshad kyang med/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras po dri med pa/ /de la bsam yas chos sprin char yang phab/ /ji ltar rgyal ba gdan la bzhugs snang ba/ /de bzhin
rdul sbubs ma lus kun na'ang ste/ /'on kyang bder gshegs gshegs dang 'pho ba med/ /zhing rnams kun tu yul med rab tu ston/ /sa yi tshul la 'jug pa tshad med de/ /
spyod pa thub pas byang chub sems dpa' bstan/ /bsam gyis mi khyab tshul ni kun gsungs pas/ /rgyal sras rnams ni chos kyi dbyings la 'jug/ /chos dbyings 'jug tshul rnam
pa rgya che ste/ /mtha' yas phyogs su mtha' dang dbus med sgo/ /rdul phran sbubs su rgyal ba 'phrul ba spros/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa kun kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /
phyogs rnams thams cad zhing rnams kun tu yang / /'jig rten gtso mtshan 'gro dang mnyam par byung / /thams cad tshul sgor sangs rgyas don yod de/ /'dul bas sems
can thams cad rnam par sbyong / /rdul sbubs kun tu mtha' dang dbus med pa'i/ /rnam 'phrul yangs pa rang byung shin tu ston/ /sngon chang thub pa'i byang chub spyod pa rnams/ /
ji bzhin kun kyang snying po byang chub brjod/ /yangs dus bskal pa ji snyed yod pa'i rnams/ /skad cig skad cig sangs rgyas ma lus ston/ /der ni sems can 'byung
zhing 'jig pa'ang bstan/ /'jig rten gtso bo'i ye shes bsam yas ltos/ /'byams klas mi zad mtha' yas lo grangs pas/ /rgyal sras thams cad sangs rgyas
sa lta ste| |thams cad sgor yang sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med/ /rgyal sras kun gyis shes par smra ba min/ /sangs rgyas mkhan 'dra rnam par mi rtog ste/ /chos nyid mi gnas
chos kyi sprin dag gis/ /sprul pas spyod tshe kun tu rgyas mdzad cing / /shing mchog kun drung byang chub 'tshang rgya bstan/ /sangs rgyas gsung de rab tu brjod pas na/ /chos gnas
thams cad ma lus brjod pa yin/ /'gro ba thams cad re re'i sgo dag nas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams kun la rab tu 'jug /de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dri ma med pa'i gzi
brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du mngon par byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i rgyan byed pa zhes bya'o/ /
byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'ong mchog kun tu sgron ma'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems skad cig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo zad mi shes pa ston cing chos
kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pas yongs su smin pa dang / rnam par 'dul bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'bar ba seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam
par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / zhing yang dag par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal
gyi 'od zer kun tu 'od 'phro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyis rnam par spyod pa don yod pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho kun tu sgra dbyangs
rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
pa'i spyod yul ye shes kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su kun nas song zhing chos kyi dbyings la rnam par
spyod pa'i sprin chen po'i snying po zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin chen kun tu rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa la rab tu
zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i gsung kun tu 'jam dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/
sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mchod par nye bar 'gro ba'i snying po zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams mi zad dri med kun tu gzi brjid kyi rnam par
thar pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rgya chen po 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyi 'od zer kun tu snang ba'i rnam par
thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku med pa las sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri ma med
pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho'i phyogs thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ji snyed gang dag phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing / /rgyal bas de kun skad cig dgongs pas sbyangs/ /'gro bar kun tu zhi ba med pa'i gsung / /sangs rgyas chos
kyi 'khor lo rgya chen bskor/ /skad cig dgongs pas chos dbyings kun bkang ste/ /mtha' yas spyod yul dbyangs rnams rgyal ba ston/ /'gro ba kun lam snying po byang chub tu/ /
byang chub 'tshang rgya rnam par 'phrul ba mdzad/ /bskal pa brgya phrag stong rnams tshad med du/ /de bzhin gshegs pas sngon chad spyod spyad de/ /nam mkha' 'dra bar byas nas
rab bkye zhing / /sangs rgyas zhing 'di sngon tshe rab tu sbyangs/ /mtha' dang dbus med bskal par la la yis/ /skyo ba med par rgyal ba'i yul bsam yang / /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul
stobs la mtha' dbus med/ /phyi ma'i mtha' yi bskal pa kun tu 'gengs/ /rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul yul la rnam par ltos/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rgyan de dag rnam dag pa/ /rgyal
bas 'dir ni kun kyang rab tu bstan/ /skad cig skad cig sna tshogs gzugs kyang snang / /bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa dag tu/ /rgyal ba'i ba spu gcig mtha' shes par
dka'| |tshul rnams kun sgor sangs rgyas chags pa med/ /'gro ba 'di na rgya chen bsam yas mdzes/ /sngon tshe'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro kun tu/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rgya
chen bsnyen bkur bas/ /de bas 'jig rten gtso la chos dbyings rnams/ /kun nas mchod pa mang po rgya chen 'byung / /phyogs rnams bkang ste
sangs rgyas byung ba dag /rdul gyi sbubs su tshad med zhing yang ston/ /de dag yul du mi zad mtha' yas pa'i/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor byin gyis rlob pa mdzad/ /sngon tshe'i bskal
par rgyal bas 'gro don spyad/ /thugs rje'i rgya mtsho tshad med rab bskyed cing / /'gro ba rgya mtsho kun nas 'khor ba yi/ /'khor rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun kyang sbyangs/ /
sangs rgyas mtshan med sku med rdul dang bral/ /de bzhin nyid gnas chos dbyings snying po ste/ /'gro ba kun na mtha' yas gzugs su snang / /'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal
kun zhi mdzad/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa'i shugs kyis sems can gyi khams
kyi tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi nga ro rgya mtsho dri med 'od kyi snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni /byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems skad cig la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis khyim sna tshogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin chen
'byung ba ye shes dpal gyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gro ba rnams la mngon sum du yon tan dri ma med pas yongs su dag pa sgrub
pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen 'od 'bar blo gros dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po byang chub tu thog ma 'gro ba'i
ye shes kyi phyogs yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo rnam par gnon pa 'od zer gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad dang tha mi dad par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po dang mos pa rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ye shes sprin gyi nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan snang ba'i
rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub par bskal pa mtha' yas pa dag tu byin gyis rlob cing rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs
brtson 'grus rdo rje yangs pa'i snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya mtha' dang dbus med pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
spos kyi 'od 'phro shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi thog ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes pa'i dkyil
'khor yang dag par sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad yon tan yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rnam
par snang mdzad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams yangs pa shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od mchog
yon tan 'byung ba'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zab mo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la kun nas rab tu gnas par rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /de
nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par bltas
nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang / /sa yi dkyil 'khor rgya chen kun kyang yongs su rgyas/ /tshad med sems can rnam
par 'dul ba'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas zhing yangs rnams kyang rnam par sbyangs/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun rgyas byas te/ /sangs rgyas sems can khams sbyin 'dul
mdzad pa/ /skad cig dgongs pas chos kyi 'khor lo dag /mtha' yas 'gro mnyam bsam pa tshim par gsungs/ /bskal pa rgya che mi zad mu med par/ /rgyal ba 'gro la mngon
sum kun nas bzhugs/ /mgon pos sngon chad ji ltar sbyangs tshul du/ /rgyal bas spyod yul rnam dag rab tu bstan/ /chos rgyal de dag ji ltar rnam 'phrul ba/ /phyogs rnams rgya mtsho ma
lus kun na snang / /snying po byang chub kun na'ang rgyal ba dag/ 'khor gyis bskor cing chos rnams gsung ba snang / /'gro ba'i bsam pa thams cad tshim mdzad cing / /'jig rten dag
na sangs rgyas tshul kun mdzes/ /dbang po ji bzhin chos kyi char pa 'bebs/ /sangs rgyas chos sku yangs pa rnam par mdzes/ /de bzhin nyid ltar mtshan nyid lus med de/ /rgyal ba dri
med 'od gsal chos kyi sku/ /ye shes zhi ba'i sku ni tshad med de/ /phyogs dbyings kun bkang chos kyi char yang 'bebs/ /chos rje thams cad stobs kyis rnam par dag /bder
gshegs ye shes mkha' 'dra mtha' yas te/ /rgya chen 'gro ba mtha' dbus med bkang zhing / /rgyal ba stobs la 'jug pa rab tu ston/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyis chos dbyings kun
bkang zhing / /sangs rgyas spyod pa thams cad rdzogs par bstan/ /rgyal bas sngon tshe ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa/ /de bzhin ye shes sa rnams rgyal bas bstan/ /phyogs rnams kun tu
rang byung rnam par mdzes/ /smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa ma lus ston/ /ji ltar sngon tshe rgyal bas yongs sbyangs pa/ /rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba kun nas sgrog /sangs rgyas yul ni
phyogs su zad pa med/ /dbus dang mtha' med gzhal med mtha' yas dbyings/ /chos dbyings kun tu chags med brnyas pa ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams
kun na shin tu mdzes/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng+ge'i khri dang / pad+mo'i ze ba'i dri thams cad dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi ngos dang / 'khor lo'i lte ba thams cad
dang / me tog gi ze ba'i dri thams cad dang / stegs bu'i ngos thams cad dang / rta babs kyi sgo thams cad dang / nor bu'i gzugs kyi ngos thams cad dang / rin po che 'od 'phro
ba'i sgo thams cad dang / 'od zer sgron ma'i sgo thams cad dang / seng+ge'i khri'i rgyan gyi sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'
mang po thon par gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi
mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' mig brgya pad+mo
sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i tshul pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'phro gzi brjid dkyil 'khor gyi 'od
dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems
dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing 'di ltar nor bu rin po che'i me tog gi sprin thams cad ni/ rab tu 'byin/ spos
kyi sprin thams cad ni/ shin tu 'gyed/ rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin thams cad ni/ mngon par 'byin/ yul mtha' yas pa'i spos kun tu 'phro ba'i bdug pa'i sprin
ni| rnam par 'gyed cing / nor bu nyi ma'i snying po'i 'khor lo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin ni/ rab tu gtong / sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba'i sprin ni/ rab tu sgrog/
rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sgron ma'i sprin gyis ni/ rab tu snang bar byed/ nor bu sna tshogs kyi shing gi yal ga las me tog gi dog pa ni/ rnam par spyod/
rin po che'i 'od dri ma med pa zad mi shes pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i char ni/ rab tu 'bebs /rgyan mdzes pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char ni/
rab tu 'bebs shing / de lta bu dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin
gyi char rab tu 'bebs par byed cing lhags par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho
yod pa thams cad du mchod pa'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad pa'i char mngon par phab nas gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du bltas nas
seng+ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang
spyod yul rgya mtsho rgya chen po yongs su dag pa rnams so/ /sgo kun nas chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul chags pa med pa'i rjes su
'brang ba rnams so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho la zhugs pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams
so| |sgo kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i dbyings rab tu thob pa rnams so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho rab tu 'dzin pa rnams so/ /dus gsum
mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams so/ /dga' ba'i shugs rgya chen po'i rab tu thob pa rnams so/ /bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor mu med pa yongs su dag pa
rnams te/ chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' la rnam par rgyu zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa la rab tu brtson pa sha stag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas rnam par sangs rgyas mnyam nyid mkhyen/ /chags med brnyes pas nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /phyogs rnams zhing kun rab tu snang
byas nas/ /'byams klas 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par mdzes/ /bder gshegs rang byung mtha' dang dbus med de/ /thams cad phyogs kyi chos dbyings kun rgyas par/ /
dbang phyug chen po kun gyis mchod bskor cing / /shing gi rgyal po kun gyi drung na bzhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis/ /skad cig sems la mi zad
yon tan gzugs/ /rnam thar gzhan dang gzhan dag thob pas mthong / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni mtha' yas so/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor sngon chad spyod pa'i tshe/ /de
bzhin gshegs pas srid pa rgya mtsho 'dir/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can smin byas pa/ /de dag rgyal ba de yi chos 'dzin to/ /yongs dag dri
med 'khor rnams 'khod pa dag /thams cad sangs rgyas lta zhing rnam par gnas/ /pad+mo'i snying po pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /tshogs kyi nang na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes/ /
sangs rgyas gang la bzhugs pa'i seng+ge'i khri/ /rin chen nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro zhing / /spos 'phro'i sprin rnams mtha' yas rab tu 'byung / /snying po du ma'i me tog phreng
dpyangs pa'o/ /rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin ni rtag tu 'gyed/ /'od zer sgron ma rgya chen rab tu 'bar/ /rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /thub pa de bzhugs mngon par
rab tu mdzes/ /sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'gyed/ /rin chen tshon du sna tshogs pad+mo 'phyang / /nor bu'i rgyal pos skar khung kun nas brgyan/ /sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam
par rab tu mdzes/ /zla gam rin chen mang pos yongs su bzung / /rdo rje 'od 'phro snang ba'i snying pos brgyan/ /gtsug na nor bu'i byang chub sems dpas bzung / /sangs rgyas de
bzhugs rnam par shin tu mdzes/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa'i dra ba rab bkye zhing / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam sgra yang sgrog /gzugs brnyan bzhin du zhing rnams
kun na snang / /thub pa de 'dra'i seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams
cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'di ni bder gshegs sangs rgyas byin rlabs te/ /byang chub spyod pa sngon chad spyad pa dang / /sangs rgyas
mchod pa'i mchod pa du ma dag /rgyal ba'i gdan las de dag thams cad snang / /spos 'od snang ba nor bu'i rgyal po can/ /me tog snying po seng+ge'i gdan gyi 'khor/ /rgyan rnams
thams cad gzugs brnyan gyur pa dang / /'khor rnams de dag thams cad kun bkang ste/ /skad cig skad cig rgyan gyi kha dog kun/ /rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas gdan las
snang / /sems can ji ltar mos pa de dag kyang / /'khod cing sangs rgyas tshad med gdon la lta/ /rin chen lda ldi pad+mo mang btags pa/ /phye zhing byang chub sems dpa' mang po
rnams| |sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab 'byin cing / /sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs la bstod pa byed/ /sangs rgyas bsod nams tshad med nam mkha' bzhin/ /'di dag rgyan kun
de las rab tu byung / /sa rnams re re'i rgyan rnams gang yod pa/ /'gro ba kun gyis de dag bsam mi nus/ /mi phyed mtshams kyi rdo rje sna tshogs pa/ /'khor yangs rnam dag shin tu
mnyam pa ste/ /nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram/ /byang chub shing gi sa yi 'khor kun to/ /sa phyogs gang na rgyal ba'i gdan yod pa/ /kha dog
mtha' yas rgya chen sna tshogs te/ /me tog mngon gtor rin chen rnam par bkram/ /gser tshon mdzes pas de ni rab tu brgyan/ /sa yi lha mo de dag rab dga' zhing / /
skad cig sems kyis mi zad sa yang ston/ /kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du mngon lta zhing / /kha dog thams cad rgyan gyi sprin gtong ngo / /rin chen sgron ma mang po gsal
bar 'bar/ /spos mang dri zhim mang po rtag tu 'byung / /dus dang tshod kyi rnam pa mang ston cing / /lha rnams kun kyang sangs rgyas mchod pa byed/ /phyogs rnams bcu na zhing
rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag sa rgyan phun sum tshogs yod pa/ /de dag kun kyang sa dkyil 'di na snang / /sangs rgyas byin rlabs mnyam pa med pas byung / /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gtsug phud kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sngon chad spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe dag tu/ /zhing kun phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba rnams/ /snying po byang chub 'khor gyi sa 'di la/ /mi
zad sa dang de dag rab tu snang / /rnam thar yangs pa gang na snang ba yi/ /sa la rin chen mdzes kun rnam par bkra ma/ /rin chen mang pos dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor/ /sangs rgyas 'od
kyis sprin kyang rab tu snang / /sa rnams kun brgyan shing gi dam pa'i drung / /kun nas nor bu'i rgyal pos brgyan byas las/ /bsod nams 'od kyi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byung / /
sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul tshul yang rab tu brjod/ /rin chen mang po sgron ma'i char phab cing / /rin chen mdzes par bkod pa rnam par mdzes/ /sgra dbyangs kun gyi 'brug sgra shin tu
sgrog /sa yi lha rnams sa yang yang dag ston/ /rin chen 'od 'phro sgron ma rnam par snang / /'od zer sprin ni sa las rab tu 'byung / /nor bu dra ba sil ma kun nas bkram/ /rin
chen sna tshogs rigs kyis yan lag brgyan/ /sa rnams kun nas mdzes pa 'di dag ltos/ /rin chen mang po tshon bzang rgyan du bkye/ /'gro pa dag la chos kyi rgya mtsho sgrog /de dag
chos nyid rnam par dag pa mthong / /ma lus phyogs na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /byang chub shing gi phun sum tshogs pa dag /sa yi dkyil 'khor 'di na kun snang ste/ /de dag
chos nyid rnam par dag pa brjod/ /sangs rgyas gdan las chos rnams rgya mtsho yi/ /chos sgo bde bar gshegs pas gang gsungs pa/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin
du| |sa 'khor rnams kyang kun nas rab tu 'byung / /dri zhim 'od rnams rtag tu 'byung bas na/ /de dag ji bzhin snod kyi 'gro ba 'gengs/ /srog chags
rnams kyi nyon mongs zhi bar byed/ /sa 'khor de nas de 'dra rab tu sgrog /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul phun sum gang dag dang / /dri med sa ni gang gis mdzes gyur pa'i/ /phun sum
tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams re re zhing / /bskal pa bye ba dag tu'ang brjod mi nus/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros kyis sangs
rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa tshim mdzad
cing / /sangs rgyas chos kyi gzhal med khang na mdzes/ /'byams klas phyogs rnams kun tu mngon sum du/ /sangs rgyas 'gro gtso gzhal med khang na snang / /rin chen
kun gyis snying po rab tu brgyan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis de bzhin mdzes shing 'bar/ /sangs rgyas pho brang 'od ni bsam mi khyab/ /de na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas rab tu
mdzes| |ka ba'i rgyan ni nor bu sna tshogs te/ /phyogs rnams kun sgor rta babs sprin kyang bres/ /stegs bu'i phreng ba kun nas rgyan du bkod/ /gser gyi dril bu'i sprin kyang
rnam par brgyus/ /me tog bla re rnam pa sna tshogs ltos/ /rin chen shing sdong dar gyi bla re bres/ /nor bu thams cad sgo nas phreng ba 'bul/ /de na ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu mdzes/ /spos
dri rgyal mtshan rin chen dra ba ste/ /'od zer sgron ma'i sprin gyis kun tu g.yog/ rgyan rnams sna tshogs kun nas shin tu bres/ /de na sangs rgyas rab tu 'phags pa bzhugs/ /phyogs
rnams kun sgo sprul pa'i sprin gyi rnams/ /dbyangs kyis 'jig rten khyab par grags byed cing / /'byams klas phyogs kyi sems can rnams 'dul ba/ /sangs rgyas pho brang 'di
na de dag grag /me tog shing dang rin chen spungs spel ba/ /'phags par phyogs rnams kun tu mngon par mdzes/ /de la dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyang / /gzugs
brnyan gyur par de dag rab tu snang / /phyogs rnams kun tu rin chen mang bkye ba/ /de dag sna tshogs mdzes par rnam par 'bar/ /phyogs rnams kun tu skar khung mdzes
par brgyan/ /rta babs mda' yab sna tshogs mang pos brgyan/ /de la dri med 'od zer kun nas snang ba yi/ /sangs rgyas pho brang rnam pa bsam yas te/ /gzhal med khang
mang thams cad de la snang / /de dag kun na'ang rgyal ba bzhugs shing mdzes/ /phyogs rnams kun na 'khor rnams ji snyed pa/ /rgyal ba'i pho brang 'dir ni kun zhugs kyang / /
mtha' dang dbus med mu yang de bzhin med/ /rang byung sangs rgyas pho brang de na bzhugs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam
gyis mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa de dag thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas zhing rdul shin tu phra snyed kyi/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho rnam par rab sbyangs te/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul smon lam yang dag byung / /snying
po byang chub dri med rnam par mdzes/ /spos zhim thams cad rtsa nas yang dag rgyu/ /yid bzhin nor mchog rgyal pos kun nas brgyan/ /rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu rgyal pos bris//
shing sdong rtsa ba rin chen kun las byas/ /rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu 'khor lo 'byung / /lhun rnams thams cad rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /yal ga stug po sprin ltar kun nas
'khyil| |snying po byang chub de na rgyal ba mdzes/ /yal ga dog pa kun nas mngon pa ste/ /'khor rnams snum 'jam phyogs rnams kun tu 'phags/ /me tog 'bras bu
rgyun rnams kun kyang 'gyed/ /snying po byang chub rgya che bsam mi khyab/ /'od rnams bkye ba phyogs su rnam par mdzes/ /dri ma med pa'i 'od 'bar zad mi shes/ /yal ga'i
sgo nas sprin kun char yang 'bebs/ /snying po byang chub smon lam yangs pas byung / /me tog nor dang rin chen mi zad nor/ /mu tig nor bu phyogs rnams kun nas
brgyus/ /phye ma nor gyi gnas kyi sprin 'gyed de/ /snying po byang chub phyogs rnams kun tu 'byin/ /bde gshegs snying po byang chub 'di la ltos/ /pad+mo'i dra ba nor bu dri med mang / /rin
chen 'od zer dkyil 'khor kun nas 'phro/ /dril bu'i dra ba'i sprin gyi sgra dbyangs 'byin/ /phyogs bcu'i shing bzang gzugs rnams gang yod pa/ /'byams klas zhing gi ma lus
thams cad dag /byang chub shing la de dag kun nas snang / /de drung sangs rgyas dri med rnam par mdzes/ /yal ga kun nas rin chen mi zad nor/ /byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang
rtag 'byung zhing / /bsod nams rgya chen dkyil 'khor char phab ste/ /phyogs bcur rgyal ba mchod phyir de dag 'dong / /de bzhin gshegs pa sngon chad cir gyur dang / /byang chub
spyod las byung ba 'di dag ltos/ /yal ga kun las rin chen nor mi zad/ /sangs rgyas yul kun bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig brgya ba pad+mo sna
tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dus gsum gshegs
pa'i rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul ba/ /de dag rin chen sgo nas kun kyang grag /de ni mtha' dang dbus kyang med pa ste/ /snying po byang chub 'di la kun snang ngo / /me
tog mang po'i phreng ba dbyangs bkye zhing / /'od zer sprin gyis phyogs rnams kun bkang ste/ /byang chub shing la gnas pa'i lha tshogs rnams/ /sangs rgyas lta zhing rtag tu
mchod pa byed/ /spos kyi rgyal mtshan nor bu sna tshogs 'bar/ /spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug spos rtag tu 'byung / /'khor gyi rgya mtsho kun la khyab par zhim/ /shing gi rgyal po de
phyir phyogs su mdzes/ /pad+mo 'phrul ba stug cing gser mdog 'dra/ /rgyal ba'i sprin sgra rtag par rab tu 'gyed/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ma lus khyab byas shing / /sems
can rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung ba sel/ /rgyal ba'i 'khor ni tshad med rgya che ste/ /phyogs rnams kun nas snying po byang chub la/ /gzugs brnyan snang zhing dri med 'od
mchog 'gyed/ /byang chub shing gi rnam 'phrul 'di dag ltos/ /smon lam sgra dang dbyangs kyi mar me rnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs yal ga kun las 'bar/ /srid pa rgya mtsho
kun na sngon chad du/ /rgyal ba'i spyod pa ji ltar byung ba ston/ /byang chub lha rnams zhing gi rdul snyed do/ /de dag thams cad snying po byang chub gnas/ /thub pa'i byang chub
shing la skad cig cing / /rnam thar gzhan dang gzhan mang de dag ston/ /rang byung spyad pa thams cad spyod pa'i tshe/ /sngon chad de bzhin gshegs pa gang mchod pa/ /de dag mtshan
bcas sngon gyi sbyor bcas pa/ /thams cad rin chen sgo nas rab tu snang / /phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed snod gyur pa/ /de dag thams cad 'di las sgra 'byung ste/ /de dag cis
'dul rnam dag ci 'dra ba'ang / /snying po byang chub 'di las kun brjod do/ /byang chub shing rnams mtha' yas phyogs kun na/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rgyan gyi sprin can dag /mtha'
yas sna tshogs rgyan can thams cad kyang / /sngon chad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs sbyangs pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'phro gzi brjid dkyil 'khor
gyi 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor byang
chub spyod mdzad tshe/ /mos pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su smon dag cing / /gnas dang gnas min stobs rnams thugs chud pa'i/ /bder gshegs sa stobs rnam par dag pa
mthong / /bskal pa kun tu rgya mtsho las sbyangs te/ /mnyam nyid chos bsgoms ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i rnams/ /sangs rgyas 'od las de bzhin phyogs bkang zhing / /las
rnams rgya mtsho de bzhin rab tu brjod/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis 'byams klas stobs spyod tshe/ /bskal pa snga mar 'gro ba'i dbang po bzhin/ /yongs su
smin byas de bas 'khor kun kyang / /sems dag sangs rgyas dbang po'i stobs la 'jug /'jig rten kun gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / /bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ba rnam
spyod pa| |de dag ji bzhin rgyal pa chos ston te/ /rang byung mos pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ston to/ /phyogs rnams ma lus zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang / /'byams klas sems
can khams dang chos kyi khams/ /nam mkha'i khams rnams mnyam nyid mkhyen mi rtog /rang byung spu rtser khams mkhyen stobs kyang ston/ /bder gshegs ye shes
rgya chen kun tu 'gro/ skad cig gcig gis dus gsum ma lus 'gengs/ /phyogs dang zhing dang bskal pa 'gro bkang zhing / /sems can kun la stobs 'jug
mngon par bstan/ /bsam gtan rnam thar stobs mtha' dbus med pa/ /ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul ni 'gro kun snyed/ /thams cad rgyal ba'i sku la bstan pas
na| |sems can bsam pa'i gnas kyi nyon mongs sel/ /sangs rgyas ye shes dus gsum bsgribs pa med/ /skad cig kun la dus gsum spu rtser ston/ /zhing dang
sems can sangs rgyas de bzhin chos/ /de ltar rgyal bas rjes su dran stobs bstan/ /thub pa'i spyan ni nam mkha' mnyam pa ste/ /des ni chos dbyings ma lus gsal bar gzigs/
thams cad tshul gyis chags med gzhal yas sa/ /brnyes pas ye shes spyan ni rnam mang bstan/ /'jig rten kun gyi sbyor mang ji snyed dang / /'gro ba'i bag chags bag nyal ma
lus par/ /thabs sgo kun nas nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing / /rgyal ba 'jig rten gang bar kun nas byung / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgrog pas sangs
rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgya chen sangs rgyas byin rlabs phyogs kun tu/ /sangs rgyas
ston kyang rtog pa mi mnga' ste/ /pha rol phyin pa rgya chen yongs bkang ba/ /byang chub spyod pa rgya chen de dag snang / /'gro ba rnams la thugs rje che bskyed cing / /sbyin pa'i mthar phyin
sngon chad spyad pas na/ /de phyir thub pa'i sku ni mtshan gyis brgyan/ /'gro ba kun gyis blta zhing dga' ba skye/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po mtha' yas sngon/ /tshul khrims pha rol
phyin pa yongs sbyangs pas/ /de phyir bskal pa phyogs su dri med cing / /shin tu 'phags par 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel/ /ma log mnyam pa nyid la dad bskyed de/ /sngon
chad bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam sbyangs pas/ /'gro dang mtshungs mnyam yon tan kun ston te/ /de bas phyogs su 'od rnams shin tu 'phro/ /bskal
pa rgya mtsho mang por sngon spyod tshe/ /'gro ba rnams kyi bsgribs pa thibs po bsal/ /de phyir phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba kun bkang ste/ /zhing rab drung na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes//
bsam gtan yan lag rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe/ /bskal pa yangs par rgyal bas rab tu sbyangs/ /de bas 'gro ba'i gzhal med dga' ba skyed/ /nyon mongs dri ma 'grib pa kun
kyang sel/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i drung du sngon spyod cing / /shes rab mthar phyin rgyal bas sngon bkang ste/ /'gro ba'i gti mug mun pa yongs su bsal/ /de bas rgyal ba
kun tu rnam par mdzes/ /'gro ba kun mnyam thabs sgo thams cad kyis/ /yang dag byung zhing 'gro ba rnam sbyangs pas/ /phyogs rnams kun na kun la mngon par
bzhugs/ /phyi ma'i bskal bar 'gro ba mngon du lta/ /smon lam pha rol phyin pa rab sbyong tshe/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho shin tu rgya che zhing / /phyi mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba'i
sprin mnyam par/ /spyad pas de phyir 'gro ba kun na mdzes/ /rgyal bas chos kun stobs kyi mthar phyin pa/ /bskal pa gzhal yas mang por yongs su sbyangs/ /de phyir
rang byung stobs kyi pha rol phyin/ /phyogs kyi zhing rnams kun na de phyir 'phags/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pa'i/ /ye shes kun gyi sgo nas sngon sbyangs
pas| |de phyir chags med ye shes pha rol phyin/ /phyogs bcu kun na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla bas sangs
rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yul ni phyogs rnams kyi/ /'gro
ba'i rgyud dbyings nam mkha' mnyam par snang / /sa rnams yangs pa ji ltar sngon bskyed pa/ /de bzhin kun kyang rin chen sgo nas brjod/ /dang po'i sa ni dga' ba'i shugs kyi yul/ /phyogs
dbyings kun gyi bder gshegs rnams mthong zhing / /gzhal med bskal par dri med yongs sbyangs pas/ /chos dbyings yangs la ye shes rab tu byung / /thams cad chos la dri med sa
gnyis te/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por rnam spyad cing / /rgyal ba tshad med rgya mtsho mchod byas nas/ /'gro ba tshad med dri med sbyangs pas byung / /bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od ni sa gsum
ste| |snying po bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor lhag mthong brtan/ /gang du de skyes rin chen sgo dag nas/ /chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen rab tu thos/ /'od 'phro rgya mtsho ldan pa gzhal med sa/ /mthu yi
'khor 'od snying po snying rje ste/ /zhing rnams kun tu sgrib dang mnyam pa'i lus/ /'gro ba'i nyon mongs kun nas rnam sbyangs pa'o/ /dka' rgyal snying po mnyam
dbyings mnyam nyid de/ /zhing rnams kun tu 'gro zhing zhi la gzhol/ /sa rnams chos yul kun nas rab tu skyes/ /de yang rnam dag ji bzhin rgyal bas bstan/ /shes rab rgya mtsho
yangs pa'i sprin la spyod/ /'byams klas chos kyi mthar thug rnam pa kun/ /zhing rnams kun la mngon sum nam mkha' 'dra/ /de 'byung byang chub shing chen 'di las grag /
chos dbyings mkha' dang 'dra ba'i lus can te/ /'gro ba kun 'gengs 'gro ba kun snang byed/ /'byams klas thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par dag /ring du song mchog de ni rgyal bas
bstan| |thams cad chos dang smon lam spyod mang dang / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyang mnyam rtogs pas/ /bskal ba kun tu 'gro mchog mi g.yo ste/ /gzhal med sa
de'i sprin kyang rab tu sgrog /tshad med yul can stobs kyis rab tu snang / /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'gro zhing stobs la 'jug /'di ni rdul med dge ba'i blo gros sa/ /bskal pa rgya
mtshor byang chub shing las brjod/ /chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen sa bcu ste/ /dus rnams kun 'gengs nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'dra/ /sangs rgyas yul gyi sgra dang dbyangs kun tu/ /rgyal
ba'i byin gyis 'di las rab tu grag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gnon pa gti mug med pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par
bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rnam pa du mar 'khor rnams gnas pa ni/ /dad pa sna tshogs yongs su dag pa'i sems/ /rgyan dang yul rnams kun la rab
tu zhugs/ /de dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur/ /phan tshun smon lam rnam dag spyod yul te/ /dag pa mtha' yas bya ba rab tu byas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul
thams cad kyang / /gzhan dang gzhan gyi sgo nas rab tu mthong / /bder gshegs chos kyi sku la zhugs pa dag /la las rgyal ba'i chos sku de nyid la/ /kun tu sprin 'dra gzhal med chags
med pa'i/ /mtha' yas chos kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mthong / /la las rgyal ba'i gzugs sku de nyid la/ /phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par 'phrul mdzad cing / /yon tan mtha' yas 'od
sprin rab 'bar ba/ /'gro ba dang tshul sprin du gyur par mthong / /la la rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med 'jug /dus gsum mnyam nyid mkha' dang 'dra ba'i sku/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam
pa'i tshul 'byung ba'i/ /sangs rgyas stobs la rab tu 'jug par mthong / /sangs rgyas gsung ni thogs pa med 'byung ste/ /phyogs kun zhing rnams ma lus rgyas 'gyur zhing / /'gro ba
snod yin skul bar byed pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la la la 'jug /la la sangs rgyas snang ba sna tshogs 'jug /sna tshogs snang bas
'gro ba kun bkang zhing / /rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul kun tu snang mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas 'od ni la las der yang mthong / /ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rab bkye ba'i/ /'od zer rgya
mtsho'i sprin la la la 'jug /sngon chad rgyal ba'i spyod pa bstan pa la/ /la la dga' zhing rgyal ba shes par byed/ /la las bsod nams sna tshogs mtshan gyi rnams/ /bder
gshegs bsod nams 'byung ba ji bzhin mthong / /pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe/ /ji ltar dag gyur mtshan kyang la las mthong / /sgo rnams kun nas rgyal ba tshad med
de| |mtha' dang dbus med chos kyi dbyings bkang zhing / /sangs rgyas byin rlabs rab tu brjod pa kun/ /rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas yul ni la las mthong / /de nas sangs rgyas
kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzhi dang snying po rgya mtsho thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu g.yos
so| |'gul to/ /rab tu 'gul to/ /kun tu 'gul to/ /ldeg go /rab tu ldeg go /kun tu ldeg go /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu
'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /shig shig /rab tu shig shig /kun tu shig shig go /'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag thams cad re res kyang mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa'i
sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par rab tu phab bo/ /'di ltar spos kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char thams
cad rab tu phab bo/ /rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin dang rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i dra ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog
mtha' yas pa'i sprin dang / rin po che kha dog sna tshogs dang / mu tig thams cad kyi sprin dang / spos dang / tsan+dan rin po che thams cad kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i gdugs
thams cad kyi sprin dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sgra dbyangs bzang po yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dang / nor bu nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba mang po'i sprin dang / rin po che'i 'od zer gyi mdzod thams
cad kyi sprin dang / rang rang gi lus las rgyan thams cad 'phyang ba'i sprin dang / de lta bu dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po re res kyang mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa'i sprin bsam
gyis mi khyab pa'i char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du mngon par phab bo/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams
rab tu dga' bar gyur pa de bzhin du gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po
re res kyang mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa'i sprin gyi char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag tu rab tu phab par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad na yang 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams mos pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / dmigs pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan
dang / tshogs gzhan dang gzhan dang / yang dag par sgrub pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / dga' ba'i shugs kyis spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / phyogs kyi tshul gzhan
dang gzhan dang / chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang byin gyi rlabs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / yul dang
stobs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sgo gzhan dang gzhan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa khong
du chud par byed do/ /'di na ji lta ba bzhin phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad na
yang de bzhin no/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi tshul rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba ste/ le'u dang
po'o|| //bam po drug pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sa ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams la byin gyi rlabs ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams la sangs rgyas kyi stobs ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mi bsnyengs pa ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mi 'phrog pa ni/ ji lta
bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs
rgyas kyi snyan ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi shangs ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
la sangs rgyas kyi ljags ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sku ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams la sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa
rgya mtsho thams cad ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la tshogs rgya mtsho thams cad ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la theg pa rgya mtsho rnams ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu gnas pa rgya mtsho thams cad ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu
yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la spyod pa rgya mtsho rnams ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'byung ba rgya mtsho
rnams ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho rnams ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la sa rgya mtsho rnams ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs
su ston| byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho rnams ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ye shes rgya mtsho rnams ni/
ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la yang thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sems can rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnams
kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad
grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi shin
tu bstan pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan par mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad rgya mtsho rnams kyang
bstan pa mdzad grang snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di
dag byung ngo / /mtha' yas rgya chen bskal par rab spyad de/ /byang chub shing drung rang byung yang dag skyes/ /phyi mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba'i sprin gyur pa/ /de bzhin
gshegs pas sku ni byin gyis brlabs/ /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi the tshom gcod/ /mos pa'i stobs ni yangs pa rab tu skyed/ /sems can sdug bsngal mtha' yas
zhi bar mdzad/ /sangs rgyas bde la 'gro ba thams cad 'god/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas zhing rdul snyed/ /de bzhin gshegs la lta zhing kun nas gnas/ /de dag bsam
pa spyod yul ji bzhin du/ /the tshom bsal bar chos rnams rab bstan gsol/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sa ni ji lta bu/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi rgyud rnams dang / /sangs rgyas
byin rlabs mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /de dag tshul ni rnam dag bstan du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ci yis 'jug /rgyal ba'i mkhyen la ji ltar 'jug pa
dang / /rgya chen mtha' yas stobs rnams rnam sbyang ba/ /rgyal sras kun la yang dag bstan du gsol/ /sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ji ltar mtha' yas dang / /mi bsnyengs chos nyid
ji ltar rnam sbyangs dang / /rdzu 'phrul mthu yang mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa rnams la bsgrag tu gsol/ /ji ltar chos rgyal pho brang mnga' mdzad cing / /rgyal
ba'i spyod yul ji ltar mi 'phrog dang / /sangs rgyas chos gzhan rgya chen de dag kyang / /thugs brtse'i slad du yang dag bstan du gsol/ /rgyal ba'i spyan ni ji ltar tshad med
cing / /snyan dang shangs dang de bzhin ljags dang sku/ /sangs rgyas thugs kyang ji ltar mtha' yas pa/ /'di dag tshul la 'jug pa bstan du gsol/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho ji ltar
sems can khams/ /chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtsho de dag dang / /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /'di dag rgyal ba'i sras la bstan du
gsol| |pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang / /rnam par thar la 'jug tshul rgya mtsho dang / /chos rnams kun gyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho dag /byang chub snying por thams cad
bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas zhal gyi sgo
tshams kyi mtshams kyi gseb nas 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bkye ba 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i ze ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
dang / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings su dbyangs sna tshogs kyis rgyan byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ 'od shin tu phra ba'i sprin kun nas lding ba zhes bya ba'i 'od
zer dang / 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / snying po byang chub kyi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs
kyi sprin ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ rnam par snang bas chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
cad du 'byung zhing 'khyil ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i rdo rje dri ma med pa mang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub
sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i sgra rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya
ba'i 'od zer dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ 'od zer de dag re re zhing yang 'khor gyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi
zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /'od zer de dag re re zhing yang rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog shin tu ston pa dag ste/ de dag rab tu 'phros nas phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi
zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nas 'od zer gyi sgo de dag thams cad kyi mthus gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang /
byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to/ /'od zer de dag thams cad kyi sgo nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis tshigs su bcad
pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod spyad de/ /phyogs rnams rgya mtshor sangs rgyas kun kyang mchod/ /sems
can rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas nas/ /rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mngon sangs rgyas/ /phyogs rnams kun tu snang zhing mngon par mdzes/ /spu rnams kun nas
sprul pa'i sprin rnams 'gyed/ /des ni sems can snod bzhin bskul byas nas/ /byang chub sbyor ba chags med rnam par dag /srid pa'i rgyud na sngon chad 'khor ba'i
tshe| |rgyal bas sems can yongs su smin mdzad pa/ /de dag skad cig gcig gis rab tu bkrol/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag mtha' yas so/ /rgyan rnams
sna tshogs kun tu 'od kyang snang / /byang chub shing ni yal ga rin chen 'phyang / /'od rnams bkye ba kun tu rnam par brgyan/ /byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab der sangs
rgyas| |phyogs rnams kun tu sgra ni rab tu sgrog /sems can kun gyi sems bzhin tshim byas te/ /sna tshogs thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par 'dul/ /de las chos nyid zhi
sgra rab tu 'byung / /zhing rnams stong gi rdul snyed sngon chad du/ /spyod tshe pha rol phyin kun rgyas par mdzad/ /stobs rnams kun la sangs rgyas rab bzhugs kyi/ /rgyal ba de
yi zhal bltar kun kyang deng / /zhing gi rdul snyed phyogs rnams thams cad nas/ /rgyal sras mang po rab tu dga' ste lhags/ /mchod pa sna tshogs char pa rab 'bebs shing / /
thams cad 'khod de rgyal ba mngon sum lta/ /gsung dbyangs gcig las mtha' yas mdo yi rnams/ /rgya mtsho dag kyang sangs rgyas shin tu ston/ /'gro kun yid bzhin chos
kyi char 'bebs kyi/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo de la bltar yang deng / /dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa/ /skad cig thugs la de dag mngon sum ste/ /rgyal ba byang
chub shing drung ston mdzad kyi/ /rgyal ba'i drung du smyur te 'dod bar gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ye shes mtsho/ /'od zer kun gyi sgo nas rab tu snang / /de yi chos
nyid ji ltar ji 'dra de dag ltos/ /sangs rgyas 'gro kun mngon sum chos ston to/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis
yang dag par bskul ba'i rnams byang chub sems dpa' rang rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang 'dabs chags su
shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad+mo'i dpal dri ma med par snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams
bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phreng ba rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi chu bo rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ nam
mkha' mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+mo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya
ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te bcom ldan 'das
gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing rin po che'i char gyi 'od zer pad+mo'i sprin
bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i ri bo'i zom gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nyi
ma'i 'khor lo'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun
nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sil snyan sgra thams cad 'byin pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phye ma'i shing gi mdzod kyi sprin
bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos dang / bdug spos gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
brlabs pa dang / spos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brten te
me tog snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su lho
phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad snang bas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten
gyi khams 'od mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mkhyen pa'i 'od dpal gyi ri'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang
chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan
cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar 'gyur te/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i
snying po'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas snang ba rin po che'i rgyan gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu 'bar zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
