nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas sgra 'byin cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po shing gi yal ga sna
tshogs kyis snying po byang chub kyi rgyan byed pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sgo kun nas rin po che'i 'od zer dang / sangs rgyas
kyi sprul pas snang bar byed pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad dang ma 'dres par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du
gzugs brnyan ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro shin tu sdug pa'i sgron mas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rjes su
sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med
khang gi gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyi dus gsum gyi sangs
rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan rnam par snang ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
mtsho'i rdul phra mo snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs

su brten te in+d+ra nI la dang / 'dzam bu nA da dang / pad+ma rA ga sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas yang 'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su nub phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od yid du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag las 'jig rten
gyi khams gos kyi stan yongs su 'byung ba na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mngon du snang ba'i yon tan rin po ches brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas
byang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang
na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / nor bu'i
rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pas brgyan par khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / spos 'od 'phro ba'i
khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig thams cad kyi khang ba brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin
gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i phreng bas yongs su
brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'od zer gyi snang ba phyogs kun tu 'phro ba'i snying po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan

thams cad 'byung ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan cing rgyan du ma yang dag par ston pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin
bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyogs thams cad rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun
nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dang / dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na

pa der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs su brten te seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po lo ma sna tshogs gser las byas pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas

te 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su byang phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya pad+mo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten
gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ut+pa la'i rgyan na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang
chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i 'od zer snang bas mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan
cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ spos dang nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /
sgo thams cad nas lo ma'i dog pa'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / shing gi gzugs thams cad las rgyan mtha' yas
pa yongs su ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu nar pa'i me tog gi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas
yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
pa dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed yang dag par ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sngon
gyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa'i gos kyi mdzod
kyi nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad rab tu sgrog cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra kun tu gtong ba'i
shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa shing gi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas
yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brten te seng+ge'i khri nor bu sgron ma'i pad+mo'i snying po can
mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su byang dang / shar gyi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho 'dzam bu chu klung dang / shel gyi kha dog tshon gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi snying
po na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i sgron ma bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa'i dpal gyi
gzi brjid mar me zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ seng+ge'i
khri rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / seng+ge'i khri nor bu'i rgyal po kun tu mngon
pas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri rgyan mang po thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can
gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgro na ma sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog
par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri phyogs kun nas phreng ba rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri

spos kyi me tog pad+mo'i phreng ba rin po che thams cad kyi snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gdan thams cad kyi rgyan yang
dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri rgyan dang phreng ba thams cad 'phyang zhing rta babs dang stegs
bus rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri shing thams cad kyi yal ga las nor bu rin po che dang phye ma 'byung ba'i

snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri spos dang rin po che'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po
can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa seng+ge'i khri'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas
yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang dang / shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brten te seng+ge'i khri nor bu rin po

che snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo sna tshogs kyi snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su shar dang / lho'i

phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho baiDUR+Ya'i 'od zer kun tu snang ba gser gyi rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi dpal dri ma med
par snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dga' ba'i shugs dpal gyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron
ma'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ nor bu yid bzhin gyi
rgyal po thams cad kyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che in+d+ra nI la'i ze ba can gyi me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi
bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos rin po che'i bla re thams cad kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin
po che 'od 'phro ba sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / 'od dang / sgra dbyangs
rab tu ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu dang / gos dang / rgyan thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i bla re'i
sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi dog pa lta bu rin po che'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa
dang / dril bu sna tshogs kun tu sgras khyab par byed pa'i dra ba'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / pad+mo'i dra ba mtha' yas pa sna tshogs rin po che'i
snying po can gyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gser gyi ze ba 'od 'phro zhing snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog
par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan rab tu ston pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
pa dang / de dag la sogs pa bla re'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba

der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar dang / lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten te seng+ge'i khri pad+mo sna tshogs rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung
bcas te 'khod do/ /de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su lho dang / nub kyi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nyi ma'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar bas kun tu snang

ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma dang seng+ge ltar snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs
bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te sna tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par
byin gyis rlob cing / 'od zer snang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig mang po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams
cad kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo nas rab tu sgrog pa'i gdugs kyi sprin
bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
rin po che'i tshon rnams pa sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis rab tu brgyan cing dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i shing gi
yal ga thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma rnam par snang ba'i lte ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha'
kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos dang bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma mang pos kun tu
rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po rnam par bstan pas kun tu rgyan gyis khyab par byed pa'i
gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gdugs kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas

yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho dang / nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brten te seng+ge'i khri in+d+ra nI la yid du 'ong
bar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su nub dang / byang gi phyogs
mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i skar mda' 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi
rgyan yid du 'ong ba'i snying po na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang / gzi brjid mi zad
pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ rin
po che thams cad du snang ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun
nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog gi sprin gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin
gyis brlabs pa dang / 'od zer gyi sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
kyi zhing gzugs brnyan gyi khongs su chud pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i yal ga'i sgo kun nas sangs rgyas kyi
yul rab tu sgrog pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che baiDUR+Ya'i rigs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sems skad cig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i gzugs yongs su ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus
nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sems skad cig gcig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i gzugs yongs su ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam
mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam 'byung ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba rab tu gtong ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas
yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i sgra sgrog pa nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par
byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub dang / byang gi phyogs mtshams su brten te seng+ge'i khri 'od zer 'bar ba mi
zad pa'i gzi brjid kyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su 'og gi phyogs na 'jig

rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad+mo dri zhim dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng+ge snang zhing 'bar ba na de bzhin gshegs
pa chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od zer bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros
zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ rin po che
thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / spos thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog
par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
brjed pas khyab par byed pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i
'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin
gyis brlabs pa dang / bskal pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par sangs rgyas yang dag par 'byung zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya bar brjod pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus
nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che zad mi shes pa thams cad dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par
byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od zer gyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing /

bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'og gi phyogs su brten nas seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil

mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang 'dabs chags su steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nor bu

rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od rgya mtsho'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan yid du 'ong ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs
pa yon tan dang grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang / brtson 'grus chags
pa med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/
rin po che kha dog mtha' yas par 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlob cing / nor bu rin po che kun nas 'od kyi dra ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun
nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rgya chen pos rnam par snang bar 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos
thams cad 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rgyan thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog
par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / shing dang za ba rnam pa sna tshogs
su 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rdo rje sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor
bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa brjod cing 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig gi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i
sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas
yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas steng gi phyogs su brten te seng+ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgrog

pa'i 'od zer 'byung ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya

mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis

nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing 'ongs par gyur te gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te seng+ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul cing skyil mo krung

bcas te 'khod par gyur to/ /'khod pa'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad re re nas 'od zer gyi sprin rin po che thams cad ltar kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /rin po che re re'i sgo nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can la 'khod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu

phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyi sbubs gang bar byas nas rdul shin tu phra ba re
re la yang zhing 'byams klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du rab tu 'jug par gyur to/ /zhing re rer yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
mthong zhing shes par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la yang rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed

par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re'i lha'i gnas thams cad du skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas
yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la yang 'jig rten gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i sgo
dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad rab tu bskyod pa dang /
sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rab tu brjod cing rnam par 'phrul ba'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig
re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'gro ba thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag rnam par bstan cing brjod pa'i sgo dag nas yang

dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin thams cad kyi char dbab pa'i sgo dag nas yang
dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi dbyings snang bas
rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi
skus chos kyi dbyings gang bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa dang / 'od thams cad kyi sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rab tu gnas pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba
byed par gyur to/ /de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang ste sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bskul ba byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dag tu
rab tu bdal te zhing re re yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ngan song gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni/ rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /
sems can phyin ci log la nges pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni/ yang dag par nges pa'i phung po rab tu 'god do/ /sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra
ba snyed ni/ dge ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / mtho ris su skye ba la rab tu 'god de/ /sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu
'god do/ /sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni/ dge ba'i bshes bsnyen bkur ba'i bsod nams kyi tshigs la rab tu 'god do/ /zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab
kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni/ sngon chad ma bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye bar byed do/ /zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
sa phyir mi ldog pa yang dag par thob pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyan chos thams
cad kun nas snang zhing gzigs pa la yongs su sbyangs te rab tu 'god do/ /zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed stobs thams cad kyis rab tu gnas pa dang /
ye shes kyi tshogs zad mi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god do/ /zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra

ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdung dang rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i gnas rgya mtsho rnam par spyod pa la rab tu 'god do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'od zer gyi sgo thams

cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur to/ /'od zer thams cad sgo nas sgra 'byung ste/ /ji snyed byang chub spyod par 'jug pa dang / /rgyal sras yon tan phun sum gang yod pa'i/ /
dbyangs kyis phyogs rnams kun tu bkang zhing sgrog /bskal pa rgya mtshor skye med spyad pa spyod/ /sdug bsngal kun las 'gro ba kun 'grol kyang / /yid la skye med zhum pa gang yang med/ /'di yi
tshul la rgyal sra rab tu zhugs/ /chos kyi sgo rnams kun la rab spyod cing / /tshul 'dir bskal pa rgya mtsho zad par byed/ /mtha' med dbus med lhag ma gang yang med/ /de dag chos nyid zhi
ba rab tu sgrog /dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa/ /rgyal sras de dag 'gro la phan dog tu/ /de dag thams cad ma lus yongs su spyod/ /de dag spyod pa'i rgyan ni 'di 'dra 'o/ /rgyal ba
kun gyi 'khor du nyer phyin te/ /phyogs rnams kun na gzugs brnyan lus 'chang zhing / /rgyal sras ye shes rgya mtsho'i blo gros can/ /de dag chos nyid zhir 'jug 'di 'dra'o/ /'od zer sgo
rnams re rer mtha' pa'i/ /bsam yas zhing rnams de dag rab tu 'jug /spyod pas mig ni kun nas yongs dag ste/ /rgyal sras de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/ /skra rtse gcig tu de dag rab
gnas shing / /zhing rnams dbyings kun kun nas bskyod byas kyang / /sems can rnams la 'jigs pa mi byed do/ /sa 'di rnam dag tshul 'chang dag gi 'o//
tshul rnams kun la bsam gyis mi khyab lus/ /de dag kun tu zhing rnams sna tshogs sprul/ /skad cig sems la 'chi 'pho skye ba snang / /rgyan 'di sems la chags med rnams kyi 'o//
dus gsum bskal pa gang yong ma lus par/ /skad cig gcig gis thams cad rab tu ston/ /sgyu ma lta bu lus med dngos kyang med/ /de 'dra'i chos nyid chags med blos rtogs
so| |bzang po'i spyod pa mchog la zhugs pa rnams/ /'gro ba kun la yid du 'ong ba'i lus/ /rgyal sras de dag chos nyid 'di yin te/ /'od zer kun gyi sgo nas dbyangs kyang sgrog/ de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pas rnam par 'phrul ba thob par bya ba'i phyir smin
mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes kyi snang ba phyogs rnam par ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu bkye'o/ /'od zer rin po che thams
cad kyi kha dog sgron ma'i sprin du brdal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu snang ba de byung nas tshul thams cad kyi phyogs 'byams klas pa rab tu snang bar byas te phyogs thams

cad kyi dbyings rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas nas sems can rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po thams
cad rab tu bskyod pa'i rgyan gyi tshul thams cad kyis rab tu bskyod nas sangs rgyas kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad dang mnyam
pa dag tu rab tu spros nas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba rgya mtsho dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi char dus gsum gyi rdul shin
tu phra ba dang mnyam pa phab ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rab tu bstan nas sems can thams cad ma lus par 'khor ba thams cad las rab tu gdon
par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji bzhin du 'byung ba dang mthun pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam ma lus pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang /
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dag tu dga' bar phrad par byas nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan sngar pad+mo chen po chu ba rin po che thams cad las bsgrubs pa/ nang rim nor bu'i rgyal po'i mdzod sna tshogs las byas pa/ lo ma rin po che thams cad kyi rigs kyi char 'bebs pa/
ze ba'i phreng ba'i rgyan spos rin po che thams cad las byas pa/ snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi tshon gyis rab tu mdzes par bris pa/ 'od kyi 'khor rnam par
dag cing 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bas byas pa'i sprin dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad rab tu 'byung ba/ sems kyi skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba mtha' yas pa ston pa'i
sgra rab tu 'byung ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin gyis thams cad du gang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon
lam thams cad rab tu ston pa'i dbyangs 'byin par gyur te byung ngo / /pad+mo chen po de byung ba'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba/ byang
chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod spu de nyid nas byung ba ste bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar g.yas phyogs
su bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te pad+mo chen po de'i snying po la 'dug go /byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag kyang ze
ba'i phreng ba de dag la 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhing tshad med pas rab tu dga' ba'i shugs shin tu skyes pa
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rjes su song ba'i ye shes can/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i mthu dang ldan pa/ zhing 'byams klas
pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pa dang ba spu thams cad las sprul pa'i sprin zad mi shes pas kun tu khebs par byed pa/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la
dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings kun tu sgyur ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dus gsum khyab par byed pa'i spyod yul gyis rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs
pa'i byin gyis rlabs 'chang ba/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu 'jog cing phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon
tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi lus dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te de'i tshe
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas sku ni chos kyi dbyings kyis gsal/ /'gro ba kun la rgyal ba mngon sum ste/ /ji ltar mos pa'i sems can rgyas bkang nas/ /snying po byang chub de la

rgyal ba bzhugs/ /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi/ /rgyal ba spu rtse kun la rab bzhugs te/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor/ /kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa mchog ston to/ /
spu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho ste/ /byang chub snying por pad+mo'i gdan la bzhugs/ /chos dbyings rgya chen thams cad kun bkang ste/ /spu rnams kun la rnam par
'phrul pa ston/ /zhing rnams re re dag na rab bzhugs shing / /zhing rnams 'byams klas kun tu rgyas mdzad pas/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams/ kun kyang snying po
byang chub drung du 'dod/ /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dod/ /chos dbyings 'byams klas
rtag tu rgyas par 'gengs/ /zhing rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan rab tu ston/ /chos dbyings rdul rnams ye shes spyod yul can/ /kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas
kun gyi 'khor du yang dag byung / /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog yul can/ /sangs rgyas chos sprin nyan cing rab tu mkhas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams kun na gnas/ /zhing
rnams kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod/ /rgya mtsho'i chos la rnam par snang bar spyod/ /de dag rgyal ba'i sa rnams rgya mtsho zhugs/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba/ /de
dag smon lam rgya mtshor rab tu 'jug/ /sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang / /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa de dag shes/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing / /de dag rnam
'phrul rgya chen kun la zhugs/ /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mang snyed kyi/ /lus kyi sprin ni rtag par rab tu ston/ /sems can kun bkang 'od kyis kun la skyob/ /bsam pa yid bzhin chos kyi char yang
'bebs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+mo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas ye shes shin tu zab/ /dus rnams kun tu de 'byung ste/ /chos dbyings thugs su chud pas na/ /'jig rten mgon zhes rab tu brjod/ /yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/ /
'dres pa med cing gnas pa med/ /sems can thams cad yid bzhin du/ /gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong / /chos rnams thams cad mngon sangs rgyas/ /chos rnams kun la rab tu zhugs/ /
thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/ /zhing rnams kun na rnam par mdzes/ /kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par/ /sems can thams cad yid bzhin du/ /sems can mchog gi 'od rnams

dang / /de bzhin sku yi sprin kyang mthong / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag las/ /mi zad sangs rgyas sprul ba rnams/ /zhing rnams kun tu rab sgrog cing / /chos kyi rgya mtsho shin tu ston/ /spu rnams re
re kun nas kyang / /phyogs bcur 'od zer dra ba dag/ sangs rgyas gsung ni rab 'byin cing / /gdul dka' thams cad rnam par 'dul/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer sgo rnams nas/ /sgra dbyangs zab mo rtag tu
'byung / /sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dag /mtha' dang dbus med rab tu bskor/ /
ye shes zab mo zhes bya ba/ /rgya chen phyogs su rab tu ston/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/ /rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang
zhing / /yang dag sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad/ /sku rnams re re kun las kyang / /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul mnyam pa/ /sangs rgyas sems can mnyam phyung zhing / /rnam par 'phrul ba rab tu
ston| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
chos kyi dbyings rnams kun khyab par/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par mdzes/ /rgya chen gsung ni rang byung ba/ /zhing rnams rgya mtshor shin tu sgrog /'jig rten thams cad kun 'jug par/ /
'jig rten mgon po shin tu mdzes/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam mkhyen cing / /byin gyi rlabs ni rab tu ston/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun la mngon/ /sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin//
thams cad gzigs pas sangs rgyas kyi/ /rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mthong / /mtha' yas 'od mnga' sangs rgyas sprin/ /chos rnams rgya mtsho'i 'brug kyang sgrog /ye shes rnam
rgyu'i tshul bzhin du/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams de la 'jug /'jug pa rnams la 'byung ba med/ /'byung ba yod par rnam par bstan/ /gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi/ /chos rnams 'byung ba nam
mkha' bzhin/ /'pho dang gnas pa mi mnga' ste/ /'on kyang rgyal ba kun na snang / /sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings las byung / /de phyir sangs rgyas rab tu brjod/ /yul na bzhugs med rang bzhin
med| |de la 'byung ba mi mnga' ste/ /sku dang mtshan kyang de bzhin med/ /rgyal ba gzugs brnyan 'dra ba'o/ /'gro ba kun tu chos kyi sprin/ /bsam pa kun la rab tu byung / /yang dag sangs rgyas
rnam kun tu/ /sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi/ /snying po byang chub kun na snang / /'khor gyi rgya mtsho thams cad na/ /zhing rnams kun gyis rnam par mdzes/ /
sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dag la/ /yon tan rgya mtsho zad mi shes/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/ /de dag yon tan zad pa med/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i 'od
kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas sar/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang bzhugs pa//
de dang de dag sangs rgyas kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad mthong / /ye shes lus kyis zhugs pa rnams/ /zhing kun rdul gyi sbubs su yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /bdag
nyid lus kyang der mthong ngo / /gzugs brnyan zhing rnams thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'byung / /kun tu byin gyi rlabs rnams dang / /rnam par
'phrul pa rab tu ston/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang / /spyod pa gang gis rnam sbyangs pa/ /de dag zhing rnams thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul mthong / /kun tu mnyam pa nyid
gyur cing / /kun tu lus kyis rab gnas te/ /ye shes kun gyi rjes song nas/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas ye shes zhugs pa'i rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings la
rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spu dag tu/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing la rab tu 'jug /sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing dag tu/ /byin gyi rlabs rnams rab bstan pas/ /gzhan dang gzhan gyi lus
dag dang / /ming gis kun ni rab tu gnas/ /byang chub snying por rnam 'phrul dang / /byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag /skad cig sems kyis ston pa byed//
zhing rnams 'byams klas thams cad dang / /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas dag /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam gzhag rnams/ /skad cig sems kyis rnam par ston/ /sangs rgyas zhing
rnams thams cad na/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas sku la rnam spyod kyang / /mtha' ma rnyed par mi rung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i 'od zer snang
ba'i mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ /chos
kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor/ /chos dbyings tshul rnams thams cad kyang / /sangs rgyas sprin gyis mngon du yog /'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho dang / /phyogs bcu kun na gang yod pa/ /
thams cad kun tu 'khor lo 'khor/ /de ni smon lam rnam 'phrul ba'o/ /'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba/ /gzhan dang gzhan gyi ming dag gis/ /zhing rnams gnas pa kun tu yang / /chos
kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'khor/ /rnam par snang mdzad byin rlabs kyis/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang / /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dag /rjod cing zhing rnams kun tu 'byung / /zhing kun rdul
la sku yi rnams/ /thams cad chos char rab tu 'bebs/ /'dres pa med cing 'byung ba med/ /'jig rten dag na rnam par mdzes/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med par/ /zhing kun rdul phran sbubs
dag tu| |rnam par snang ba mdzad pa'i gsung / /sngon gyi spyod pa rab tu sgrog /zhing rnams thams cad rdul snyed kyi/ /'od zer dra ba phyogs bcu na/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer kun sgo nas/ /byang
chub mchog phyir sems can 'dul/ /kun tu ma 'dres sku dag gis/ /chos dbyings yongs su rab gsal te/ /'gro rnams 'dul ba ji bzhin du/ /gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong / /dus
gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyi/ /mgon po ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams/ /de dag kun gyi mtshan kyang sgrog /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos/ /da ltar byung
dang 'das pa dang / /sangs rgyas gang rnams ma byon pa/ /de dag kun gyi bsam yas pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu grag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi
zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid mar mes sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang gis byang chub sems dpa'
yi| |ye shes tshogs 'di kun non cing / /ye shes rtogs pa rnyed pa rnams/ /de dag 'di yi tshul la zhugs/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs/ /zhing rnams kun tu rab tu 'byung / /
sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul te/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ched du brjod/ /skad cig re re'i sems kun la| /chos kyi dbyings su rnam par rgyu/ /de bzhin nyid la gnas shing brten/ /chos
rnams rgya mtsho kun la zhugs/ /rgyan gyi pha rol phyin pa rnams/ /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sku dag tu/ /zhing rnams kun na gnas shing spyod/ /rdul rnams
re re'i steng nas kyang / /chos rnams kun ni rab tu 'byung / /zhing rnams kun kyang khyab par byed/ /ye shes chags med spyod yul lo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyod yul du/ /lus pa
med par kun bkang zhing / /rnam par 'phrul ba'i rnam spyod pas/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul rnams la zhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes snyegs dbyangs/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rab sgrog
pa| |chos dbyings rjes su shes pa rnams/ /dbyangs kyi rgya mtsho rnams la spyod/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor ma 'dres par/ /sgra dang dbyangs rnams shin tu sgrog /dus rnams thams cad shes
pas gsal/ /dbyangs kyis de dag sa la zhugs/ /sgra yi shes la rmongs pa med/ /sems can sgra yang spyod yul te/ /thams cad mkhyen pa kun gyi yang / /rnam par 'phrul ba'i dbyangs
shes so/ /sa nas sar yang phyin gyur cing / /stobs kyi sa la rab gnas te/ /bskal pa bye bar spyad pas na/ /chos nyid 'di la rab tu 'jug /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes
kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang la
sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi/ /chos rnams de dag mtshan nyid med/ /ye shes sa ni thob pa rnams/ /'jig rten gtso bo rab tu mthong / /shes rab snang ba'i kun 'od can/ /byang chub sems
dpa' mnyam bzhag rnams/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kun gyi yang / /sku yi rnam par 'phrul la zhugs/ /chos kyi dbyings la rnam spyad cing / /lus kyi dngos la rab 'jug ste/ /zab mo'i
chos rnams rtogs gyur nas/ /smon lam dag gis yang dag byung / /bsod nams rgya mtshos byung gyur cing / /ye shes sa la rnam par gnas/ /chos la rnam
spyod khong du chud/ /spyod pa'i mchog la rab tu spyod/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi drung dag tu/ /chos kyi dbyings la spyad pas na/ /rang bzhin lus ni
rab tu mthong / /zhing rnams 'byams klas thams cad du/ /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /thams cad gzigs pa'i chos kyi rnams/ /rgya mtsho kun la rab tu spyod/ /bdag mthong
bas ni lus dang rdul/ /gcig tu 'dres par mngon par byas/ /ma skyes mtshan nyid med pa ste/ /zhing rnams kun tu'ang rnam par mdzes/ /'jig rten kun gyi bsam mthun par/ /
sems can kun la mngon sum du/ /lus kyi sprin ni bstan byas shing / /byang chub don du sems can 'dul/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mthu yis ni/ /byang chub sems dpar brjod
pa ste| |gang gis mgon po mthong ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i byin rlabs shin tu zab/ /mgon po ji snyed gang bzhugs pa'i/ /byin rlabs mtha' dang dbus med de/ /chos dbyings rab tu gang
byas nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam 'tshang rgya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang bas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs
bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing rnams kun tu sangs rgyas kyi/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor sgra 'byin te/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas/ /
yon tan sprin ni rab tu brjod/ /yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/ /rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba ste/ /gzugs kyi sku yang rab ston cing / /chos nyid 'di la shin tu 'jug /dga' dang mos
pa'i shugs rnams dang / /sangs rgyas stobs rnams thams cad la/ /rab tu gnas shing de dag ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug /shes rab chung ngus chos 'di dag /kun
nas shes par mi nus te/ /ye shes mig ni rab sbyangs shing / /'di yi tshul la 'jug par 'gyur/ /rab tu gnas dang byin rlabs dang / /chos kun rnam par spyad pa dang / /rab tu 'jug
dang ldan pa yi/ /mnyam pa nyid la rab tu zhugs/ /chos rnams mtha' yas klong gi rnams/ /chos kun mtshan nyid rnams la ste/ /kun mkhyen nyid la rab zhugs shing / /chos kyi rgya
mtsho kun la spyod/ /sangs rgyas zhing na kun 'khod cing / /thams cad kun na rnam par mdzes/ /'ong ba med cing 'phos pa med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de 'dra'o/ /gzugs brnyan 'dra
ba'i sku rnams ni/ /sems can rgya mtsho'i nang na snang / /mos pa ci 'dra yod pa'i rnams/ /de bzhin mgon po kun gyis mthong / /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang / /spyod pa mang po sus
sbyangs pa/ /de dag thams cad ba spu la'ang / /rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag mthong / /lus kyi rnams ni re res kyang / /chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu khyab//
'khor lo kun na 'khor ba ste/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bsam mi khyab/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang / /gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas sku ni thams cad nas/ /'od zer sprin mang phyogs rnams bcur/ /kha dog
mtha' yas 'bar ba'i 'od/ /sems can bsam pa kun la 'phro/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi/ /snying po byang chub kun na bzhugs/ /bdud rnams thams cad rab btul te//
'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes/ /thams cad rdul na'ang ma 'dres par/ /'od zer dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs/ /phyogs rnams gzhan dang gzhan lam du/ /zhing gi rgyud rnams
rab tu ston/ /zhing gi rnams ni rgya mtsho'i klong / /phyogs kyi rnams kyang kun tu gnon/ /zhing rnams thang chen mnyam zhing dag/ in+d+ra nI lar kun nas gnas/ /spyi'i tshugs dag dang
snrel zhi dang / /pad+mo'i dbyibs dang khyad khyud dang / /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i khyad par du/ /gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams gar phyin par/ /thug pa
med par gram brdal ba/ /de dag kun gyi 'khor rnams su/ /shin tu bstan pa'i chos 'byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dbyings na/ /'khod pa'i zhing rnams bsam mi khyab/ /de dag kun tu
chos nyid 'di/ /'jig rten mgon po rnams kyang ston/ /tha dad med pa'i chos kyi dbyings/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor/ /gcig gi tshul gyi rnam pa yis/ /chos bstan pa ni kun tu
'byung / /sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /tshul rnams thams cad rab tu brjod/ /dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul dag gis/ /mi zad tshul rnams rab tu bstan/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams
kun na yang / /rgyal ba rnams ni mig yor 'dra/ /snying po byang chub rnams na snang / /'byung ba dag kyang yod pa min/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba'i rnam par snang
ba 'byung ba'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /blta zhing blta zhing sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku gzugs
bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /dga' ba rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung / /chos kyi shugs ni rab tu 'phel/ /mtshan rab kun nas sangs rgyas rnams/ /phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu 'byung / /rdul rnams
kun tu 'jug pa yis/ /sangs rgyas sprin kyang de bzhin bstan/ /skad cig skad cig sems kun la/ /sangs rgyas 'od ni dpal gyis 'bar/ /rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag gis/ /zhing
rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang / /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che/ /rgya mtsho chos las byung ba rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pa/ /'di yi yul la
rnam par spyod/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la/ /gang rnams shin tu gnas gyur pa/ /de dang de rnams zhing dag tu/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul kun la lta/ /ye shes zab mo rnam gnon cing //
chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba ni/ /mos pa rgya mtsho shes pa ste/ /smon lam kun gyis byung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dang gsung / /chags pa med la rab tu zhugs/ /spyod pa gzhan dang
gzhan dag gis/ /spyod yul kun kyang khong du chud/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gnas shing / /ye shes spyod yul gyur pa rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings la rab brtson pa/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi sa
gnon to/ /skad cig sems kyis zhing gi rnams/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul mnyam pa/ /de dag chos nyid ji bzhin du/ /rdul gcig steng du rnam par spyod/ /zhing rnams ji snyed thams cad
na| |zhing gi rnam 'phrul gang yod pa/ /chos nyid 'di la zhugs pa rnams/ /zhing gcig tu ni sdud pa byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang / brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros
kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad du/ /de dag gsung ni zab mo 'byung / /
dbyangs kyi yan lag kun rgyas pa/ /chos kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs so/ /brjod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyis/ /sems can kun gyi skad dag tu/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu yang / /chos rnams
bstan pa rab tu 'byung / /zhing rnams kun tu ma lus par/ /sangs rgyas rnams par 'phrul mthong zhing / /sangs rgyas gsung rnams thos pa dang / /byang chub mchog phyir kun kyang 'jug/ rdul rnams

re re'i steng nas kyang / /chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun bkang zhing / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa byed/ /chos kyi sku ni tha dad min/ /nam mkha' bzhin te chags
pa med| |gzugs kyi skur ni rnam dmigs pa/ /mig yor snang ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /mig yor yul la mi gnas te/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dngos po med/ /mnyam pa nyid 'di rtogs gyur nas/ /ye
shes rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sku ni ma skyes te/ /gzung ba med cing 'byung ba med/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang mtshungs/ /gzung du med las 'di bstan to/ /zhing rnams kun gyi
sangs rgyas rnams/ /de dag spu gcig rtse la tshogs/ /ye shes mig dang ldan pa yis/ /spu rnams kun tu rnam 'phrul mthong / /rnam par snang mdzad smon lam ste/ /chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing //
bla med chos kyi 'khor lo dag /zhing rnams kun na rtag tu 'khor/ /ji ste bskal pa bsam yas par/ /spu rtse gcig tu rnam sprul pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad mdzad kyang / /de yi mtha' ni rnyed par
dka'| |ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub tu phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dus par gyur pa
de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub dag tu byang chub sems dpa'
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho byed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun nas 'dus par gyur to/ /'di na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi snying po byang chub
de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa dag tu kun nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho na rab tu ston to// //shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i
mdo| sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// //bam po bdun pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can de nyid la 'dug ste/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin
gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par
btags pa'i tshogs/ nam mkha'i dbyings chags pa med cing rgya che ba khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i klong mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song zhing shin tu brdal ba'i tshogs
chos thams cad kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par 'byung bas rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyogs thams cad du yang dag par zhugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi lus kyis kun nas
yog par byas pa'i rang bzhin gyi snying po can/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes snang ba rgya mtsho'i klong / phyogs thams cad du sgo kun nas tshul rgya mtsho rnam par rig par bya
bas mngon du yang dag par ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang rnam par thar bas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snying po can/ zhing 'byams klas pa
thams cad ma lus par chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su grub par byed pa/ bskal pa thams cad
du smon lam rgya mtshos rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo ston cing rjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs la mnyam par bzhag par gyur to/ /ji
ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i
snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs
pa| phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa/ dus gsum thams cad na yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byung ba'i khams chos kyi dbyings rgya chen pos non pa'i rigs su gtogs
pa| shin tu phra zhing bsgribs pa med pa dang / phyogs rgya chen po rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ris su gtogs pas rnam par non pa/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs thogs pa med pas chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang sangs rgyas kyi sku thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bas chos
kyi dbyings kyi rdul ma lus pa kun tu gtogs pa/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par gang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa dag
tu rdul phra mo re re la'ang zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs nas zhing re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra
ba snyed la rab tu zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i zhabs kyi drung du yang lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin
gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag go /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de
bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag pa'i rjes la de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhal bstan to/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod de ltar byang chub sems
dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po 'di la mnyam par gzhag pa legs so/ /legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ khyod la phyogs
bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / khyod kyi sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i yang mthus 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho thams cad kyi
rnam par dbye ba dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul gyis phyogs rgya mtsho ma lus par snang bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang /
chags pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad yongs su gnon pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug par
bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad sgo kun nas rab tu brjod pa dang / chos kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang / chos
kyi snang ba thams cad kyi tshul rnam par blta ba dang / sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag
rgya mtsho'i dbyangs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /
dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'jig pa dang 'du ba'i ye shes
kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /chos kyi dbyings 'byams klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mo tha mi dad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /sems can
thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams mang po thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chos kyi dbyings thams
cad du lus yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag dang sgra dbyangs kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa la nye bar bsgrubs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag dang rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs
na lus 'khod pa thams cad la yang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par mdzes par brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi dra ba'i me tog sna tshogs shin tu rgyas pa/ 'od kyi
dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin 'gyed pa/ rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin gyis rnam par gsal bar gyur pa/ phyogs thams cad du spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od kyis rnam par snang
pa| sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su sgra 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu
phyung ba yang dag par ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba rnam par ston pa/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i snang ba yang dag par ston pa/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba rnams brkyangs te/ byang
chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bor bzhag go /'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs na yod pa thams cad du yang
de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung dag tu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bo la phyag rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams rab tu bzhag go/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis reg ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ba'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dus gsum thams cad
du sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i ye shes ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings dang / dus gsum du mnyam
pa'i rdul thams cad kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sgo dang / sems can ma lus pa'i gnas thams cad dang mnyam zhing sems
can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ming gi 'khor lo las ldang ba'i sgo dang / phyogs mtshams thams cad du chos kyi dbyings rnam par
'byed pa'i sgo dang / rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin mtha' dang dbus med par 'byams klas pa'i sgo dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan pa'i sgo dag
nas langs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ting nge 'dzin las langs ma thag tu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang so sor re zhing ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten

gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /gzungs rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /

chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi
phyogs su rnam par snang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba'i yon tan gyi snying po can rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / ye shes ma 'dres pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i rtse mo thams cad la zhing gzhan dang gzhan rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten khams rgya
mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba dang / byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang
rgya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor rgya mtsho rnams dang rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi khongs na yod pa kun tu yang byang chub sems
dpa' rgya mtsho rnams rab tu zhugs par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid rab tu thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ma lus par bag langs pa tsam du g.yos te/ rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par gnas shing / chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgra yang shin tu grag par
gyur te| de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du yang nor bu'i rgyal po chen po bcu'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab par gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
nor bu'i rgyal po mtshan dang ldan pa'i gser dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyi sprin char mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyis rnam par gsal bar byed pa'i sprin gyi
char mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur rin po che'i 'khor lo rab tu 'grem pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i
gzugs brnyan rin po che'i snying po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgya thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab

bo| |'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po zhing rnam par snang bar byed cing snying po byang chub tu dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur snang ba'i
sprul pa 'gyed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'khor lo dang mthu rab tu grag par byed pa'i sprin gyi char
mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po rol mo'i sgra yid
du 'ong bas phyogs thams cad khyab par byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char bcu po 'di dag mngon par bab par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to/ /zhing rnams 'byams klas kun na kun tu bzang po de/ /pad+mo yid du 'ong
la rab tu 'dug pa mthong / /kun tu rnam 'phrul rnam pa 'di 'dra ston byed pa/ /ting 'dzin yul la 'jug pa mtha' dang dbus med do/ /lus rnams thams cad nas kyang kun tu bzang po de/ /
sprul pa rab tu 'gyed cing chos dbyings rtag par 'gengs/ /ting 'dzin kun gyi tshul dang ming dang rnam 'phrul ba/ /thams cad dbyangs kyis chags pa byed par rgya che sgrog/ ting 'dzin thams
cad gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam 'phrul gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhabs kyi drung dag tu/ /rgyal ba kun gyi spyod yul yangs pa gang byas te/ /zhing rnams kun tu rnam par 'phrul
ba mang po ston/ /zhing kun rgyal ba kun gyi zhabs drung ji bzhin du/ /de ltar zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul phran la/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ma lus ston/ /rnam par snang
mdzad smon lam dbyings la rab tu zhugs/ /kun tu bzang po'i lus ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do/ /thams cad zhing la mi gnas de bzhin nyid la gnas/ /lus kyi sprin ni 'gro ba kun dang mnyam
par kun bkye zhing / /sems can kun la bsam pa bzhin du de dag ston/ /sangs rgyas sku rnams kun la zhing rnams gang yod pa/ /mtha' dang dbus med kun la rab tu zhugs pa rnams/ /kun
tu bzang po'i smon lam gnas pa dag la bstan/ /rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra dam pa tshad kyang med/ /'khor rnams rgya mtsho rdul bral mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /tshad med thams cad lus
kyi nang du kun chub cing / /dbyangs la zhing mang dra bar rnam 'tshang rgya bstod/ /skad cig sems la bskal pa mang po de bzhin ston/ /zhing rnams thams cad 'byams klas pa na rnam grags shing / /
rnam par 'phrul pa dam pa bstan par rab tu snang / /phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus spyod/ /kun tu bzang po de la rnam lta kun kyang mthong / /rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ye shes
stobs la zhugs/ /ting 'dzin sa ni tshul rnams kun gyis rab tu mnan/ /chos rnams 'byams klas gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu zhugs/ /rang gi byang chub spyod pa sngon chad spyad pa ston/ /de ltar
zhing rnams kun tu bsam yas rnam 'phrul ba/ /phyogs rnams rgya che kun tu bkang ste rab tu bstan/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ /rgyal ba'i 'od zer sprin las yon
tan legs sgra 'byung / /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor yod pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la lta
zhing dbyangs kyi nga rog cig tu de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal ba thams cad chos las skyes pa ste/ /smon lam kun gyis sangs rgyas rab tu 'byung / /de bzhin nyid mnyam
nam mkha'i snying po ste/ /chos kyi sku yis rnam par rab tu mdzes/ /zhing rnams 'byams klas kun la bzhugs med kyang / /kun tu bzang po'i 'khor rnams kun na snang / /phyogs bcu
kun tu yon tan grags pas khyab/ /ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba mnga'/ /rgyal ba thams cad sku thob phyir spyod pa/ /phyogs bcu'i yon tan rgya mtsho yod pa rnams/ /rdul sbubs kun
tu de dag chud byas shing / /zhing rnams kun tu rnam par rab tu mdzes/ /zhing rnams kun gyi rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na/ /rgyal sras ting nge 'dzin dang spyad pa dang / /chos rnams kun la spyod
cing gnas pa rnams/ /rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par kun kyang snang / /chos kyi dbyings rnams lus kyis khyab byas shing / /zhing rnams 'byams klas kun la shin tu bzhugs/ /
sems can rgya mtsho'i don du de spyod cing / /rdul phran kun la chos kyi dbyings su zhugs/ /chos kyi dbyings la de ltar zhugs nas kyang / /rdul phran kun la mi zad tha mi dad/ /nam mkha'i
dbyings ni lus kyis gang byas shing / /rgyal ba'i chos rnams yangs pa rab tu ston/ /yon tan rgya mtsho 'od kun gzhal du med/ /rnam yangs stobs chen 'od zer yon tan sprin/ /'gro ba rgya
mtsho'i don du spyod byed cing / /rgyal ba'i spyod lam gzhal du med pa ston/ /gang gi don du bskal pa rgya mtsho dag /mtha' yas par ni bzang po'i spyod spyad pa/ /de dag chos kyi dbyings rnams
gang byas nas/ /thams cad chos kyi sprin las rab tu brjod/ /zhing rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / /stobs bcu rnams kyang ji ltar 'byung 'gyur dang / /sems can rgya mtsho ji ltar
'byung 'gyur ba/ /sems can rnams la sgra dbyangs gtong zhing ston/ /'khor rnams yangs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang / /kun tu gzang po khyod la mngon sum gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis
gnang bar gyur pa yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo de ring khyod kyis bskor/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par
'phrul pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ste/ le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad la rnam par bltas/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho la rnam par ltas/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/
sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ dus rgya
mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par 'byung ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la rnam par
bltas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad 'du zhing 'jig pa yongs su dag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las 'byung ba rgya mtsho mkhyen
pa ni| bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa'i ye shes ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dad pa dang / dbang
po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi skad cig gcig la dus thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa'i ye
shes ni| bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho yang dag par bstan pa'i ye shes ni/ bsam
gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par dgod
pa rab tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu bstan pa yongs su dag pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pas rnam par snang ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang
po yongs su dag pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mtha' yas pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa mdzad pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dpal rin po
che'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho rnam par rgyu ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu 'grub
pa ni| bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum yongs su bstan pas sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / 'dul ba
mdzad pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'dul ba rgya mtsho thams cad la brtson pa don yod pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu bzhugs pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug pa ni/ bsam gyis mi
khyab bo| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par
rgyu ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs la thub pa med pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi bsnyengs pa
zil gyis mi non pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la tha mi dad par spyod pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' ba chen po'i ye shes rnam par
dag pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'phrog pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i
yon tan rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad du de
bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rjes su bsab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dad pa rgya
mtsho tha dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams
cad kyi bsam pa rgya mtsho'i sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gzhom pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'byung ba'i lam rnam par sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems
dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
bzang pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho rnams de bas kyang shin tu dga' bar bya ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / mos pa'i tshul yangs pa

rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / snying po sgo kun dang ldan pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod par
bya ba dang / ye shes kyi mig dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang bar byed pa'i snying po shes rab chen po'i rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar
bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i gzungs kyi stobs yang dag par bskyed pa dang / snying po byang chub thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rab tu brjod
pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul snang ba'i 'od chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /yon tan rgya mtsho rnams kyi ye shes zab/ /mtha' dang dbus med des ni zhing rnams khyab/ /sems can bsam la sbyor ba ji bzhin snang / /
rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo'o/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rgya mtsho'i zhing yod pa/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor rgyal bas rnam sbyangs pas/ /sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /sems
can nang na rgyal ba rnam par mdzes/ /sems can rgya mtsho 'byung ba bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas yul la 'jug pa shin tu zab/ /srid pa'i gnas cad dad pa chung ba yis/ /sangs rgyas
byang chub shes par mi nus so/ /gzhan du gang rnams shin tu sems brtan cing / /dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag /sangs
rgyas ye shes 'di la rab tu 'jug /gang rnams sems dag g.yo med sgyu med cing / /snying rje'i bsam can khong nas byams dga' dang / dad pa che zhing rlabs chen de dag ni/ /'di dag
thos shing dga' ba thob par 'gyur/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam sa dag dang / /chos dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings su khyab pa la/ /gnas shing spyod pa rab tu sus spyod pa/ /de dag rgyal
ba'i spyod yul 'di shes so/ /gang gis rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul 'di mthong ba'i/ /byang chub sems dpas thob bya legs par thob/ /gzhan gyi yul gyis shes par mi nus te/ /'di ni kun
tu bzang pos rtogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs shing / /'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med 'di dag na/ /kun tu chos kyi 'khor lo rab 'khor ba/ /rnam par snang mdzad
yul dang mthu yin no/ /bdag gi lus su zhing rnams thams cad kyang / /rab tu zhugs shing de zhugs shing rnams kun/ /de dag spu rtse kun tu blta bar gyis/ /rgyal
ba'i spyod yul shin tu bshad par bya/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam spyod pa rnams/ /mtha' dang dbus med mngon par sgrub pa dang / /kun tu mig gi yul dang lus ldan pa/ /de dag mgon
po'i spyod yul 'di nyan to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bcu po 'di dag ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa
dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu rkyen shin tu bstan
pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pa shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs dang rnam pa shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag
par bya ba'i tshul shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal

ba'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa shin tu bstan pa'o/ /kye
rgyal ba'i sras dag /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya

mtsho thams cad ni/ rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phrag bcus byung ngo / /byung ngo / /'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi tshogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag
par sgrub pa'i chos nyid dang / sems can rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang / bsod nams kyi rtsa ba skal ba mthun pa bsags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
zhing yongs su dag pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pas rnam par bsgrubs pa'i smon lam gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dbang rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten las 'das pa dang rgyu mthun pas mngon
