'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rlung chags pa med pa'i ri rab ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dag 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gos dang / stegs bu'i rgyud ces bya ba yod de/ de
la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku shin tu snang ba ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/ de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho shing sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mig 'phrul lta bur shin
tu gnas pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sa rab tu gnon pa'i sgra'i lhun can mngon par byung ste/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi
kha dog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos chu'i 'od zer dpal
gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /bam po bcu gcig pa/ de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi
dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i shing gi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal kun tu ston
cing bsgribs pa med par rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi
khams bai DUR+Ya'i rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug zil gyis mi non pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis legs par spel ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i 'od kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rgyal
po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'khor lo brtan par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi sprul pa'i pad+mos brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/
de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing la yongs su 'du ba rab tu ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'od
ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa la rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho
spos dang nor bu'i nyi ma sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs yongs su gzhol bar rnam par dmigs pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de
dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud spyod pa kun nas rgyal ba'i gsung sgrog pa zhes bya ba rab tu
gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbyangs zab mo mu med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs tha dad pa mtha' dang dbus med pa zhes bya
ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho snying po dang ldan zhing shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs tha mi dad pa mtha' dang
dbus med pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongs su dag pa'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud
rgyan thams cad yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tsan+dan gyi dbyangs shin tu rnam par phye ba'i stegs bu'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de
la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgreng ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho spos kyi rgyal po'i 'od zer gyis shin tu bsgrubs pa

zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing gi stobs kun tu snang ba yongs su ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /spos chu'i rgya mtsho pad+mo'i dbang po mang po me tog shin tu rgyas
pa de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho dngul gyi pad+mo sna tshogs kyis bsgrubs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud yongs
su gsal bar kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho bai DAR+Ya'i spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin stug po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten
gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs su dbyangs sgrog pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho phyogs kun tu gzi brjid kyis rgyal ba'i phung po 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba
yod de| de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs rnam par phye bar 'phrul ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gser gyi rgyal mtshan nor bu'i rgyal
po'i dpal rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rdo rje'i rtse mo zhing gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho
tha dad pa med pa'i sprin 'bar ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par gnon pa'i gtsug ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags
su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i me tog zad mi shes pa shin tu rgyas pa'i dpal gyis gzi brjid ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'od mtha' yas pa rdul dang bral ba zhes
bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgya che zhing gser ltar yongs su dag pa/ grags pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud
gzhi tshon du bstan pa'i gnas zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mig yor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud las kyis
kun tu brgyan cing rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sgra dbyangs zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rab tu brgyus

pa la mngon du lta ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/ de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i
rgya mtsho 'od 'phro ba stug po'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad kyi 'od ces bya ba/ snying po byang chub thams cad kyi de
bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra'i lhun can rab tu gnas so/ /de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i mig sna tshogs zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs thams cad rnam par snang ba rdo rje'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo
rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog ut+pal dang dpal gyi be'u zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po
blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshams rdo rje ltar sra ba sna tshogs
zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi thog ma la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zil gyis mi non par
mngon par 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi mdzod shin tu bsags pa zhes bya ba de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i
rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od snang bas rnam par mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud grags pa dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs

chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che tshad med pa'i med pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bu rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya ba rab tu
gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dpal rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thogs pa med par kun tu snang
ba'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho shing tsan+dan gyi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i phyogs

su rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i rgyal po'i gram bu rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyal
mtshan gyi rtse mo la zhing gi 'khor rgyu ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/ de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'khor kun na rdo rje me tog gi 'byung gnas yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig
rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par phye ba bsam gyis mi khyab par ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nor bu'i yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i 'khor lo sna
tshogs kyi gzhi zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par rig pa chags pa med pas sangs rgyas lta ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i
rgya mtsho gzhi rin po che'i phreng bas bsags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud blo gros dge ba mtha' yas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba rab tu gnas
so| |de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mu tig sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / smon lam

gyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor
yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kun tu sgra sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid gzhan dang gzhan gyi sgor rab tu 'jug pa'i dbyangs kyi lhun can mngon par byung ngo / /de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba 'jig
rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bas gsol ba zhes bya ba bzhugs
so| |de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig

rten gyi khams pad+mo rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin
gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyis rnam par 'phags pa'i sems kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams stobs bcu'i rgyan ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par byung ba'i yon tan tshad med pa'i
rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams spos dang nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
gshegs pa blo gros rnam par yangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po ches mthun par rnam par brgyan pa de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od zer
gyi mdzod kyi ri bo 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nam mkha'i spyin yangs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos
chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan sna tshogs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi spyod yul zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dri ma med cing bsgribs pa med par rnam
par phye ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i pad+mo 'dab ma stug po rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
rgyud lus kyi rgyan dam pa'i mar me zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la
'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dra ba 'byung gnas zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho yang dag par bsgrubs pa shin tu mang ba zhes bya
ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che'i ze ba byin gyi rlabs kyi gnas zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho shin tu gtsang ba'i spyod pa
zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud lus dam pa rgya mtsho'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nor bu sna tshogs kyi phung po 'dzin
pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nam mkha' rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzi brjid dag cing
yangs pas rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud in+d+ra nI la'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ skar mda' ltar snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs
chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho yid du 'ong bar gram bu'i nor bu mu tig rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dbyangs kyis kun tu sgrog pa'i nga ro la dga'
ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/ de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams

na spos chu'i rgya mtsho in+d+ra nI la rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun tu snang zhing tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos
yang dag par 'byung bar nga ro sgrog pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba dam pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mchog gi blo gros dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams
sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par gnas pa'i rgyan ces bya ba
yod de| de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od lhag par 'phags pas rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi
mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams baiDUR+Yas bsgrubs pa kun nas 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na
'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi thog ma la 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor
gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa mi zad pa'i sprin gyi mnga' bdag ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /spos chu'i rgya mtsho sgra rdo rje ltar shin tu brtan
pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i shing thags kyis bskor ba/ shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud
rin po che'i rgyal mtshan shin tu 'greng ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la
'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang ba thams cad shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i sprin dam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba
yod do| de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gzhi rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i
shing gi ze ba'i kha dog gi rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dge ba'i tshogs kyi gzi brjid phal po che zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i
rgya mtsho rin po che'i gos dam pas shin tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i
rgya mtsho rin po che'i shing gi yal ga brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin la shin tu brten pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /

de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi yid du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chags pa med pa'i rdo rje kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /
de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho kun nas pad+mos brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho'i ngogs mtha' yas pa'i klong zhes bya ba rab tu gnas
so| |de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i yan lag dam pas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing gi gzhi rnam par dmigs
pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams
na spos chu'i rgya mtsho mi phyed par brtan pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ /de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi stobs la 'jug pa shin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams spos shin tu zhim pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/
de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dang sprul pa tshad med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de'i dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes
bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan dang tshul gyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tshad med pa'i tshangs
pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i phyogs me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/
de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i spyan 'od 'phro ba'i sprin ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi thog ma la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyangs zhes bya
ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chu'i lha 'od 'phro ba'i sgo zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /spos chu'i rgya mtsho lha'i grong khyer dang / nor bu'i shing thags kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba de dang 'dabs
chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho snang ba'i 'khor los rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brjod du med pa'i phyogs kyis gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba rab
tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i tshon gyi srang rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brgyud pa du mas 'jug pa zhes
bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan thams cad kyis kun tu gang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che rnam par snang ba
zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i dra ba rnam par phye ba kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud tshul
gyi mtshams sbyor ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan dam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud
'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa rgya mtsho'i sgra zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nyi ma'i gnas yongs su sbyong ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod
de| de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mig 'phrul gyis rgyas par 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sil snyan thams cad
kyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba brjod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud klong thams cad kyi gting du rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su
spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan dam pas bsgrubs pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'od dri ma med pa'i sprin stug po 'bar ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /
de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mar me 'od 'phro bas kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi dbyibs tha dad par byin
gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug
gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho phreng ba dang gos kyis shin tu bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kun nas snang ba'i gos bzang po shin tu sprul pa zhes
bya ba| sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi mtshan nyid shin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can mngon par byung ngo / /de thams cad kyi 'og na spos chu'i rgya mtsho
dbang po'i me tog ze ba 'khyil ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu grol bas dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i ye shes kyis pham pa med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i
steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba
gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'bru'i dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis
bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba tshad med pas dgyes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gdan pad+mo dang / seng+ge zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi
khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shugs dri ma med
cing mnyan na don yod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi rgyud kyi steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud klu'i rin po che'i kha dog gi 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor
ba| gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings yongs su gsal bar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ kye de ltar rgyal ba'i sras dag /spos chu'i

rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu
gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag thams cad kyang spos chu'i rgya mtsho de dag la nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par dmigs pa'i mig yor gyi rgyal
mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa dang ldan pa'i pad+mo la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go /'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can mang po dang mtshams 'dabs chags su
gnas pa sha stag go /'od rin po che gzhan dang gzhan gyi kha dog tu 'gyed pa sha stag go/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gzhan dang gzhan gyis kun nas yog pa sha stag go /rgyan rnam
par bres pa'i 'od gzhan dang gzhan can sha stag go /bskal pa'i grangs gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa sha stag go /sangs rgyas gzhan dang gzhan skye zhing gshegs pa sha stag go /chos
rgya mtsho'i sgra gzhan dang gzhan rab tu bsgrags pa sha stag go /sems can gyi lus gzhan dang gzhan gyis kun tu yog pa sha stag go /phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la 'jug pa ma 'dres
pa sha stag go /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs gzhan dang gzhan can sha stag go /'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re'i
'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams nas rab tu byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba rgyan sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
tshul du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang / snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'di thams cad yongs su gang ngo / /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rgyud nas byung
ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa mtshams dang / sgo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba sna tshogs
thams cad las byung ba kun gyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang / snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di thams cad yongs su gang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtha' dang / dbus med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa'i tshul shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid
gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'jig rten khams ni rgya mtsho rnams//
yangs dang mi yangs sna tshogs pa/ /nam mkha' dag gi dbyings la gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings ni tha mi dad/ /'jig rten khams 'di rgya mtsho na/ /zhing gi rgyud ni bsam mi khyab/ /tha
dad min par rnam par gnas/ /rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag go /rnam phye sna tshogs shin tu gnas/ /kha dog tha dad rab tu 'dug /zhing gi rgyud dag rnam phye ba/ /'jig rten khams

kyi gang chen mtsho/ /lhun dang dbyangs rnams tha dad de/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul ba/ /zhing gi rgyud rnams rab tu snang / /las kyis de dag shin tu bris/ /ri rab rgya mtsho'i dra ba dang / /'khor
lo klong gi dkyil 'khor dang / /pad+mo'i dbyibs 'dra 'byams klas pa/ /de dag de yis kun nas bskor/ /rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan brtsegs pa dang / /rdo rje kun nas 'khor gnas pa/ /'byams klas
bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /de dag rgyud ni kun nas bskor/ /'od kyi dra ba bsam mi khyab/ /mu tig mdog kyang rgya mtsho ste/ /zhing gi rgyu rnams kun kyang 'bar/ /pad+mo la yang kun gnas so/ /re
re dag gi rgyud las kyang / /'od zer dra ba bsam mi khyab/ /'od zer dag gi zhing gyur cing / /rgya mtsho phyogs rnams kun tu 'gengs/ /zhing gi rgyud rnams thams cad kyis/ /dmigs pa kun gyi sgo
nas kyang / /thams cad tshul la 'jug pa yis/ /mi zad tshul rnams rab tu snang / /zhing gi rnams ni bsam mi khyab/ /rgyud rnams mi zad shin tu 'byung / /rgyan rnams bstan pa tha dad de/ /drang
srong chen po'i byin rlabs so/ /zhing gi rgyud rnams de dag na/ /'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab khams/ /kun nas 'du zhing rnam par 'jig /'byung zhing 'jig par de bzhin 'gyur/ /ji ltar shing la lo
ma rnams/ /'byung zhing ltung bar 'gyur ba ltar/ /de bzhin zhing gi rgyud rnams na/ /'jig rten khams rnams 'byung ba yin/ /ji ltar shing gi skye gnas nas/ /shing tog sna tshogs 'byung ba ltar/ /
de bzhin zhing gi rgyud rnams na/ /sems can sna tshogs 'byung ba yin/ /ji ltar sa bon khyad par gyis/ /'bras bu sna tshogs snang ba ltar/ /de bzhin las kyi khyad par gyis/ /sems can rnams dang
zhing byung ngo / /yid bzhin rin chen rgyal po rnams/ /kha dog kun tu snang ba ltar/ /sems can bsam pa rnam dag pas/ /de bzhin zhing rnams rab tu snang / /klu yi rgyal po'i sprin gyi rnams/ /nam
mkha'i dbyings la ston pa ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas smon lam gyis/ /zhing gi rnams ni 'byung ba yin/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan po sngags dag gis/ /sgo rnams sna tshogs ston pa ltar/ /de bzhin
sems can las rnams kyis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab zhing 'byung ngo / /ji ltar ri mo'i gzugs kyi rnams/ /ri mo'i las kyis bris pa ltar/ /de bzhin zhing rnams
'di dag kun/ /sems kyis ri mor bris pa yin/ /sems can lus kyis rnam par dag /ji ltar sems kyis brtags pa ltar/ /de bzhin du ni zhing gi mtshams/ /thams cad las kyis rnam
par bris/ /ji ltar gzhan dang gzhan gzugs su/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bzhin/ /mgon po rnams ni snang ba ltar/ /de bzhin zhing rnams snang ba'o/ /pad+mo'i dra ba'i phyi rol gyis/ /
sems can zhing gi mtshams dag na/ /dbyibs dang kha dog gzhan dang gzhan/ /dri ma med pa sna tshogs snang / /pad+mo'i dra ba de dag la/ /zhing gi dra ba rab tu gnas/ /rgyan dang bstan pa sna
tshogs te/ /sems can sna tshogs mang po'i gnas/ /zhing gi dbyings rnams la la ni/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam par gnas/ /sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs las/ /chos nyid
de dag nang na snang / /kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag tu/ /zhing gi rgyud ni bsam mi khyab/ /sems can bsam pas rab tu byung / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang 'khod/ /la la rnam
dag nyon mongs can/ /zhing gi dbyings ni rnam par mang / /byang chub sems dpas rnam par sprul/ /rgya mtsho'i las las byung ba yin/ /zhing rnams la la'i 'od btang ba/ /rin chen rang
bzhin dri ma med/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dri med dag /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su sbyangs/ /zhing gi rgyud rnams la la na/ /bskal pa'i me ni bsam mi khyab/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnams
la ston| |zhing gi dkyil 'khor shin tu sra/ /klung gi phung po smon lam dang / /chu yi phung la rab tu gnas/ /zhing gi rnam pa shin tu mang / /sems can las kyis bsags pa yin/ /zhing na
gzhan dang gzhan dag gi /zhing gi chos nyid snang la ltos/ /de dag 'byung ba gang yang med/ /de dag la ni 'jig pa'ang med/ /skad cig skad cig sems kun la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin
rlabs kyis/ /zhing rnams rab tu 'byung ba rnams/ /shin tu dri med dag la ltos/ /zhing rnams la la sa yi dngos/ /sra bar de dag byung gyur cing / /snang ba med cing 'od kyang med/ /sdig pa'i las
kyi gnas yin no/ /zhing rnams la la rdo rje'i dngos/ /kun nas nyon mongs 'jigs pa che/ /bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal mang / /bsod nams chung ba'i gnas kyang yin/ /zhing rnams la la lcags
kyi dngos/ /la la zangs kyi dngos su gnas/ /sdig pa'i las kyis kun na gang / /ri dang brag gis mnyam pa med/ /'jig rten de na dmyal ba yi/ /sems can sdug bsngal skyabs med pa/ /mun pa
rjes su rnyed gyur cing / /me lce rgya mtsho'i nang na 'bar/ /'on kyang byol song skye gnas su/ /lus ni mngon par 'byung 'gyur te/ /bdag gi las kyi nyes pa yis/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba rab tu myong / /
gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams na'ang snang / /skom dang bkres pas rab tu mnar/ /me yi ri yis gdungs pa yis/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba'ang myong bar 'gyur/ /la
la rin chen bdun las byung / /la la sna tshogs gzugs su gnas/ /dge ba'i las kyis byung ba ste/ /sna tshogs khyim gyis rab tu brgyan/ /mi dang lha rnams la la ni/ /mtho ris dag gi
'jig rten na/ /dge ba'i bsod nams 'bras bur ldan/ /dga' bde myong ba de dag ltos/ /spu yi rtse mo gcig la yang / /zhing rnams bye ba bsam mi khyab/ /sna tshogs dbyibs kyang tha
dad de| |de dag 'dres pa gang yang med/ /rang rang so so'i las kyis na/ /sems can khams rnams bsam mi khyab/ /'du shes sna tshogs 'dzin pa rnams/ /bde dang sdug bsngal
nyams su myong / /zhing rnams la la mtha' yas 'od/ /sems can mang don kun nas gnas/ /yongs byung rdo rje ut+pal/ /sna tshogs rnam dag dri ma med/ /zhing rnams la la 'od
zer dngos/ /'od kyi 'khor la kun nas gnas/ /tsan+dan gser las yongs su byung / /'od 'phro sprin gyi mdog dang mnyam/ /zhing rnams la la nyi zla'i dngos/ /spos kyi gos kyis
kun nas g.yogs/ /la la pad+mo gcig la ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rgyas/ /la la mtshan gyi mdog dang 'od/ /zhing rnams rin chen dri ma med/ /mig 'phrul 'od
kyang rab tu 'gyed/ /'od zer dra bas snang bar byas/ /zhing rnams la la rdo rje dang / /pad+mo'i dngos su spos la gnas/ /la la nor bu'i 'od kyang yin/ /zhing rnams yongs su dag la ltos/ /me tog
klong las la la byung / /bsam gyis mi khyab zhing la ltos/ /sangs rgyas sprul pas kun tu khyab/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dang mnyam/ /la la me tog shing rnams dang / /lo ma'i dkyil
'khor sna tshogs te/ /nor bu'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab/ /zhing gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag /zhing rnams la la pad+mo'i dngos/ /snang ba bzang pos rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas sprul
pa'i gsung yang yin/ /zhing gi dra ba bsam mi khyab/ /rin chen cod pan sna tshogs dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan rnams dang / /gdan las de bzhin la la byung / /'od dang
sprul pa'ang rab tu 'gyed/ /tsan+dan phye ma sna tshogs dang / /mdzod spu rnam par snang ba'i 'od/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'od zer rnams/ /zhing rnams 'byung ba rab tu brjod/ /la la rgyan dang
'od gcig par/ /zhing rnams dri ma med par snang / /la la rkyen rnams thams cad kyis/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu brgyan/ /la la zhing rnams bcu dag gi /rgyan gyis mngon par rab tu
brgyan| |la la zhing rnams stong dag kyang / /rnam par brgyan cing rab tu gnas/ /zhing gi rgyan mang bye ba yis/ /zhing rnams la la rnam par bris/ /rgyan dang tshul rnams tha dad par/ /sna tshogs
mig yor lta bur snang / /brjod du med pa'i zhing gi rnams/ /rgyan gcig la yang rab tu snang / /'od ni gzhan dang gzhan bkye ba/ /sangs rgyas smon lam mthu
las byung / /smon lam rgya mtsho rnam mang bas/ /zhing rnams la la rnam par sbyangs/ /de dag rgyan mang thams cad du/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho shin tu snang / /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis//
zhing rnams yongs su gang sbyangs pa/ /de dag kun la dus gsum gyi/ /zhing gi rgyan rnams kun kyang snang / /zhing gi rgyud kyi rnam sprul pa/ /kye ma rgyal sras khyed ni ltos/ /ma 'ongs pa yi zhing
rnams kyang / /rmi lam bzhin du de dag snang / /ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/ /'das pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho yang / /zhing gcig nang na thams cad snang / /mig yor bzhin du
sprul pa yin/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rnam sprul zhing rnams gang yod pa/ /zhing gi rgyud ni 'di la snang / /kun kyang nang na yod par gnas/ /zhing gi rdul gyi rtsa
mo la| |sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pa/ /shong bar de dag kun na snang / /mig yor mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /la la rgya mtsho'i dbyings su 'dug /zhing brgya mang po de dag ltos//
ri rab ri yi dbyibs 'dra dang / /'jig rten khams ni bsam mi khyab/ /zhing rnams la la rnam par bris/ /mig yor dbyibs su gnas pa ste/ /sna tshogs shing gi dbyibs
su gnas/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang kun tu khyab/ /zhing rnams nor bu'i 'khor lo'i dbyibs/ /la la pad+mo'i dbyibs su gnas/ /yan lag brgyad pa sna tshogs mang / /sna tshogs kha dog dri ma
med| |la la khri yi dbyibs lta bu/ /gra yi dbyibs dang khyad khyud de/ /la la grong khyer dbyibs su 'dug/ tshangs pa'i lus su rab tu gnas/ /lha yi dbang po'i gtsug phud dbyibs/ /zla
ba kham ltar la la gnas/ /nor bu'i ri yi dbyibs su 'khod/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbyibs kyang 'dra/ /spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i klong lta bur/ /'jig rten khams rnams rab tu gnas//
'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbyibs 'dra ba/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis sbyangs/ /'khor lo bkra shis dbyibs lta bu/ /'jig rten la la dkyil 'khor te/ /mdzod spu'i spyi gtsug dbyibs
lta bu| |la la mig gi tshul yang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas phyag gi dbyibs lta bu/ /la la rdo rje'i dbyibs su 'dug /'od 'phro ri yi dbyibs kyang 'dra/ /byang chub sems dpas kun tu gang / /zhing
rnams la la seng+ge'i dbyibs/ /nor bu'i go char mngon bsgrubs pa/ /gzugs dang dbyibs ni du ma ste/ /gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas/ /zhing gi rgyud ni gcig la yang / /zhing gi
dbyibs rnams mi zad pa/ /rab tu gnas pa byin rlabs dang / /sangs rgyas smon lam rnams kyis byung / /zhing rnams la la bskal pa tsam/ /la la bskal pa bcu pa ste/ /zhing rnams la la rdul
mnyam pa'i/ /bskal pa bye bar brjod pa yin/ /la la bskal pa gcig la yang / /zhing rnams mang po 'byung bar snang / /tshad med grangs kyang med pa yi/ /'jig
pa de bzhin bsam mi khyab/ /zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas med/ /zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas bcas/ /la la'i zhing na sangs rgyas gcig /la la sangs rgyas mang po'o/ /sangs rgyas
med pa'i zhing rnams dang / /'jig rten gzhan gyi khams su yang / /sangs rgyas sprul pa gshegs mdzad cing / /rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/ /'pho dang 'byung dang sku tshe dang / /byang
chub mngon par 'tshang rgya dang / /bdud kyi sde dag 'dul ba dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ston/ /sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/ /gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun kyang ston/ /chos
kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ /'jig rten kun na tha mi dad/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams re re yang / /rgyal ba gcig ni skyed 'gyur te/ /lo grangs bye ba phrag stong du/ /chos kyi dam pa rab tu ston//
sems can snod du ma gyur la/ /sangs rgyas ston pa mi mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bsam dang ldan pas ni/ /de nyid gcig kyang kun tu mthong / /sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing gi rnams/ /zhing rnams
re re dag tu yang / /sangs rgyas bye ba bsam mi khyab/ /rgyal ba rnams ni rab tu skye/ /rgyal ba so so de dag na/ /sprul pa mang po rab 'gyed cing / /chos kyi dbyings ni khyab mdzad nas/ /sems
can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad/ /zhing rnams la la 'od med de/ /mun pa 'jigs pa shin tu che/ /reg na sdug bsngal spu gri 'dra/ /blta na mi bzad skyi yang g.ya'/ /zhing rnams la la lha 'od can//

la la khyim gyi 'od can te/ /la la nyi zla'i 'od dang ldan/ /zhing gi dra ba bsam mi khyab/ /zhing rnams la la rang gi 'od/ /shing gi 'od can dri ma med/ /gang du sdug bsngal mi mthong ba/ /de dag sems
can dag las byung / /la la ri yi 'od can te/ /zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od/ /la la mar me'i 'od can te/ /sems can rnams kyi las kyis byung / /zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas 'od/ /
byang chub sems dpas kun tu gang / /zhing rnams la la pad+mo'i 'od/ /'od 'phro 'od can rab tu mdzes/ /zhing rnams la la me tog 'od/ /spos chu'i 'od dang ldan pa'ang yod/ /spos
dang gdug pa'i 'od 'phro can/ /smon lam dbang gis rnam par sbyangs/ /zhing rnams la la sprin 'od can/ /nor bu'i go cha'i 'od kyis gsal/ /sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs kyis snang / /
yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs ldan/ /rin chen cod pan 'od dang ldan/ /rdo rje gser gyi 'od kyis snang / /yongs su dag pa'i sgra dbyangs can/ /de dag na ni sdug bsngal med/ /thams cad rgyan
gyi 'od can dang / /zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od/ /la la snying po byang chub 'od/ /'khor rnams kun tu rab tu snang / /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i snang ba can/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis mngon
par yog /kun tu 'od kyis rab tu snang / /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ /zhing rnams la la 'jigs sgra can/ /mi bzad 'jigs pa'i nga ro
can| |rtsub cing brlang ba'i sgra rnams dang / /yid myong 'jigs pa chen po sgrog /dmyal ba byol song skye gnas dang / /gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal rnams/ /mya ngan rgya
mtsho'i zhing gi rnams/ /nyon mongs ldan pa'i sgra yang 'byung / /la la dag na yid 'ong sgra/ /dga' bar byed cing ston 'doms pa/ /dge ba'i las dang 'bras bu'i dbyangs/ /zhing
gi 'khor na rab tu sgrog /la la brgya byin lha dbang dbyangs/ /gzhan dag tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs te/ /'jig rten kun gyi dbyangs su yang / /la la'i zhing na rab tu grags/ /zhing
rnams la la sprin gyi sgra/ /rin chen rgya mtsho'i 'od zer dang / /nor bu'i shing gi gzugs sgra dang / /rol mo'i sgra yis kun tu khyab/ /'od zer glong gi sgra rnams dang / /sangs
rgyas sprul pa mi zad dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dag dang / /'od zer sgra ni snyan pa 'byung / /chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams dang / /kha cig zhing na bsam yas pa'i/ /smon
lam rgya mtsho'i nga ro dang / /spyod pa'i sgra yang snyan pa 'byung / /dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang / /de dag zhing rnams 'byung ba'i
sgra| |zad pa med pa'i dbyangs su sgrog /sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs sgra dang / /tshad med sa dang pha rol phyin/ /chos kyi rang bzhin sgra dag kyang / /kha cig zhing na rab tu grag /kun tu
bzang po smon lam gyi/ /sgra ni zhing rnams bye ba 'byin/ /bskal bar gnas shing rab tu sgrog /sgra dbyangs 'byin pa zad mi shes/ /zhing gi dbyings rnams la la na/ /sangs rgyas rnam
par sprul pa yi/ /sgra yis chos kyi dbyings bkang ba/ /de dag kun na rab tu grags/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
rgyud rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u dgu pa'o// //bam po bcu gnyis pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de bas kyang pha snga'i dus de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbus su 'jig
rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de ni/ rin po che'i pad+mo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rnam par dag cing kun
nas nyon mongs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gzhi rgyan mtha' yas pas brgyan
pa| rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi khor yug brgya phrag gsum gyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ ri
rab dang / grong khyer dang / khang khyim dri ma med cing 'od rnam par snang bas brgyan pa/ zas dang / skom dang / gos kyi longs spyod yid kyis bsam pas 'byung ba/ rgyan gyi rnam
pa brjod pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de'i dbus na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las me tog gi ri
rab me tog 'od 'phro ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rin po che'i khri 'phang bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor cing brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ ri rab de'i steng na nags tshal chen po yal ga'i
dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba spos kyi rgyal mtshan stong phrag dpag tu med pa shin tu bsgreng ba'i rgyan can me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa/ dpag
tu med pa'i phreng ba rnam par bres pa/ nor bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkod pa/ rin po che'i rdo rje'i rgyan mtshan dpag tu med pas kun nas brgyan pa/
rin po che'i me tog puN+Da rI ka dpag tu med pa'i phreng gis kun nas bskor ba/ spos dang rin po che'i pad+mo mang po dpag tu med pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/
rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun nas rgyas pa/ spos dang bdug pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun nas snang bar byas pa/
grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu sems can sna tshogs snang bas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar nags tshal chen po'i yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po
che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i shar phyogs logs na grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba zhes bya ba/ mi'i rgyal po'i gnas grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor
gyis bskor ba/ rin po che'i 'ba' zhig las byas pa/ mchu dang zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag bdun yod pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing thags dang phru ma'i ra ba
bdun gyis brgyan cing kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i 'obs spos chus gang ba/ rin po che'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / me tog puN+Da rI kas
rnam par brgyan pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ shing ta la'i 'phreng ba rgyan sna tshogs kyi tshogs mang po 'byin pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan dang / khang pa
brtsegs pas rab tu brgyan pa/ steng nas gser gyi dra ba dang / dril bu'i dra ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba'i dra ba dang / in+d+ra nI la'i dra ba dang / rdo rje'i pad+mo'i dra bas
kun nas yog pa/ rin po che'i shing drung me tog gi dra ba dang / rol mo'i sgra mang po thams cad kyi sprin yid du 'ong bas kun tu khyab pa/ spos dang
phreng ba rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yod de/ de'i 'khor kun na sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu yod de/ sgo de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis
byas pa ste/ sgo de dag re re'i mdun yang rin po che'i rdo'i rgyal mtshan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bdun bdun gyis brgyan pa'o/ /bza' shing gi ra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya
stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas bskor ba ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba de dag thams cad kyang spos dang rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kun nas spos kyi dri kun tu 'byung ba/ bya sna tshogs
thams cad yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o/ /grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i sprin ces bya ba der mir skyes pa thams cad kyang las kyi rnam par smin pas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dag
ste| nam mkha' las rgyu ba/ mi dang lha mnyam du spyod pa/ yid bzhin gyi yul la longs spyod pa sha stag go /de nas lho phyogs logs na lha'i grong khyer shing gi me
tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod do/ /de nas lho phyogs logs na klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba yod do/ /de nas lho phyogs logs na gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo
rje'i dpal sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod do/ /de nas lho phyogs logs na dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med khang bzang po zhes bya ba yod do/ /de dang 'dabs chags su
lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i tshon ces bya ba yod do/ /de dang 'dabs chags su 'dab ma bzang po'i grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba zhes bya ba yod do/ /de
dang 'dabs chags su bram ze'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor
ba'o| |grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang rgyan mang po du mas brgyan pa nas grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i bar du ste/ nags tshal chen po yal ga'i
dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i dbus na snying po byang chub rin po che'i me tog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi shing yal ga stug cing rgya
che ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i me tog gzugs dang dbyibs rnam pa tha dad pa mang po shin tu rgyas pa/ spos dang / me mar rin po che thams
cad kyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i phreng ba mang po rgya chen po'i sprin kun tu bkres pa/ rin po che'i 'od thur tu 'phro bas zhing kun tu khyab pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i
sprin gyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu 'od zer mang pos rnam par snang bar byas pa/ rgyan thams cad rin po che sna tshogs mang pos spras pa/ rol mo thams
cad kyi sgra dbyangs shin tu 'byung ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'byung ba/ phyogs bcur me tog sna tshogs mang po rab tu 'byung ba yod
de| de'i mdun du pad+mo chen po me tog gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ rgyar dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya yod pa/ rtsa ba spos dang / rin po che dang / rdo rje'i rgya
mtsho la zug pa/ chu ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyis rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa/ rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa'i 'dab ma can/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba dang /
spos kyi ze ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ snying po la rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i tshon bkye ba/ pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ phyogs bcur 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rab tu 'gyed pa/ ze ba thams cad las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba mngon par byung ngo / /'jig
rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de
dag las bskal pa'i thog ma pa thams cad kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ yon tan
thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dbyangs zhes bya ste/ des 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'di yongs su sbyangs so/ /kye rgyal
ba'i sras dag /'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der lo brgyan de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i tshe nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin
po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur te/ 'di ltar rin po che'i 'od 'phro'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu gtong ba'i snying po can du
gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra yang rab tu 'byin/ phyogs bcu dag kyang 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byed/ gzhal med khang dang / khang
khyim gyi rdul thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byed/ rin po che'i me tog dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin yang rab tu 'gyed/ sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
yangs pa'i sgra dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab tu gtong ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam
dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba mngon par sgrub pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs rab tu bsgrags
pa'i sgra dag kyang rab tu 'byin to/ /de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i ltas te/ rgyan de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar
'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams kyis khong du chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa las mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa dang / sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa dang / snying po
byang chub tu mngon par gzhol ba de dag thams cad kyang ltas sngon du byung bas yang dag par bskul to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi
ri bo ri rab kyi dpal zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa'i sku can/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yongs su skye ba rab tu 'phros pa/ sku snying
po byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa/ gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pa/ rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'phags shing zil
gyis gnon pa/ mtshan rin po che'i me tog thams cad shin tu rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad la
mngon du ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis khyab
par mdzad pa/ 'od zer gyi dra ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu gtong ba de/ pad+mo chen po de la mngon par byung bar gyur to/ /ji ltar spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa'i 'od la rab
tu gnas pa'i ri rab me tog gi 'od 'phro bas brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gser shin tu 'bar ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rtse mo la nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me
tog rgyas par sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra kun tu yang ri rab bye ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi rtse mo la bzhugs par kun nas
snang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun tu tshul rgya che ba kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas
pa dag gi gling bzhi pa thams cad na'ang snying po byang chub la bzhugs par snang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi
sprin gyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su skyed pa zhes bya ba 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba
rab tu bkye ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mdzad nas 'dul ba thams cad yang dag par bskul to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis 'od zer de dag bkye ma thag tu de'i mod la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang rab
tu zhi bar gyur/ sgrib pa'i dra ba thams cad kyang shin tu bsal/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par bcom/ sems can thams cad kyi rnyog
pa yang rnam par dag /dge ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu byung / mos pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yongs su dag /mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i
g.yang sa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par bsal/ lus dang sems kyi gnod pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi/ sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs kyang
rnam par dag /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhol ba yang shin tu thob par gyur te/ de dag 'od zer des yang dag par bskul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams
cad 'khor brgya stong du ma dag gis bskor cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'dong bar gyur to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i 'od ces
bya ba der rgyal po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i bdag po byung ste/ de la bud med bsod nams kyi dpal
la sogs pa stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun yod do/ /de la bu gzi brjid chen po la sogs pa lnga brgya yod do/ /rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid chen po la yang bud med blta na bzang ba la
sogs pa stong phrag bcu yod do/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rgyus chos bcu khong du chud par
gyur to| |bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings
la sgo kun nas rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ tshul yangs pa'i sprin gyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khong du chud do/ /
'di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ sgra'i sprin gyis kun nas rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje
chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pas yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i dga' ba chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ji lta
ba bzhin du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ tshul gyi gzhi rgya chen po rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mngon par
shes pa chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ mos pa rgya mtsho'i stobs dang shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i smon lam gyi tshul gyi sgo chen po khong du chud do/ /
'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi 'od la yang dag par gzhol ba'i shugs zhes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes chen po'i sgo khong du chud do/ /
de nas rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba de/ chos kyi snang ba chen po thob nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad
de smras pa/ nyi ma mang po stong gi rnams/ /mkha' la mngon par 'phags pa bzhin/ /snying po byang chub dri med la/ /sangs rgyas 'od ni shin tu snang / /bskal pa bye ba stong
dag gis/ /mgon po 'jig rten byung ba ni/ /sangs rgyas yang dag skyes pa rnams/ /rgyal ba kun ni rab tu snang / /ltos shig sangs rgyas 'od zer la/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni
bsam mi khyab/ /gnas rnams kun na kun kyang snang / /de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par bzhag /'od 'phro'i sprin rnams rab bkye ba/ /'od zer sprin la zad mi shes/ /'jig
rten 'di dag snang bar byed/ /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dag las/ /'od zer rnams ni dri med pa/ /sems can kun dang mnyam pa'i lus//
phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rgyas 'gengs ltos/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni yid 'ong ba/ /'gro ba kun tu rab tu bsgrags/ /'gro kun dbyangs kyi yan lag tu/ /sangs rgyas yon tan
rnam par brjod/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyis phog pa yis/ /sems can kun kyang bde bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi/ /'gro ba kun kyang dga' ba skyes/ /byang chub
sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams/ /rin chen sprin rnams rab 'gyed cing / /bstod pa'i sprin gyis rgyal ba'i drung / /phyogs bcu kun nas mngon par 'ongs/ /snying po byang chub 'di la
yang / /sgra yi rgya mtsho zab mo grags/ /sems can thams cad sdug bsngal zhi/ /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos/ /kun kyang sri zhu ldan gyur te/ /dga' zhing shin tu mos byas
shing / /chos kyi rgyal po blta ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten mgon gyi drung du 'dong / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod pa'i
tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra thams cad kyi sems can gyi gnas kun tu shin tu grags par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po blta na dga'
ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/ rang gi 'khor de dag la tshigs su bcad de
smras pa| zhang blon rnams dang gzhon nu dang / /rgyal po'i mi dang blon po dang / /tshong pa rnams dang de bzhin du/ /yul mi rnams kyang kun 'dus shig /grong khyer rnams ni
kun tu yang / /rnga sgra dag gis myur du sgrogs/ /kun kyang mthun par lhan cig tu/ /rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir dengs shig /srang rnams thams cad kun tu yang / /dge ba'i
dril gyi sgra sgrogs shig /bu dang chung ma 'khor bcas pa/ /rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir yang 'deng / /grong khyer rnams kyang brgyan par gyis/ /rgyan rnams kun dang bla re bres/ /
rgyal mtshan dam pa bzang po'i rnams/ /nor bu sna tshogs brgyan pa sgreng / /rin chen dra ba'i bla re rnams/ /nam mkha'i dkyil du bres par gyis/ /nam mkha' 'di las
thams cad du/ /sil snyan sprin gyi sgra dag phyung / /lam gyi srang yang brgyan par gyis/ /rin chen char yang kun tu phob/ /bzhon pa rin chen bstad par gyis/ /rgyal ba
blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /rang rang so so'i 'khor rnams kyis/ /sna tshogs sprin gyi char phob cig /rgyan gyi sprin rnams thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyang dgab
par gyis/ /spos dang pad+mo'i 'od kyi sprin/ /me tog gdugs rnams bsam yas dang / /se mo do dang phreng sprin rnams/ /gos kyi sprin gyi char phob cig /ri rab rnams dang spos
kyi ri| |nor bu'i 'khor los brgyan par gyis/ /dri med tsan+dan phye ma rnams/ /nam mkha'i dkyil la rab tu ston/ /nor bu'i phreng dang me tog phreng / /rin chen phreng ba dri med dang / /
rin chen sgron ma'i phreng ba rnams/ /nam mkha'i dbyings la sgrub par gyis/ /thams cad sangs rgyas mngon gyis la/ /dga' zhing spro ba'i sems bskyed de/ /bu dang 'khor du
bcas pa rnams/ /rgyal ba blta phyir kun 'dong ngo / /de nas rgyal bu blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po bsod nams dpal la sogs pa bud med stong phrag sum cu
rtsa bdun dang / gzi brjid chen po la sogs pa gzhon nu lnga brgya dang / blo gros kyi stobs la sogs pa blon po stong phrag drug cu dang / de dag la sogs pa 'khor bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba nas byung nas sde'i 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha'i dbyings su mngon par
'phags te/ rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos nam mkha' thams cad rgyan gyi sprin thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
der dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /lha'i grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba
nas kyang lha'i dbang po rab mtshe ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa nas kyang klu'i rgyal po bcu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba klu bye ba nyi shu rtsa lnga dang
lhan cig /gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba nas kyang gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dpa' bas rgyal ba zhes bya ba gnod sbyin bye ba bdun cu rtsa bdun
dang lhan cig /dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med khang bzang po nas kyang dri za'i rgyal po blta na dga' ba zhes bya ba dri za bye ba dgu bcu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig /lha ma yin gyi grong
khyer 'khor lo'i tshon nas kyang lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzugs rnam par dag pa las sems dpa' zhes bya ba lha ma yin bye ba stong phrag lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor ba /
nam mkha' lding gi grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba nas kyang nam mkha' lding gi bdag po stobs bcu spyod pa zhes bya ba nam mkha' lding gi 'khor dgu bcu
rtsa dgu dang lhan cig /mi 'am ci'i grong khyer rtse ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa nas kyang mi 'am ci'i dbang po rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba mi 'am ci bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang lhan cig /lto
'phye chen po'i grong khyer rin po che rdo rje sra ba'i rgyal mtshan nas kyang lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rin po che grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya
stong phrag gsum dang lhan cig /tshangs pa'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs nas kyang tshangs pa'i dbang po gzhan gyis pham pa med pa zhes bya ba tshangs pa bye ba phrag bco
brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der dong nas bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do/ /de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grong khyer gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag nas
sems can gyi ris tha dad pa na gnas pa'i rgyal po mang po 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig tu
'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyis sems can de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho der dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i mdo'i 'khor
'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang bcas ba bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la yongs su bstan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid
chen pos chos kyi gzhung 'di bstan pa thos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyis sngon yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i
chos rgya mtsho la chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /
'di lta ste/ thog ma chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs
rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i mig rnam par dag pa la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang zhing
rnam par dbye ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ yon tan chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug
pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ sgo yangs pa nas snang ba zab mo yang dag par 'byung ba rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /
'di lta ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs chen po'i shugs kyi snying po dang / mthu chen po'i rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang
dbus med par sprul pas brgyan cing 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshad med par rab tu 'jug pa
la mngon par sgrub pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs shing mos pa rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rgyan yang dag par sgrub pa
rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'gro ba
thams cad mngon du bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang mi 'jigs pa
thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyi sngon gyi
sbyor ba rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal ba'i chos nyid
'di thos nas/ /bdag gi ye shes snang ba skyes/ /des ni sangs rgyas sngon spyod pa/ /rgya mtsho rnams kyang rab tu mthong / /sku tshe kun tu ji lta bur/ /phun sum tshogs gyur kun kyang
mthong / /mtshan gyi rnam pa rnam dmigs dang / /gang gis sangs rgyas mchod pa'ang shes/ /sngon chad sangs rgyas drung dag tu/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod spyad de/ /sangs rgyas
rgya mtsho mang mchod nas/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs/ /sku yi rgya mtsho mang po dag /rgyal chen yongs su kun btang zhing / /spyod pa'i dam pa rab spyad de/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing
yang shin tu sbyangs/ /snyan dang shangs mang rgya mtsho dang / /phyag zhabs dbu yang de bzhin te/ /rgyal srid btsun mo'i 'khor btang zhing / /zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs/ /
zhing rnams so so re re la/ /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /byang chub spyod pa rab spyad de/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi/ /spyod pa
rgya mtsho kun spyad nas/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun drung du/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba bzhin/ /sangs
rgyas ye shes 'od snang pas/ /sngon gyi spyod pa rnams kyang mthong / /byang chub 'tshang rgya zhi ba yi/ /chos kyi dbyings ni kun gang ba'i/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho dag pa'i rnams/ /dri med 'od
can kun kyang mthong / /sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs kyis/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho yangs pa'i rnams/ /de ltar bdag gis spyad par bya/ /kye rgyal ba'i
sras dag /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyi sprin de mthong ba
dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon par khong du chud de/ 'jig rten thams cad ni/ snang bar byed/ sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho ni/ rab
tu rjod| byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul ni/ rab tu sgrog /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i tshul ni/ shin tu rjod/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la
yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyi sgo yongs su sbyang ba ni/ shin tu ston/ snying po byang chub thams cad la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni/ rab tu rjod/ sangs
rgyas kyi stobs dang / mi bsnyengs pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa ni/ shin tu rjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs shing mthong ba ni/ rab tu
rjod| sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni/ shin tu ston/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i
rgyan ni| rab tu ston/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam ni/ mngon par sgrub pa byed cing / sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed byang chub tu sems bskyed de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'ang yongs su 'dzin du btsud do/ /de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ sems can kun la
phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub don du khyod zhugs pa/ /gzi brjid chen po legs so legs/ /bsod nams snying po grags pa che/ /snang ba khyod kyis rab tu non/ /chos kyi
dbyings ni khyab byas shing / /bsod nams chen po sprin ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtshor 'gyur/ /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /zhing gcig na yang spyod spyad cing / /
nga yi ye shes ji lta bur/ /khyod kyis mthong ba de ltar 'gyur/ /tshul 'di kun nas shes par ni/ /brtson 'grus chung ngus mi nus te/ /brtson 'grus stobs chen ldan pa'i
rnams| |rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dag par byed/ /thams cad rdul la 'jug tshul du/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor su spyod pa/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rgyan gyi rnams/ /de la 'di 'drar rab tu
'gyur| |sems can rnams ni re re'i phyir/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad spyod cing / /'khor kyang skyo ba med pa'i rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ /bskal pa phyi ma'i
mthar thug pas/ /rgyal ba re rer mchod byed kyang / /gang gi sems la skyo med pa/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /dus gsum gshegs pa'i mgon po kun/ /khyod kyi
smon lam dbang gis gsal/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams na/ /khyod kyi lus kyang rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam dag /mtha' dang dbus med rgya mtsho la/ /blo
chen gang rnams 'jug pa ni/ /de dag tshul 'dir gnas par 'gyur/ /nga la mchod pa byas pas kyang / /gzi brjid chen po'i stobs chen gyis/ /sems can ri rab rdul mnyam
pa| |byang chub yongs su smin par byas/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag /kun tu bzang po dpa' ba'i rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing / /zhing gi rgya mtsho
dag par byed/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la bskal pa rgya chen po rig pa zhes bya ba de la bskal pa bar ma chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed cig byung ste/ de'i dus na mi rnams kyi tshe
yang bskal pa bar ma gnyis thub par gyur te/ rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin
de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni/ lo bye ba phrag lnga bcur gyur to/ /de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya
ba 'jig rten du nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid la byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po
rgyan gyi rgyal po de mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang sgo rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i snying po
zhes bya ba rab tu thob bo/ /ye shes rgya chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi klong gi gzungs kyang rab tu thob bo/ /kun gyi rjes su song bar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnam par
thar pa zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po yang rab tu thob bo/ /dmigs pa'i sgo'i sprin thams cad kyis rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying po yang rab tu thob bo/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod ces bya ba'i dga' ba chen po yang rab tu thob bo/ /chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa
zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po yang rab tu thob bo/ /rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa'i lus zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rab tu thob bo//
chags pa med pa'i dbyings rnam par snang ba'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yang rab tu thob bo/ /rab tu khong du chud pas dri ma med pa'i klong la yang dag par 'jug
pa zhes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa yang rab tu thob bo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang rab tu
thob bo| |de dag la sogs pa chos kyi sgo stong phrag bcu kun nas non par gyur te/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs
thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bskal pa bye ba bsam gyis mi khyab tu/ /'jig rten gtso bo'i dam pa shin tu dkon/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'di sems can thob rab thob/ /de
dag sangs rgyas gnyis pa 'di yang mthong / /sangs rgyas sku las 'od rnams rab bkye ba/ /kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam par dag /'od zer sprin gyis 'jig rten kun tu khyab/ /
kun tu rgyal ba'i yon tan grags par byed/ /'od kyis reg pa rmad kyi dga' ba skye/ /'gro ba de dag kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi/ /phan tshun sri zhu byams pa'i sems gyur cing / /sangs
rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag kun kyang mthong / /sprul pa'i dra ba'i sprin rnams bsam mi khyab/ /rnam pa du ma'i 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing
rnams kun kyang gang byas shing / /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi spu rtse re re nas/ /dbyangs sprin bkye bas nam mkha' kun bkang zhing / /mun
nag chen po kun nas snang bar byed/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang rnam par sel/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs ni phyogs rnams bcu po na/ /sems can rnams kyi sngon dge
rgya mtsho rnams/ /thams cad dbyangs kyis kun tu sgra yang sgrog /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ltos/ /sangs rgyas 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba/ /mtha' dang
dbus med yang dag rab tu byung / /de na rgyal ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /sems can rgya mtsho mi zad rnams kyang 'dul/ /tshad med rnam par 'phrul ba dag la ltos/ /
zhing rnams kun na rgyal ba mngon par bzhugs/ /de ltar bde gshegs ye shes chags pa med/ /sems can don du rnam pa mngon sangs rgyas/ /dga' zhing mos
par kun kyang 'dong bar gyis/ /bde ba'i yid dang sri zhu spro ba yis/ /bde gshegs de ni blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /de mthong sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /byang
chub sems ni yang dag bskyed byas shing / /'gro ba kun la byams pa'i sems 'gyur te/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam kun btab cing / /chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag
'gyur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i sgra la thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gyur te/ de thos pa'i sems can tshad med pa
rnams kyang byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur to/ /de yang pha dang ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor thams cad dang / sems can bye ba phrag khrag khrig brgya stong de dag gis bskor
cing mdun du byas te/ rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin lngas nam mkha' thams cad du kun nas yog par byas te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo / /'ongs pa de dag la
bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i mdo/ 'jig rten khams
kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor can yang dag par bstan to/ /des de thos nas tshul thams cad rnam pa dag pa la 'jug pa 'byung bar rab tu skyes so/ /ye shes kyi
rim pa rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba yang non par gyur to/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar lta ba'i rgyan ces bya ba la
yang zhugs par gyur to/ /zhing thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa dang / snang ba mtha' yas pa mthong bas rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil
'khor la yang rab tu zhugs so/ /spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsod nams kyi sprin dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /rjes su
rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chos rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba yang rjes su rtogs par gyur to/ /'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor ye shes chen po'i shugs
kyi rgyan ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs so/ /rang byung du 'gyur ba shin tu mthong ba'i shugs kyis dbang bskur ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho la yang zhugs par gyur to/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od rnam par snang ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang shin tu snang bar gyur to/ /smon lam gyi stobs tshad med pa la mos pa
rgya mtsho'i snying po'i smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi stobs la yang rnam pa dag par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang
po rgyan gyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ legs so yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho can/ /sangs rgyas byang chub
smon lam yang dag gnas/ /sems can kun gyi mgon dang gnas gyur pa'i/ /rgyal ba dam pa bsam gyi mi khyab 'gyur/ /ye shes rgya mtsho chen por mngon par byung / /chos kyi
dbyings su thams cad rgyas byas te/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul rgya chen mi zad pa'i/ /bsam gyis mi khyab tshul la 'jug par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yon tan sprin mthong
pa'i| |ye shes sa yang mi zad non par gyur/ /pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho kun gyi tshul/ /grags pa chen po yongs su rgyas par byed/ /gzungs kyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho mang po dang / /so so
yang dag rig tshul mi zad dang / /spyod pa smon lam khyod kyis mngon bsgrubs pas/ /gzhal med ye shes ldan par khyod 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur//
smon lam rgya mtsho'i nang du khyod skyes te/ /rnam 'phrul 'di la'ang shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid bsam mi khyab/ /chos dbyings dam pa bsam gyis mi
khyab pa'i/ /bsam pa rgya chen rnam par sbyangs byas te/ /sangs rgyas sprin la rnam pa blta bar gyis/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dri med rnam par sbyongs/ /nga yi byang chub spyod la 'jug
par gyis/ /sngon gyi sbyor tshul rgya mtsho mang po yi/ /spyod pa ngas ni ji ltar rnam sbyangs su/ /de 'dra'i tshul yang khyod kyis shes par gyis/ /zhing rnams re re sangs rgyas mang po ngas//
rgya mtsho brgya mang shin tu mchod pa byas/ /sngon spyod de yi 'bras bu 'di yin te/ /'di 'dra dri ma med pa'i rgyan la ltos/ /las kyi rgya mtsho mi zad rgya
chen dang / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag bya'i spyod pa dang / /smon lam bsam yas go cha bgos pas na/ /'di rnams 'di 'dra'i rnam par 'phrul bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rgya
mtsho ma lus mchod byas shing / /zhing rnams rgya chen rgya mtsho sbyangs byas nas/ /bskal pa 'byams klas kun tu sbyangs byas shing / /rgyal pa'i yon tan 'od chen mnga' bar
'gyur| |kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas blta na dga' ba shin tu
gtsang ba'i bdag po de yang dus byas par gyur te/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par gyur to/ /nags tshal chen po yal
ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba der yang de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba
gsum pa byung bar gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas 'khor thams cad dang / dpung gi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs
dang / rin po che bdun dang / grong gi mi dang / yul mir bcas te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non
pa gang na bzhugs pa der dong nas des bcom ldan 'das de la rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa spos dang nor bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba phul lo/ /der de bzhin
gshegs pa des kun tu lta ba'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang
bcas pa'ang yang dag par bshad par gyur to/ /de thos nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos bsod nams chen po rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
rab thob bo/ /ting nge 'dzin de thob pas kyang dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho mngon du gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs te byang chub sems dpa' gzi
brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ yon tan bsod nams kun gyi gzi brjid can/ /byang chub mchog tu smon lam yid ldan pa/ /'gro ba kun la snying rje rgya
mtsho yis/ /nga yi drung du khyod 'ongs legs so legs/ /snying rje'i snying po khyod ni sems can rnams/ /sdug bsngal gyur pa kun grol don zhugs
pas| |'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang skyabs su 'gyur/ /byang chub spyod pa'i tshul yang de yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' shin tu brtan pa rnams/ /skyo med yid kyis spyod pa spyad
pa dag /mchog tu gyur cing dam pa chags med pa'i/ /ye shes 'di 'dra shin tu thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po yi/ /mthu chen smon lam spyod par zhugs
bas na| |bsod nams 'od dang bsod nams dpal yin te/ /bsod nams 'byung gnas bsod nams mchog kyang yin/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rgyal pa rgya mtsho dag /mtha'
dang dbus med mang po khyod kyis shes/ /mtha' dang dbus med de dag mthong gyur nas/ /de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho rtogs par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams
thams cad kyi/ /rgyal ba'i sprin rnams kun kyang shin tu mthong / /de dag spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang / /sngon chad ji ltar spyad pa bzhin du mthong / /'di tshul rgya mtsho 'di
la su zhugs shing / /ye shes sa la su dag gnas gyur pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes slob cing / /thams cad gzigs par gdon mi za bar 'gyur/ /khyod ni zhing
kun rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed kyi/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa spyad byas nas/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sngon spyad rgya mtsho rnams/ /bslab nas rang byung nyid du 'gyur bar 'ong / /zhing rnams
rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa rnams/ /phyogs bcu dag tu ji ltar mthong ba bzhin/ /khyod kyi zhing yang rnam par dag 'gyur te/ /smon lam kun kyang shin tu sgrog par 'gyur/ /'khor
gyi rgya mtsho 'di dag thams cad kyang / /khyod kyi smon lam thos gyur rab tu dga'/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i lam dag gis/ /byang chub mchog la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ /
mtha' dang dbus med zhing rnams 'byams klas bar/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho dag tu spyad pa spyod/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thams cad dang / /smon lam rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs
par gyis/ /nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal zhes bya ba byung bar
gyur to| |rgyal po gzi brjid chen po de yang de nas shi 'phos nas rgya mtsho'i steng na lha'i grong khyer rin po che zhi ba'i gnas zhes bya bar phyin te/ der bsod nams dri ma med pa'i
dpal zhes bya ba'i lha'i rgyal po chen por gyur to/ /de nas de lha'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang bcas te rin po che'i me tog gi sprin gyi char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal gang na bzhugs pa der dong ngo / /der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal gyis tshul yangs pa'i sgo kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra
ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan to/ /des de dag thos nas dga' ba'i snying po kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo/ /chos thams
cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyings su yang zhugs par gyur to/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi le'u zhes bya
ste| bcu pa'o// //bam po bcu gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par
snang mdzad kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ni/ kun tu bzang po tshangs
pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ yongs su 'dzin pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus
kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ lhan cig spyod pa/ 'phrul dga'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
