kun tu spyod pa/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ gnas kyi dam pa mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar
'dug pa/ gling ni/ byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ grong rdal gyi mdzod mtha' yas pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs
ltar 'dug pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba ni/ mya ngan dang bral ba/ snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa ni/ kun nas smad du med pa/
'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa na bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med
pas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la gnas par ming mthun pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag dang / gzhung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos
kyi lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming mthun pa thams cad nyan thos kyi lus kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag dang /
gzhung de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma
yin pa'i lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming mthun pa thams cad kyang mi ma yin pa'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor ba ste/
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bar snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi gnas
'phos pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgul dang ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phrag pa'i lhun dang ldan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang
ldan pa'o/ /snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba chen po rgya
mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lto dang ldan pa'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu'i bu ga dang ldan pa'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sta zur dang ldan
pa'o| |nyan thos kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bral dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten pa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byin pa dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can gyi khams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa
ste| 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'phral ba dang ldan pa'o/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdzod spu dang ldan pa'o/ /byang chub kyi
lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi smin tshugs dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyi khams gang
chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snyan gyi khams
gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rna ba dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shangs kyi
khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
ljags kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa sku'i khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thugs kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yid dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa zhi ba rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sgra dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa bdud 'dul ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skur sprul pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu dang ldan pa'o/ /byang chub
sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdog dang ldan pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kha dang ldan pa'o/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi skom dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can yongs su
smin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zas dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med
pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yog par khebs pa'o/ /
'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi sprin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char mngon par 'bab pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
dril bu'i dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bres pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bla re 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par bkram pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun tu khebs par bkang ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/ /mig sna tshogs kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang
ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o//
kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho re re nas yid kyi chu rgya mtsho'i bar re re las kyang me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon te me tog ut+pa la de dag re re dang / me tog puN+Da rI ka de dag re re la yang me tog ut+pa la'i 'khor dang / me tog puN+Da rI ka'i 'khor
kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / me tog puN+Da rI ka'i bar de dag re re las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
ri rab rnam par phye ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ba dag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyan dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi pad+mo'i tshal dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi smig ma'i tshal mang po dag kyang mngon par thon pa sha stag go /ci'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho
zhes bya zhe na/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/ chu 'thung ngam/ khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di'i gzugs su snang ba 'das pa'am/
ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba'am/ nang gi'am/ phyi'i 'am/ che ba'am/ chung ba'am/ bzang ba'am/ ngan pa'am/ rgyang ring ba'am/ thag nye ba yang rung ste/ gang ji snyed
yod pa de dag thams cad khongs na snang bar so so'i mig gis mngon par mthong bas de'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin
du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o/ /ci'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho la mig
gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ba zhe na/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/ chu 'thung ba dang / khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na gzugs su snang ba 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba'am/ nang gi'am/ phyi'i 'am/ che
ba'am| chung ba'am/ bzang ba'am/ ngan pa'am/ rgyang ring pa'am/ thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nang na snang bar rang rang gi mig dang /
gzhan gyi mig gis mngon par mthong bas de'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la mig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
yid kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed kyis lhun shin tu brgyan pa ste/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba'i dpe byad bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i lus can no/ /chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho zab mo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mtshan dang ldan
pa'o| |'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang
gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar 'byung ba'o/ /ci'i phyir na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la de
bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang
chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i phyag gi mthil na rdul shin tu phra ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i nang na rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /de dag gi steng na chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas
so| |de dag gi steng na nam mkha'i dbyings rgya mtsho sa mtshams yongs su chad pa med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ /
de dag gi steng na me'i khams rgya mtsho drag shul can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ /de dag
gi steng na chu'i khams kyi rgya mtsho sbrang rtsi can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ /de dag gi steng na sa'i khams rgya mtsho rin
po che'i snying po can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ /de dag gi steng na me tog mtshan ma med pa las skyes pa zhes bya ba
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon te/ me tog de dag kyang so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tsam gyi tha gru dang ldan pa dag ste/ de dag gi steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di gnas pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin
gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes
bya'o| |de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na yon tan ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
de na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba/ tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i spo mngon par 'phags pa 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bang rim chen po'i khri 'phang du 'dug pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ngos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o/ /ci'i phyir na/ 'jig rten gyi
khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun tu bzang po zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na yongs su ma dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang yang
med de| der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad chos gang dang gang la yongs su dmigs par byed pa'i dmigs pa de dang des kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs
su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams ri
rab de ni/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa yon tan tshad med pa dag dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon
tan ni| 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni/ lha'i rnam
par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas so/ /de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu
gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs
rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang 'du shes tha dad pa ma gtogs par lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa med do/ /skye gnas
tha dad pa med do/ /theg pa tha dad pa med do/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de la ci'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya
zhe na| stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad la ngan song gi 'jigs pa med/
theg pa dman par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ ser snar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ tshul khrims ngan par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ mi bzod par ltung ba'i
'jigs pa'ang med/ le lor ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ rnam par 'khrug par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ shes rab 'chal bar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang
med pas de'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag
la sogs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa mang po dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams
ri rab kun tu bzang po na yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na yod do/ /stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba 'phrul dga'i lha'i dbyibs
su 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gnyis
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de na rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od rgya mtsho mang po dang mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
shes kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rgya mtsho dang
mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba rgya
mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad phud dud
du bya ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu bdud kyi las thams cad yongs su gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ /stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa
zhes bya ba de na sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu
gnas pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go /stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de la ci'i phyir na lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang lhan cig 'grogs shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad du rnam par spyod pas lhan cig spyod pa de la lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de
dag la sogs pa stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de ni/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yod do/ /
stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug
pa| stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de na bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ de
bzhin gshegs pa 'di kun tu mtha' yas kyi chos kyi sku 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brlan pa ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed
skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin du tshul
khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la
rab tu gnas pa nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar la rab tu gnas pa/ mngon par shes pa rgya
mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go /ci'i
phyir na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
ba snyed dag na chos kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
khams rgya mtsho dang / sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas rnam par spyod pas kun tu spyod pa de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar
de dag la sogs pa stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig
spyod pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa na yod do/ /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes
bya ba de na gling bzhi pa gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni/ snying po byang chub rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan de dag re re la yang seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas pa/ seng+ge'i khri'i rgyan de dag re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed mang po 'khod pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'
kun tu bzang po'i lus dang spyod lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sgo mtha' yas pa nas mngon par sgrub pa'i mdo/ 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go /ci'i phyir na gling bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na sems can rnams kyi 'byung gnas dang gnas su bya ba'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na
'di mchog tu bya bas na/ de'i phyir gling bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi
pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni/ yon tan gzhal du med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun
tu spyod pa na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de na yod do/ /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de ni/ rin po che'i ri khang pa brtsegs pa ltar 'dug pa/ rgya mtsho mang po
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun tu khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brlan pa ste/ gling byang
chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho snying po byang chub kyi rgyan gyi dam par gyur pa 'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ theg pa tha dad pas 'byung ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mkhas pa/
chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rnam par spyod pa sha stag go /ci'i phyir na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la
byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya zhe na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na byang chub kyi shing nam mkha'i rten ces bya ba/ byang chub kyi shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ der skad cig skad cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas/ de'i phyir gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de ni/ yon tan
tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na
yod do| |gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ grong rdal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho re re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin gyi
'obs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs
pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing
yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon tan gyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
kun nas khyab par gang ba'o/ /grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pha gu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed las brtsigs pa sa bcu'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / gzhal med khang gi phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par
phye ba ste/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi sku dang ngang tshul rgya mtsho
la rab tu zhugs pa/ skad cig skad cig cing sems can gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba/ 'jig rten
gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rgya mtsho'i khur 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
bkur ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa sha stag go /ci'i phyir na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya zhe na/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de'i sa'i
khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ chu'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ me'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ nam mkha'i
khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de dag la chos kyi mdzod rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ma
bzhag pa de lta bu gang yang med pas/ de'i phyir grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag la sogs pa grong rdal mdzod
mtha' yas pa de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na gang byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na
yod do| |grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na nags tshal rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ nags tshal de dag kyang so so nas stong pa nyid kyi gser rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
ba snyed kyi rgyu las grub pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi 'od rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi me tog dang ldan pa'o/ /rnam par rtog pa'i
gnyen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'bras bu dang ldan pa'o/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sdig pa las yongs su skyob pa rgya
mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lo ma dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi grib ma bsil ba dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed la snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba rab tu gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yal ga dang ldan pa'o/ /rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i dar gyi lda ldi dang chun po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed kun tu bres pa'o/ /dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par
bsgrengs pa'o/ /bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni/ rdzing rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su brgyan pa ste/ rdzing de dag re
re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas rgya mtsho'i chu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o/ /rdzing de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin
gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon tan gyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / puN+Da rI ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'o/ /
bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba der sems can ji snyed cig 'dong ba de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sku dang / thugs dang / 'phrin las mnyam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par 'gyur ba sha stag ste/
dus gsum thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag go /ci'i phyir
na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya zhe na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa
mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de dang mthun pa'i rgyus grub pas de'i phyir na/ bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /de dag la
sogs pa bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi
yon tan ni/ bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na yod do/ /bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de'i nang na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten
gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod do/ /khang
pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las byung ba'o/ /
sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs
dam pa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su 'dong ba'o/ /khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa
de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa/ ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su bsgrubs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis sems can de dag gi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas
mngon par grub pa sha stag go /ci'i phyir na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de la kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de la kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar
de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba na yon tan
gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na yod do/ /de lta bu'i pho brang brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na byang chub sems
dpa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i lhun dang ldan pa'i seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing / de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas
bskor cing bzhugs so/ /rnam par spyod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag las byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyan thos 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya
mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang / de ltar 'khor dang / 'khor gyi 'khor gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
du shes par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las byang chub
sems dpa' re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar re re dag kyang lus rnam pa tha dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ lus
rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las lus re re la yang mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las mgo ra re la yang mig gi dbang po
rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad
pa rgya mtsho'i bar du yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed nas yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag re re la yang
mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho'i bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog
pa rgya mtsho nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la rnam par shes pa ji snyed cig yod
pa de dag las rnam par shes pa re re la yang ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /ye
shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la ye shes ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las ye shes re res kyang 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho mang po'i sangs rgyas tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul du chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bskor bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du nyan thos dang / de bzhin du lha dang /
klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la yang shes par bya ste/ ye
shes la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang shes par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi gnas kyi yon tan rnam par
phye pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod
pa dang / rgyan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / gos kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' nas mi dang
mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi mig gi rdul shin tu phra ba re re nas lus kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas

rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du bstan cing brjod kyang zad par mi
rung ngo| /bam po bcu bzhi pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis sku'i ba spu'i bu ga re re nas kyang 'od zer rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bkye'o/ /'od zer rgya mtsho de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho pad+mo rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ste/ sangs rgyas re re'i sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon to/ /de dag las yang dag par skul pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho re re zhing shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa dang / rdul
shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / rdul shin tu phra ba re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ji snyad cig yod pa dang / rang
sangs rgyas rgya mtsho dang / nyan thos rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod spyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang /
lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la yongs su skul ba byed do/ /shar phyogs dang 'dra bar phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad
du'ang de bzhin te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang
chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho dag na sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang bzhugs pa de dag la zhus te gnang
nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag re re zhing byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rgya
mtsho'i bar dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa gang na ba der 'dong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems
dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag la byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig yod pa de dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las byang
chub sems dpa' re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag re re zhing yang lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ lus re
re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ lus re re la yang mgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba

snyed yod pa/ mgo re re la yang kha'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ kha'i sgo re re la yang lce rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa sha stag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa'i ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la lus re res kyang g.yas phyogs su bskor ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba
byas te| lag pa re re nas kyang me tog rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod nas de bzhin du mar me dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang
byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod
de| lce re re zhing yang bstod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par bstod nas rang rang gi stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul
pa'i stan rgya mtsho dag la 'khod par gyur to/ /'khod nas kyang lce re re zhing zhu ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su zhu pa byed do/ /
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad des zhus pa de dag re re la shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu bstan pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar rnam pa de ltar 'dus pa de dag thams cad
la chos rgya mtsho mang po rnam grangs du mar rnam par phye'o/ /rnam par bkrol lo/ /gsal par mdzad do/ /yang dag par bstan to/ /de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying
po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes te/ thog mar yang dge /bar du
yang dge /tha mar yang dge ba'i chos/ don bzang po/ yi ge bzang po/ dag pa/ yongs su gsal ba/ yongs su byang ba/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing / byang chub sems
dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu ston pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad
de'i gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sku tshe'i yon tan rnam par
phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sku yongs su bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba
rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / chos bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba de dag ni/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed kyis dus gsum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gsungs te bstan kyang zad par mi rung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba de ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bdag po lha dang mi'i dbang po yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag go/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che mang po de'i 'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi spyan rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de bzhin
du sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang / shangs dang / ljags dang / sku dang / thugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad kyis blta na yid du 'ong ba'i bud med rin po che rgya mtsho dang / don thams cad sgrub pa'i khyim bdag rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun
tu rnam par phye ba'i blon po rin po che rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa'i rta rin po che rgya mtsho dang / yid bzhin du 'gro ba'i glang po rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi dbyings
rdo rje'i lte ba can gyi 'khor lo rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun tu snang bar byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha' rgyan gyis 'gengs pa'i gdugs rin

po che rgya mtsho dang / rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa'i gos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu'i rdul yab rin po che rgya mtsho dang / shes rab kyi lam gyi rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
'jig rten thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong ba'i spyi gtsug bsgribs pa med pa rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lha ma rin po che rgya mtsho dang / ting nge 'dzin dang mnyam
par bzhag pa thams cad kyi mdzod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos gang chen mtsho thams cad kyi klong dang ldan pa'i gzungs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de ltar
de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ rin po che rgya mtsho de dag la
rin po che ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las rin po che re re zhing yang las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byed pa sha stag go/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
rgyal po rin chen mang po de la bu rgya mtsho kun kyang mi chen po'i mtshan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ 'od chen po'i rgyan rgya mtsho
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ lus dpe byad bzang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed kyis rab tu gsal bar brgyan pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i sde 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'joms pa/ sa bcu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu
thob pa| snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su gnon pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de la bu mo rgya mtsho kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa'i bud med rin po che dang 'dra bar yid kyi lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems bla
na med pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed kyi 'phral ba dang ldan pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi smin tshugs can/ shes rab dang ye shes yangs pa rgya mtsho
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed kyi rna ba yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sdom pa chen po yang dag par blangs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos
rgya mtsho rab tu sgrog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' gnyis yongs su spangs pas 'dzum par dgod pa
rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don yongs su sgrub pas mi ngoms pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa/
bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nu ma legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos zab mo sna tshogs
rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lte ba dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i mthar thug pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yangs shing mi shigs la brtan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
tu phra ba snyed kyi sta zur dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad rim gyis legs par 'brel ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang / phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
mdzes par thogs pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i gos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed shin tu bzang par gyon pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis legs par
brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spos kyis lus shin tu byugs pa/ dga' ba'i
rgyan dang / thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag gi kha nas ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i chos rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo / /de dag gi lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang
snying rje'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan+dan gyi spos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo / /spos rgya mtsho de dag gi dri zhim pos kyang 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po yongs su rgyas par 'gengs te/ de dag gi dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos
'dul ba'i sems can rgya mtsho gang ji snyed cig yod pas dri zhim po rgya mtsho de dag tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /sems can gang dga' ba'i rgyan dang / thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba de dag gis gzugs kyi
yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho de dag mthong ba de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston pa
rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang gis dbyangs rgya mtsho thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad las thos pa yongs su 'dzin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang gis lag nas bzung ba de dag thams cad
kyang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang gis mthong la reg pa de dag thams cad
kyang bsod nams dang ye shes sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang dang stan gcig la
lhan cig tu 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang snying po byang chub kyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
gang gi kha dang khar phrad par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang gis
bang du 'khyud pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang dang chos
kyi dbyings su brtan par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na sems can gyi khams rgya
mtsho gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
rab tu 'thob pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar sa bon rgya mtsho rab tu 'debs so/ /de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po des yang dag
par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad du khyab pa'i rna ba rgya mtshos thos nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs rgya mtsho
chags pa med cing bsgribs pa med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
de'i zhabs gnyis la mgo rgya mtsho'i spyi bos btud de phyag 'tshal nas chos kyi dbyings rab tu sgrog pa'i lce'i dbang po rgya mtshos zhu ba yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar
yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba de su'i mthu las byung ba lags /de skad
ces gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
rgyal po chen po/ 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i
phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing
'tsho skyong ngo / /chos ston to/ /yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba 'di yang de'i mthus byung
ngo / /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das| bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam
par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/
de'i dus la dbab par shes na 'gro la rag ste/ rgyal po chen po/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni/ 'gro
bar dka' ste/ der 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan par ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi
rlabs ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la
rab tu gnas pas kyang bde blag tu bya bar sla ba ma yin gyi/ rgyal po chen po/ de lta ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig yod
de| de khyod kyis sngon chad mthong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs ni/ gang na 'dug/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni/ nye 'am ring / de na da ltar de bzhin
gshegs pa ni/ gang zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang / chos ston pa mdzad pa shes sam/ rgyal po rin chen mang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mthong ba'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni/
nye ba'am ring zhig na mchis pa dang / da ltar de na de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho gzhes shing chos ston pa ni/ smos su yang ma mchis te/ 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho de ni/ sngon chad bdag gis ma thos so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ji srid pa dang / de na da
ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang / chos ston pa legs par soms shig /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams
cad du yongs su gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par bzhag kyang 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas nye'am ring ba dang / de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes
pa dang / chos ston pa yang ma shes te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo / /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs
te| de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho de mthong ba'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ring ba'am nye ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang / chos ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo / /
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de lta bas na/
rgyal po chen po/ rnam grangs des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
gyi rlabs ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la
gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos kyang 'gro bar bya ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba'am/ de la phyag bya ba'am/ bsnyen bkur ba'am/ de las chos mnyan pa bde
blag ma yin par shes par gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bstan du gsol/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ phyogs gang na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni/ thag ji srid
cig na mchis/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang / chos ston pa bstan du gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems
can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i
nub phyogs logs kyi sa mtshams kyi mtha' 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams klong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho sa mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par
snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes so/ /chos kyang ston to/ /de nas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ma
shes ma mthong nas 'di snyam du bsam mo/ /ji ga 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de de ltar nye na 'ang bdag la mthu'i khyad par med na/ de bas ring ba lta ci smos snyam nas de ltar rjes su
bsam ste/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs legs par len pa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu bsgribs pa med pa la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par bzhag go/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i mod la rgyal po rin chen mang po la de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs rgya mtsho
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de ltar rgyal po rin chen mang po
la byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad ma thag tu de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyod
pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil
gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang / de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi stobs
dam pa rgya mtsho la sogs pa ye shes rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu shes so/ /dus gsum kun tu lta ba rnam par rgyu ba rgya
mtsho la sogs pa mig rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu mthong ste/ 'di ltar dper na/ lag mthil du skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu
bzhag pa'am/ me long shin tu gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la ngo snang ba bzhin no/ /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs te de bzhin
gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs
pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang /
bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po de
la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i dus la dbab par shes na song la byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba'i skyes bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la phul cig /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag dang / bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag dang lhan cig ste/ bu re re
zhing ni| 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed dang lhan cig /'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur
ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re
re zhing ni/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig /stong gi
'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ gling gcig gi 'khor los bsgyur brgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig / gling gcig gi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ khams kyi rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ khams kyi rgyal po rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'dong bar chas pa
dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de'i chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang / bu mo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag gis 'di skad
ces smras te/ lha'i zhal snga nas gsan du gsol/ bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der de bzhin
gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar
gsol lo/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po rin chen mang pos chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci ste khyed sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i
zhal blta ba ni/ don du mi gnyer/ chos rgya mtsho mnyan pa ni/ tshol bar mi byed/ dge 'dun rgya mtsho bsnyen bkur ba ni/ don du mi gnyer/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par

rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ tshol bar mi byed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ don du mi gnyer/ nyan thos kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ don du mi gnyer/ yul rgya mtsho 'di nas ni/ 'gro bar 'dod pa med/ yul rgya mtsho gzhan du ni/ 'gro bar 'dod pa med la/ gal te
khyed sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas par gyur te/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'am/ 'dod
chags dang bral ba la yang mi gnas/ sems can thams cad gsod phod kyang zhe sdang ngam/ byams pa la mi gnas/ mu stegs can thams cad kyi lta ba rgya mtsho la 'jug
cing spyod kyang log pa'i ye shes sam/ yang dag pa'i ye shes la mi gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa yang ston la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi
g.yo zhe na/ deng la rag go/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po des bstan pa 'di shin tu bstan pa'i tshe chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de
dag las chung ma re re dang / bu mo re res kyang mig gi khams re res chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya
mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to/ /rna ba'i khams re res kyang nam mkha' khong du chud pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa byang
chub sems dpa'i sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to/ /sna'i khams re res kyang gcig la brten pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa rang sangs
rgyas kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to/ /lce'i khams re res kyang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo/ /lus kyi khams re res kyang pha rol tu phyin pa dri ma med pa rgya mtsho la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo/ /yid kyi khams re res kyang sa'i dbang po'i stobs rgya mtsho la sogs pa stobs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo/ /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po'i chung ma rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag gis theg pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten

gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi gting rnyed nas spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par byas te/ rgyal
po rin chen mang po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag cag kun gyis sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong / /yongs su mchod de bsnyen bkur zhu ba bgyis/ /'on kyang 'di 'dra rgya mtsho'i chos ma
thos| |sa mang rgya mtsho 'di dag thob ma gyur/ /da ni sangs rgyas 'phrin las sgrub pa yi/ /sa mang rgya mtsho'i mig kyang thob par gyur/ /byang chub don
du phyogs rnams kun dbyings su/ /rna bas spyod pa dam pa spyad par bgyi/ /sna yi khams kyis rang rgyal sa thob ste/ /rten 'brel 'byung ba'i chos rnams rtogs par gyur//
lces kyang nyan thos sa mang rgya mtsho thob/ /des ni zhi ba'i bde ba tshor bar gyur/ /lus kyis sa mang rgya mtsho thob pas na/ /sgrub pa sna tshogs rab tu bsgrub par bgyi/ /yid
kyis dus gsum chos mang rgya mtsho rnams/ /'tshal bar gyur pas gzhan la bstan par bgyi/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/
de bzhin gshegs pa phal po che'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig go/ //bam po bco lnga pa/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa ma ga d+ha'i chos
kyi dgon pa'i snying po byang chub na bzhugs te/ blo shin tu rnam par dag pa mi gnyis pas yang dag par spyod pa/ chos mtshan nyid med pa la shin tu gzhol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi
rnam par spyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ bsgribs pa med pas rtogs par thugs su chud pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can spyod yul 'phrog pa med
pa| rnam par dgod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la shin tu byung ba/ pho brang kun tu 'od na seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can la bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'dus pa/ sems can gyi khams la dpyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings
la dpyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams la dpyod pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la dpyod pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la dpyod pa/ bsam pa'i rgyud la dpyod pa/ don dang yi ge la
dpyod pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la dpyod pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa la dpyod pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba la dpyod pa sha stag
dang thabs cig go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs
rgyas kyi chos nyid yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad pa yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
rang bzhin yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi mthu yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi byang
chub yongs su bstan kyang rung / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bkod pa bcu ji ltar rnam
par bkod pa de dag yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i tshad med pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang
rung / byang chub sems dpa'i gter rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rnams
yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang
rung / byang chub sems dpa'i mgo bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung mi gcad
pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nye bar nyon mongs pa med par bya ba dang / 'du byed thams cad yongs su shes
par bya ba dang / chos thams cad yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba dang / the tshom thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang /
nem nur thams cad shin tu gsal ba dang / gnas thams cad rab tu gzhom par bya ba'i phyir gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs
pa'i yul bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyengs pa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan kyang rung / gong
du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' chen po bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'phrog pa bstan kyang
rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs bstan kyang rung / gong
du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bstan kyang rung / gong du de
bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog
gi mthu bstan kyang rung snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa de dag mngon par 'du mdzad pas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mi g.yo pa'i sangs rgyas
kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste
phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar phyogs su brten nas seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyel mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /lho phyogs
logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs
pa rig byed mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom
ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ lho phyogs su brten nas seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas
'khod do/ /nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i mdog ces bya ba/ de
bzhin gshegs pa rig byed bcings med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ nub phyogs su brten nas seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par
sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi
khams tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed kun spyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs
rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/
byang phyogs su brten nas seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams
sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed nyi ma'i sangs
rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung
bcas nas 'khod do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
gser gyi mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mtha' rgal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs
rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams
su brten nas seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
