zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed dam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang
chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas
bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /
nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i mdog ces bya ba/
de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed dbang phyug gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
su brten nas seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /'og gi phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams shel gyi mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed tshangs pa'i dbang po'i sangs rgyas
kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'og gi phyogs su brten nas seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod
do| |steng gi phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dra ba'i mdog ces
bya ba| de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed sna tshogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi phyogs su brten nas seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can
dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
thams cad la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni/ ngo mtshar thob pa sha stag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas
kyi zhing ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa ni/ bsam gyis
mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'byung ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun
tu rgyu ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab ste/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can 'dul ba rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud cing /
nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dag tu chos ston te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di
nyid dang / de ma yin pa'i gling bzhi pa gzhan dag na'ang sku gzhan dang gzhan/ mtshan gzhan dang gzhan/ kha dog dang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan/ chu zheng gzhan dang
gzhan| sku tshe'i tshad gzhan dang gzhan/ skye mched brnyes pa gzhan dang gzhan/ dbang po brnyes pa gzhan dang gzhan/ 'byung ba'i skye mched gzhan dang gzhan/ sku
gzugs gzhan dang gzhan du de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams gling
bzhi pa bcom pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya bar
rab tu shes so/ /seng+ge'i nga ro can zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /drang srong dam pa'i mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rnam par snang
mdzad ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /go'u ta ma'i rigs zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dge sbyong chen po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /
mu stegs byed ces bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa bcom pa dang ldan pa na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin
gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dabs chags su shar phyogs logs na gling bzhi pa shin tu bsrungs
pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la rdo rje zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbang phyug ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /blo gros mnga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /
thub par dka' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /skyabs mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab
tu shes so/ /thugs dgyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mtshungs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /tshig gcod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa shin tu bsrungs pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan stong phrag bcur sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes
so| |kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dabs chags su lho phyogs logs na gling bzhi pa bzod par dka' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la
dbang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /nor grags zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dri ma med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /yang dag par gsung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /

bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams
kyis rab tu shes pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun
tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na
yang de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /gzhung de ltar lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang
shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /
de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ dpag tu
med pa| bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam
mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes te/ sngon bcom ldan 'das
kyis byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe yongs su smin par mdzad pa de dag gis ni/ spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / gsung gi rnam pa tha dad pa dang / nga ro rnam pa tha dad
pa dang / 'phrin las rnam pa tha dad pa dang / rnam par smin pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po rnam pa
tha dad pa dang / mos pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skye mched rab tu thob pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sems can rnams la chos yongs su bstan pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /shin
tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// //
bam po bcu drug pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di na
sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang byung ba zhes bya'o/ /gnod pa zhes bya'o/ /skal pa mi mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /dmigs
pa zhes bya'o/ /kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /gsal shing gi rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ /gnas kyi rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /gdon mi za ba zhes bya'o/ /shu ba'i gzeb zhes bya'o/ /byis pa'i
spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'di na kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang yongs su 'brel ba
zhes bya'o/ /chud za ba zhes bya'o/ /tshor bar gcen pa zhes bya'o/ /myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya'o/ /nges pa zhes bya'o/ /dran pa can zhes bya'o/ /
brjod pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can gyi phyi bzhin snyegs pa zhes bya'o/ /phyin ci log gi rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i
bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang 'dzud pa zhes bya'o/ /rdul dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o//
ma nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin med pa zhes bya'o/ /so sor ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /nub par 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin du gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /rang
bzhin la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang yang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams
mi mjed 'di nyid na theg pa gcig ces bya'o/ /zhi bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /dgra dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /yongs su rtog pa zad pa zhes bya'o/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa
zhes bya'o/ /khur 'dor ba zhes bya'o/ /'gro ba med par 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /'phags pa'i rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o/ /drang srong gi spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /gter bcu zhes bya
ste| kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ming bye ba brgya phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de
dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i
bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na tshol ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /mi 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /rtsa ba mi brtan pa zhes bya'o/ /bya ba ma byas pa
zhes bya'o/ /rtsod pa thams cad ces bya'o/ /rnam par phye ba nyam chung ba zhes bya'o/ /kun gzhi dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /gsod pa'i mchog ces bya'o/ /'gul zhing g.yo ba zhes
bya'o| |dngos po'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa
yod pa na las su rung ba zhes bya'o/ /ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /sreg pa zhes bya'o/ /'jigs pa zhes bya'o/ /'jigs pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /mtshams dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /sdig
pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /'dod pa zhes bya'o/ /klad pa na ba zhes bya'o/ /sgal pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes
bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na don ces bya'o/ /'jigs pa sel ba zhes bya'o/ /yon tan thob par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya'o/ /
tshul bzang po zhes bya'o/ /'dul ba zhes bya'o/ /yan lag gcig pu zhes bya'o/ /sdig pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /rtogs pa zhes bya'o/ /
kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na sde'i dbang po
zhes bya'o/ /gyen du 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /sbyor ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /lta ba mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /mtha' las grol ba
zhes bya'o/ /rtogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /rjes su brtul ba zhes bya'o/ /mig dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phyogs su snang ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la
sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam
ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi
khams lhag pa na 'jig pa zhes bya'o/ /skal pa gcod pa zhes bya'o/ /smad pa'i gnas zhes bya'o/ /nye bar bsrabs pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par sreg pa zhes bya'o/ /'khon
du 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/ /nad dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o/ /rgyud 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o/ /dka' ba bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o/ /rab tu brtags pa zhes bya'o/ /mos pa dang ldan
pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na rab tu 'jig pa zhes
bya'o| |gti mug gi rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /dgra dam pa zhes bya'o/ /bkres pa'i yan lag ces bya'o/ /ro med pa zhes bya'o/ /kun skyed pa zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya'o//
bkur bar bya ba zhes bya'o/ /mun pa khyer ba zhes bya'o/ /blo gros bcom pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba
de yang 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na don chen po zhes bya'o/ /phan pa'i yan lag ces bya'o/ /don gyi don ces bya'o/ /tshad med pa zhes bya'o/ /mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /rtog pa
med pa zhes bya'o/ /mchog tu dul ba zhes bya'o/ /rtag tu mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /gnas par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /yan lag byas pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang
sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na me'i tsha ba zhes bya'o/ /yan lag dang po zhes bya'o/ /rnam par
gdon mi za ba zhes bya'o/ /mi 'phrog pa zhes bya'o/ /tshul zab mo zhes bya'o/ /'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /mi dma' ba zhes bya'o/ /rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya'o/ /grol ba'i

bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig
rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bsal ba na 'gyod pa zhes bya'o/ /kun spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /
gcig la gcig ces bya'o/ /kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /ro gcig pa zhes bya'o/ /chos ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /kun gzhi dang mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /log pa la gzhol
ba zhes bya'o/ /log par lta ba zhes bya'o/ /grangs med pa zhes bya'o/ /dgra'i dpung zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i
bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bsal ba na 'dod chags pa zhes bya'o/ /smra ba zhes bya'o/ /mi dkar ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhi las skyes pa zhes bya'o/ /
bzung ba zhes bya'o/ /sdig pa'i kha ba zhes bya'o/ /lhag pa zhes bya'o/ /khur zhes bya'o/ /skyed pa zhes bya'o/ /sra ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal
'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa na mi mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /bral ba zhes bya'o/ /dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/ /rtsa ba dang bral
ba zhes bya'o/ /ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /sgrim pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /bag la nyal ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /'phags pa zhes bya'o/ /phyi ma zhes bya'o/ /dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal

pa sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /grol ba'i don gyi rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin du gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /mi smad pa zhes bya'o/ /mchog tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ /srid pa'i mtha' ma
zhes bya'o/ /spa ba'i snying po zhes bya'o/ /mthar thug par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /yongs su rtog pa dag pa zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig

bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che
ba na 'tshogs pa zhes bya'o/ /rdza ma lta bu zhes bya'o/ /nad dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /lus la yod pa zhes bya'o/ /rab tu 'phel ba zhes bya'o/ /gsog pa'i sgo zhes bya'o//
sdug bsngal gyi skyon can zhes bya'o/ /brtag par bya ba zhes bya'o/ /rang la gzhog pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /'gro zhing 'ong ba zhes bya'o| /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug
bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na 'tshe ba zhes bya'o/ /mdud par 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /rab tu sbyor ba
zhes bya'o/ /tshor ba'i yan lag ces bya'o/ /a na sems pa zhes bya'o/ /rab rab byed pa zhes bya'o/ /'dud par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par bral ba zhes bya'o/ /
shin tu gdung ba zhes bya'o/ /kyi hud na zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams
mi che ba na gsog pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /g.yo ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /skyon med pa zhes bya'o/ /ma nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /'grogs ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /tshad med pa zhes bya'o/ /
yangs pa zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /ma chags pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgya ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog par
'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na bstan pa'i spyod yul zhes bya'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa mtshams zhes bya'o/ /
bden pa la thug pa zhes bya'o/ /don rab tu chud pa zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin la gtugs pa zhes bya'o/ /lta ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ /dran pas sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /'gro
bas sdud pa zhes bya'o/ /skyob pa'i sa mtshams zhes bya'o/ /'khrug pa med par 'gro ba zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
mi che ba na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ming bye ba brgya phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na bsam pa nub pa zhes bya'o/ /shin
tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /yan lag gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /g.yo sgyu che ba zhes bya'o/ /'brel pa zhes bya'o/ /'dod pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /myang du mi rung ba
zhes bya'o/ /skye gnas ma rung ba zhes bya'o/ /nye bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /dngo skam pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden
pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na gdul ba'i gzhi zhes bya'o/ /sems kyi tshul zhes bya'o/ /bcings pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /rjes su dran
pa zhes bya'o/ /nges par rtog pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /rnal 'byor dang mi mthun pa zhes bya'o/ /brtag par bya ba zhes bya'o/ /sgo zhes bya'o/ /rtogs par bya ba zhes bya'o/ /
bsgribs pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal pa'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na gnas
med pa zhes bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phyir log pa zhes bya'o/ /mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /kun tu song ba zhes bya'o/ /chen po zhes bya'o/ /du ba med
pa zhes bya'o/ /mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /yangs pa zhes bya'o/ /shin tu mchod pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags
pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na mthong bas mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /spang ba'i don ces bya'o/ /rnam par sgom pa'i rgya zhes bya'o/ /mtshan nyid
la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /rnyed par dka' ba zhes bya'o/ /de ma thag pa'i don ces bya'o/ /mkhas pas brtag pa zhes bya'o/ /'grogs pa'i don ces bya'o/ /mi g.yo ba la mngon du
gyur ba zhes bya'o/ /khyad par gyi don ces bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi
ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di
na ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med
pa| bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i
dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi
ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /shar phyogs kyi
'jig rten gyi khams na ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
dang | de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi
phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/
kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs
pa dag na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su bstan pa yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi
bcu bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad shar phyogs nas steng gi phyogs zhes bya ba nas phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dag na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan
pa yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang sdug bsngal gyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
'dul lo/ /kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i ming dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa'i ming dang / lam gyi bden pa'i ming dag kyang de bzhin no/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs
rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil gnyis
nas 'od zer bye ba phrag brgya bkye ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas nas 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /shar gyi lus
'phags gling bye ba phrag brgya dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod bye ba phrag brgya dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /'khor yug
rdo rje'i ri bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /mngon par 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
par 'tshang rgya ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
pa bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /ri rab ri'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i khams kyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /mtshe ma'i lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /'phrul dga'i lha'i ris bye ba
phrag brgya bstan to/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /gya nom snang ba bye ba phrag brgya
bstan to/ /dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /'bras bu chen po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /'og min bye ba phrag brgya bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i khongs
su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar 'di ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing byang chub
sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te bskor cing mdun du byas par snang ba de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag
brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ngo / /de dag thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems
dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal dang / sangs rgyas dpal dang /
nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / bzang po'i
dpal zhes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog
dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang / pad+mo'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ut+pa la'i mdog dang / sa le sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog
dang | shel gyi mdog dang / 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba de
dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod de/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi bskyod pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa
dang / rig byed sgrib pa med pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed
sna tshogs zhes bya ba dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu
phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin te/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin du thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid
brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /'jig rten kun dang mi ldan zhing / /bral
bar gyur te dngos med pa'i/ /yang dag sangs rgyas su shes pa/ /de dag mig gi lam mi gnas/ /shes rab chen po sus mthong zhing / /dngos po'i 'du shes mi 'jug la/
rnam par bsgoms shing shes gyur pa/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten khams 'di mthong gyur te/ /sangs rgyas che ba nyid dag la/ /gang gi sems
ni mi g.yo ba/ /de dag mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos la gang gi rnams/ /mnyam pa'i sems su rab 'jug cing / /mi gnyis mngon gyur brtan pa rnams/
de dag bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/ /gang rnams bdag dang sangs rgyas dag/ rang bzhin mnyam par rab gnas shing / /mi gnas len pa med pa rnams/ /de dag bde bar
gshegs par 'gyur/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /rnam par shes dang sems dpa' dag /grangs med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /de dag thub pa chen por
'gyur| |blta bar bya las 'das pa dang / /rnam par blta las de bzhin te/ /chos la gang dag rmongs med pa/ /de dag rab tu 'od byed 'gyur/ /gang gis shes rab chen po
rnams| |sems bskyed kun la rab gnas shing / /thams cad mthong yang skye med pa/ /de dag grags pa chen por 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la skye ba med/ /'jig pa'ang
yod pa ma yin te/ /de ltar gang gis shes pa ni/ /de dag bla na med par 'gyur/ /gang gis gcig la mang shes shing / /mang po'ang gcig tu rab rtogs te/ /gnas kyi rnams
su 'ang 'byung 'gyur pa/ /de dag 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas 'das te shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu
snang bar byas so/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs dag
tu yang 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams re re zhing yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar
du yang bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs
rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag
gi gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu
nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal dang / sangs
rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang /
bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi
mdog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang / pad+ma'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ut+pa la'i mdog dang / sa le sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog
dang | shel gyi mdog dang / 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag
gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi bskyod pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa dang /
rig byed bsgribs pa med pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba dag
go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin
pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de
bzhin thams cad na brjod de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /gang gis 'gro ba shin tu gtses gyur cing / /srid
pa'i gsal shing ldan par kun shes nas/ /rang 'byung kun mkhyen yon tan tshol ba rnams/ /de dag chos nyid 'di 'dra 'di bzhin no/ /chos kyi rang bzhin gnas pa mthong
gyur nas/ /mtha' gnyis gang gis rab tu spangs gyur cing / /ldog pa med cing dgos pa kun shes pa/ /de dag de yi 'khor lo mtshungs med bskor/ /gang rnams chos dang
ldan pa'i bsam pa yis/ /'khor ba'i skye rgu kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bskal pa bsam yas rgya chen go gyon pa'i/ /drang srong chen po'i longs spyod 'di 'dra'o/ /gzhan gyis mi
pham dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan can/ /bdud rnams thams cad mthar 'byin mgon po rnams/ /byams pas gang dag mi 'jigs sgra 'byin pa/ /de dag chos nyid 'di 'dra
'di yin no/ /'di dag nang nas byung ngo zhes bya bar/ /nyon mongs sel ba'i sems ni skad cig tu/ /thams cad shes pa su yi rgyud skyes pa/ /de dag rnam par 'phrul
pa 'di dag ston/ /gang rnams chos kyi rnga ni rdung byed cing / /byang chub sems kyang srog chags thams cad la/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun tu shes byed pa/ /rang
byung de dag tshul ni 'di 'dra'o/ /gdul bar dka' ba mtha' yas spyod yul can/ /zhing rnams bye ba gang dag spyod gyur cing / /nam yang dngos po dag la mos med pa/ /de dag
de bzhin gshegs bzhin rnam par 'phrul/ /gang rnams dga' zhing mos pa mtha' yas pa/ /rgyal ba rnams ni shin tu rnam dag cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa mkha' 'dra
rjes 'dra ba/ /de dag la ni smon lam 'di yang btab/ /sems can don la gang rnams mos gyur cing / /re re dag gi mnar med sdug bsngal ba/ /bskal pa dpag med smin
par bya dad pa/ /de dag skyon med pham med shin tu gsung / /gang rnams lus dang srog la mi lta zhing / /sangs rgyas chos la rtag tu brtul zhugs te/ /mkhas pa bdag med
rnam par su spyod pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di 'thob bo/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
brgya snang bar byas pa nas gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams re rer 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan
ba nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to//
ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig pa
de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal dang /
sangs rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang /
bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog
dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang / pad+mo'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ut+pa la'i mdog dang / sa le sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog dang /
shel gyi mdog dang / 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi
zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod de/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi bskyod pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa dang / rig byed
bsgribs pa med pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba dag go /byang
chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag
ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de
bzhin thams cad na yang brjod de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du/ /thugs su chud nas
bsgrib pas med gzigs te/ /zil gyis ma non chags pa mi mnga' bar/ /skye rgu rab tu 'dul bar shin tu snang / /la las gser gyi ri bo 'dra ba de/ /sku tsher skye bar gyur
pa rab tu mthong / /skyes bu'i zla ba rnam par mdzes pa de/ /tha ma'i sku yang 'dzin par la las mthong / /yon tan tshad las 'das pa kun mnga' zhing / /dgongs pa mkhyen
bzhin shin tu mkhas gyur pa/ /skye rgu'i seng+ge don yod gshegs pa de/ /la las 'chag cing gshegs par shin tu mthong / /phyogs bcu kun tu rnam
par snang ba de/ /la las mthon mthing spyan du de bzhin mthong / /'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa'i skye rgu rnams/ /gzigs nas bzhad par de bzhin la las mthong / /gzi
brjid mtshungs med mnga' la la la yis/ /seng+ge'i nga ror gsung ba de bzhin mthong / /zil gyis mi non ma log gsung mnga' ba/ /sku yi tha mar ston pa la las mthong / /
bcings pa kun las rnam par grol ba de/ /la las khab nas 'byung bar rab tu mthong / /sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spyod pa rnams/ /gzigs shing zhi bder gzhol
ba la las mthong / /la las byang chub snying po dam pa la/ /chos rnams thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas shing | /yon tan thams cad pha rol phyin pa dang / /mun pa
rdul bsal nyon mongs sbyangs pa mthong / /la las chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang / /thugs rje chen po brnyes pa de mthong ngo / /la las skye rgu tshad med rnam 'dul
bar| |skyes bu'i dam pa de ni de bzhin mthong / /la las gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa de/ /'jig rten thams cad zil gyis mnan mdzad de/ /rdzu 'phrul chags med
bla med stobs mnga' ba/ /seng+ge'i nga ro sgrog par de bzhin mthong / /la las rab tu zhi ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ /'jig rten sgron ma mya ngan 'das par mthong / /rnam par 'phrul pa
de dag mthong nas kyang / /stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' de dag rab tu shes/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten
gyi khams stong snang bar byas pa nas gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi bar du snang bar byas te 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye
ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad
ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang
de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo / /thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu
'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar du'o/ /byang chub
sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra
ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa
dag ste| 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang re re zhing byang chub
sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra pa snyed dang lhan cig phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub
sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang
so so nas smra par gyur to/ /gang gis bde gshegs rnams kyi chos zab pa/ /zil gyis non pa brjod pa med pa rnams/ /gang la 'jig rten rtag tu mos 'gyur ba/ /de
dag thams cad rim gyis rab tu ston/ /gal te bdag cag med du zin na ni/ /de yi spyod yul stong pa zhi ba'ang med/ /rang byung rdul rnams shin tu bsal ba yi/ /
bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yang ji ltar 'byung / /mkhyen dang rnam grol zhabs dang ldan pa rnams/ /mtshungs pa med la grangs kyang nam yang med/ /de ni 'jig rten 'di na la la
dag /rgyu la thogs pa med par 'dod phyir ro/ /gang la phung po med cing khams med de/ /skye mched dag dang skye zhing 'chi med pa/ /de yi grangs ni 'jig rten 'di brnyes pas/ /skyes
bu seng+ge rnams su rab tu brjod/ /nang dang phyi zhes bya bar gdags pa rnams/ /de dag rang bzhin dngos nyid song ba ste/ /rtog pa med cing rnam rtog de bzhin med/ /gzhal du med
pa'i chos nyid 'di 'dra'o/ /de dag la ni g.yo pa nam yang med/ /snyems shing ldeg dang sgrib pa gang yang med/ /'jig rten thams cad rjes su rab tu mkhyen/ /mtha' yas 'dul
ba'i tshul ni 'di 'dra'o/ /zhi ba'i ting 'dzin spyod yul dgyes pa rnams/ /rtse gcig gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin te/ /yid kyis gsog pa'ang de la gang yang med/ /'dir ni
sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa'o/ /rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba rnams dag dang / /las kyi rnam smin sems can spyod pa yis/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes mi ldog ste/ /bde
gshegs chos ni de ltar bsam mi khyab/ /phyogs rnams bcu na ji ltar 'khod pa yi/ /'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs kun gzigs shing / /sems can tshad med yongs su 'brel
mdzad kyang / /skyes bu'i dbang po de dag rtog mi mnga'/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gser gyi mchog/ de yang kun na rnam par kun na gnas/ /de
dag bsam pa ci 'dra ji bzhin du/ /thub pa rnams ni de ltar chos kyang ston/ /bam po bcu bdun pa/ de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te
shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu snang bar byas so/ /gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu snang bar byas so/ /
'jig rten gyi khams re rer 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang
rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi
zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gi gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa
bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub
sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal nas bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog nas 'dra ba'i mdog gi bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba dag
go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba
de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod
de| de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /lha dang 'jig rten bcas pa zil mnan te/ /snying rje la ni gang zhig sems gtong zhing / /'gro ba thams
cad bskyab par zhugs pa rnams/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /bde gshegs rnams la snying nas dad bskyed cing / /gang gi sems ni nam yang mi ldog par/ /
sangs rgyas spyod pa yongs su mi gtong ba/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /gang rnams gang du'ang 'jug pa yod med cing / /sangs rgyas
yon tan rnams las mi ldog pa/ /shin tu brtan pa blo gdung med pa rnams/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur par 'ong / /gang rnams 'gro zhing 'dug dang 'chag pa'i tshe/ /
nyin mtshan rgyan du rjes su sems byed cing / /sangs rgyas bdag nyid che ba sems spel ba/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /dus gsum thams cad rab tu gzhal
byas kyang / /gang gi sems ni zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas yon tan rjes su slob mos pa/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /bdag gi rang bzhin
yongs su gzhal byas shing / /thams cad ma lus zhi bar byed pa dang / /bdag dang bdag med 'dod chags bral ba'i sems/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar
'ong / /gzhan gyis bsam pa yongs su gzhal byas shing / /rtog dang rnam rtog thams cad rab spangs te/ /spyod pa 'di 'dra dag dang ldan gyur pa/ /de dag las ni
'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab zhing 'jal zhing / /sems can rgya mtsho yid kyis 'thung byed de/ /blo chen rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan gyur
pa| |de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /gang gis zhing rnams rnam par bsam pa na/ /gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes yongs med pa/ /thams cad grangs su nye bar
'gro ba ni/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /gang rnams zhing ni rdul tu gzhig byas shing / /thams cad phyogs su bkang zhing bgrang byas te/ /de dag nang du rgyal
ba 'dzud byed pa/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag
brgya snang bar byas pa nas steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig
rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs
shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag
brgya dag na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu
nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam
dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/
'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya
ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems
dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/
gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin
thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba mthu chen la/ /gang dag kha dog rigs kyis
lta 'dod pa/ /mig nyams log par lta bar gyur pa ste/ /de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid mi shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog dbyibs dag ni/ /'jig rten kun na'ang shes
par nus pa med/ /gang gis bskal pa bye bar bsam byas kyang / /mthu chen rnams kyi kha dog mtha' med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid mi mnga' ste/ /chos rnams
thams cad mtshan nyid med cing dben/ /yan lag kun ldan blta na nyams med pa/ /bsam pa ji bzhin kun na rab tu snang / /sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhal du yod pa min/ /gang
rnams ci yang 'di yi tshul bshad de/ /ldan pa ma yin mi ldan ma yin pas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rang bzhin rab tu dben/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phung po 'jig pa med/ /
'byung dang 'jig par spro ba mi mdzad de/ /mnga' brnyes mnga' sgyur rnam par gdon mi za/ /brjod du med pa rten pa rnam par spyod/ /lus dang sems kyang mnyam par rab gyur cing //
nang dang phyi yis rnam par dben pas na/ /gnyis po bgrang du mi rung shes pa rnams/ /chags med bcings med bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/ /gya nom snang zhing thugs
gsal 'od mdzad pa/ /spyod yul yongs dag kun tu snang gyur te/ /thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzigs kun na bzhugs/ /skye rgu'i don kyang rgya chen yangs pa mdzad/ /
gcig tu gyur cing mang por rab tu 'gyur/ /mang por gyur cing gcig tu de bzhin 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i khams ni du mar thugs chud cing / /thams cad
tshul dang 'dra bar rab tu 'gyur/ /sku med de la chags pa gang yang med/ /byon pa med cing bsags pa yod min yang / /kha dog mtha' yas rnam par dgod byas
shing / /'gro ba sna tshogs lus su de dag snang / /'jig rten thams cad sems kyis brtags pa yin/ /sems ni rtogs pa nam yang ma yin te/ /bde gshegs
ye shes de 'dra'i rang bzhin no/ /de phyir rgyal ba'i sku ni 'di 'drar snang / /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te shar phyogs logs
su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcu snang bar byas nas gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcu'i bar du snang bar
byas te| 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag
gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing /

yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang
chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang
po'i dpal gyi bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi
mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham
ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang
byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams
cad thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang
brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /'jig rten rang byung de las mchog med pa/ /mi gnas dam pa phul dang mchog gi
rnams| |drang srong chen po srid pa'i rgyud 'grel pa/ /yon tan kun ldan rnam dag 'di yin no/ /'du 'dzi med cing chags pa mi mnga' la/ /'du shes dngos med gnas pa
med pa rnams/ /phun sum dge ldan smad pa mi mnga' ba/ /mgon po rnams kyi chos nyid thub par dka'/ /shin tu 'od snang dag par gyur pa rnams/ /brgal du glags
med rnyog pa med pa'i rnams/ /g.yo med mtha' ma rnam par spangs pa yi/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi ye shes tshul 'di yin/ /lus dang sems la rnam par rtog med
cing / /bde gshegs chos la gang zhig 'jug 'gyur ba/ /de dag chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin la/ /nam yang nem nur dbang du mi 'gro'o/ /'jig rten dag na
dmigs pa gang yod pa/ /de dag kun la bstan pa'i chos 'jug ste/ /gang dag phyir rgol med pas bstan mdzad kyang / /rang bzhin ldog par 'gyur ba gang yang
med| |dngos po rab shes las rnams yod min par/ /the tshom thams cad rnam par spangs byas te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu rtogs pa'i tshe/ /sems la rnam par 'byed pa
nam yang med/ /mi shes chos rnams rnam par phye ba dag/ byung med tshig gi lam gyis rab brjod pa/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi rjes su 'brangs byas na/ /gcig kyang ma yin mang
po'ang ma yin no/ /mang dang gcig pa nam yang yod min te/ /mang po rnams la gcig pa yod med do/ /mang dang gcig pa rnam par bsgoms byas na/ /sangs rgyas yon
tan mtha' yas shes par 'gyur/ /'jig rten kun tu sems can zhing rnams dang / /shin tu zhi ba'i chos rnams rnam bltas te/ /mi gnas sems la rtog pa med pa yi/ /
dran ldan sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing gi rnams/ /de dag rang bzhin ji bzhin brtags byas na/ /gcig dang tha dad gyur pa
ma yin te/ /de ltar sangs rgyas tshul 'di shes pa yin/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
bye ba snang bar byas nas steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba'i bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan
pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams
cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed

la bzhugs par snang ngo / /thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems
dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /byang
chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi
g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa'
sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba bde bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur
to| |shes rab dpag med chos rnams mtha' yas pa/ /srid pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa dag /tshe ring nad med mnyam med mtshungs med 'od/ /yon tan che mnga' 'di dag
sbyor 'di'o/ /gang gis sangs rgyas chos rnams dngos rtogs shing / /dus gsum kun tu brtags kyang mi ngoms te/ /dmigs pa shes byed rnam par mi rtog pa/ /bsam yas
mos pa de dag sbyor 'di'o/ /sems can yul mos sems can 'du shes med/ /'jig tshogs chos shes lam gyi rgyud dang bral/ /bsam gtan nang dad sems la bcings
pa med| |chags med yid ldan de dag sbyor 'di yin/ /rtogs mkhas rab tu rtogs pa'i chos can rnams/ /mya ngan 'das spyod rigs la brtson pa dag /thar pa'i lam
brtson mnyam pa nyid ldan pa/ /zhi ba thob pa de dag sbyor 'di'o/ /ded dpon rjes song sangs rgyas byang chub mchog /thams cad mkhyen pa chos
dbyings bzhin rtogs shing / /bden 'jug mkhas pas sems can rnam 'dul ba/ /bde gshegs bsam gtan de dag sbyor 'di 'o/ /sangs rgyas don tshig rjes su
shes bya zhing / /chags med blo yangs rtogs shing bsam gtan byed/ /kun tu 'gro bar song bas rtsol spyod pa/ /rang byung spyod pa de dag sbyor 'di 'o/ /nam mkha'i
dbyings dang sprul pa yid ldan rnams/ /gnas dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid shes pa dag /mya ngan 'das rigs spyod pa mkha' 'dra rnams/ /thob dka' thob pa rnams kyi
sbyor 'di 'o/ /zla ba zla phyed nyin dang nub bgrang zhing / /lo dang bskal pa'i rang bzhin su sems pa/ /'jig rten 'du zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / /grangs tshul sus rtogs
de dag sbyor 'di 'o/ /zhing gi sems can ji snyed skye 'chi ba/ /gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes 'du shes med/ /de dag ming dang gnas pa rtogs shes pa/ /bsam
gyis mi khyab rtogs pa'i sbyor 'di 'o/ /'das pa'i dus dang ma 'ongs da ltar la/ /ngag gi lam gyis gang na rtog byed cing / /dus gsum rang bzhin ji ltar rtogs gyur
pa| |mnyam med de dag sbyor ba 'di yin no/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu snang
bar byas nas steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu'i bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas
'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar
bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang ba de bzhin du
'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo / /thams
cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes
bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes
bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna
tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don
'di nyid brjod do/ /gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /'das dus gang gis sgrub
dka'i brtul zhugs che brtsams shing / /nam yang zhum pa'i sems su gtong bar mi byed de/ /brgal dka' rgal te bdag gis sems can kun 'dul zhes/ /seng+ge'i sgra
sgrog de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/ /gang zhig 'dod dang sred pa 'byung zhing 'jug pa dang / /ma rig gzhol ba gti mug mang bsgribs 'jigs chen rnams/ /sems
can rang bzhin bdag med brtan pa bzod par 'jug /bdag kyang 'jig rten mgon 'gyur zhes pa de yul 'di/ /'jig rten sems can mang po 'dod dregs 'dam bying ba/ /
med pa'i chos la rtog pas sdug bsngal mthong gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul chos la bag yod gang spyod cing / /bdag gis sems can kun bsgral de dag spyod yul
'di| |mngon mtha' shes dka' tshad med brtan pas mthong gyur cing / /bdag rten sems can pha rol mtha' yas 'khor gyur pa/ /de dag rgyal bas theg pa zhi ba mchog
la bkod/ /bdag gis de 'dra'i chos bstan de yi spyod yul lo/ /sems can khams rnams mgon med nad kyis gzir gyur cing / /ngan song gzhol pa 'dod chags zhe
sdang gti mug gdungs/ /me lce 'bar phung 'jigs gzugs mi bzad bsregs gyur pa/ /mthong nas dgrol phyir zhugs pa de dag spyod yul 'di 'o/ /lam gol lam ma
yin pa'i rkyen la spyod gyur cing / /mun pa chen po rtol bar dka' rnyed 'gro mthong nas/ /snang ba chen po bskyed de sangs rgyas chos bstan ces/ /'di skad tshig brjod de dag
spyod yul 'di yin no/ /srid pa'i mtshos g.yengs sems can rab tu mang ba dag /mtha' ma mi mthong skyabs med do zhes mi dga' ba/ /mthong nas brtson 'grus stobs
bskyed chos kyi gru sbyar cing / /pha rol su 'gro zhes brjod de dag spyod yul 'di 'o/ /sems can rtsa ba med la gnas pa mi mkhas kun/ /g.yang sa chen
por lhung zhing sems nyams rmongs mthong nas/ /snying rjes chos kyi zam la mkhas pa su dgod cing / /dran par gyis shes su smra de dag spyod yul 'di 'o/ /shin tu dog pa'i
brtson rar sdug bsngal sems can rnams/ /na dang rga bas gzir cing tsham gyis mnar ba dag /mthong nas bdag gis thabs kyi chos rnams kun brtsams te/ /sems
can kun 'grol sems dpa' de dag spyod yul 'di 'o/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad thos gyur the tshom ma med/ /chos dbyings spyod yul phyogs bcu kun tu rgyas
bkang ste/ /'di dag thams cad brtags na gsog kyang mi gzigs shing / /sems can kun la snyoms byed de yi spyod yul lo/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten
gyi khams de dag nas 'das te shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas so/ /
/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya snang
bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams
tshad med pa snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar bya so/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi
khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa dag kyang snang bar byas so/ /'jig
rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang snang bar bya so/ /gzhung de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang
de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de
bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nas steng gi phyogs kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba
stong snang bar byas nas nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang bar byas so/ /de ltar phyogs bcu shin tu rgyas par byas nas chos
kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas gzhung de bzhin
du 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ril gyis bstan
to| |ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par
snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang
ngo / /thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ong par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad
kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi
khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de
dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed
sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don
'di nyid brjod do/ /gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /bskal pa gzhal yas
bsam gyis mi khyab sems kyi skad cig la/ /gang gis mthong yang bsags med 'gro dang dngos po'i tshul med pa'i/ /lam du rab tu 'jug pa de na thams cad shes 'gyur
te| |stobs bcus tshul 'di ji ltar mkhyen bzhin 'jigs med sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /grags pa snyan par phyogs rnams kun tu mtshungs med grags gyur cing / /bgegs
rnams kun las 'das te chos nyid 'di la dgar spyad de/ /tshad med thams cad so sor zhi zhing don rnams kun rtogs pas/ /de phyir phyogs rnams kun bkang bde gshegs
chos nyid 'di ston to/ /dgongs pa ji bzhin de ni spyod pa'i 'bras bu mthun pa ste/ /'jig rten don 'gyur de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa yang byas
shing / /de dag thams cad so sor mthun par ye shes rnams bsgoms pas/ /sems can dam pa sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra phyogs bcur ston/ /thog mar nyan 'dod
bla ma bsnyen bkur bzod pa des byas shing / /rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab rtog bsam gtan bsnyen byed pa/ /bde gshegs nyid ni rtogs 'gyur 'gro ba rnam sgom
sems tshim byed/ /chos nyid de 'dra spyod pa myur du bde gshegs thob par 'gyur/ /snying nas 'dri zhing phyogs rnams rgyal byed rtse gcig thub byed cing / /rgyal ba'i
yon tan mos las mi ldog spyod pas tshim byed pa/ /dngos dang dngos med thams cad shes byas spangs shing dngos zad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas bdag med dpe med mthong ba
de dag lus 'di yin/ /bzang po'i spyod yul can gyi sems kyis phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing / /zhing rnams thams cad chos kyi gter gyis khyab byas tshim byed pa//
ji bzhin chos gnas chos nyid mtha' la the tshom med pa rnams/ /stobs bcu ci 'dra de bzhin gyur pa'i lus ni 'di dag go /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang sgra brjod
de la 'jug byed cing / /chos kyi 'khor lo ji bzhin blta dka' gzhal yas rtag bskor ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung kun byang chub yan lag rtogs/ /de ltar
'jug pas rtag tu sangs rgyas sku rab 'di dag mthong / /mthong yang mig gi rnam shes tshul du rdul med mthong ba med/ /rnam shes sgyu ma bzhin pas mig stong stobs bcu mi mthong
ngo / /'du shes thams cad rnam rtog yin gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba min/ /shin tu chags med yul med de ni rgyal ba mthong ba yin/ /sems can las mang bsags pa de dag shin
tu blta dka' ste/ /nang dang phyi dang dbyibs dang mdog tu phyogs bcu kun na med/ /de bzhin rang byung sku ni gzhal yas phyogs rnams kun 'gengs pa/ /shes par dka' ba
'dren pa chen po bsgribs pa med pas brnyes/ /nam mkha' dag la zhing rnams bye ba dngos por gnas par snang / /de nas 'ong ba med cing phyogs bcu kun tu 'gro ba med/ /gcig
cing gnas par 'gyur yang de dag ci la'ang gnas pa med/ /de bzhin rang byung rnams kyi sku ni mkha' dbyings rtag tu 'gengs/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas
phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer las rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i le'u ste/ bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa'
'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ rang bzhin gcig pa'i sems la bye brag
tha dad pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'di lta ste/ bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan song du 'gro ba dang / dbang po tshang ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / skye ba mthun pa dang / skye ba
mi mthun pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bde ba myong ba dang / sdug bsngal myong ba snang ba dag la ltos/ las kyis ni/ sems mi shes so/ /sems kyis ni/ las mi
shes so| |tshor bas ni/ rnam par smin pa mi shes so/ /rnam par smin pas ni/ tshor ba mi shes so/ /sems kyis ni/ tshor ba mi shes so/ /tshor bas ni/ sems mi shes
so| |rgyus ni/ rkyen mi shes so/ /rkyen gyis ni/ rgyu mi shes so/ /dngos pos ni/ dmigs pa mi shes so/ /dmigs pas ni/ dngos po mi shes so/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sangs rgyas dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sems can bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ /gang 'di yongs su dris pa dag/
chos rnams chos nyid ci 'dra ba/ /'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis/ /chos rnams 'di dag g.yo ba med/ /shin tu dngos po med pa ste/ /de phyir gzhan gyis
gzhan dag gi /ngo bo nyid kyang mi shes so/ /ji ltar chu klung rgyud kyi rnams/ /gzhan dang gzhan du 'grogs rgyu yang / /gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te/ /chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin
no| |ji ltar 'bar ba'i mtshan ma can/ /'od 'phro gzhan dang gzhan 'grogs kyang / /gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te/ /chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar rlung ni bsten tshul
gyis| |gzhan dang gzhan du rab tu rgyu/ /gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te/ /chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar sa yi khams kyi rnams/ /gcig la gcig ni gnas gyur kyang //
gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te/ /chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no/ /mig dang rna ba sna dag dang / /lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnams/ /'di dag las ni rgyu 'khod kyang / /byed pa
po ni gang yang med/ /'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa yis/ /'byung ba nye bar bstan byas kyang / /bstan par byas pa gang yang med/ /bstan pa la ni dngos med de/ /mig ni
rang bzhin nyid kyis stong / /rna ba sna yang rang bzhin gyis/ /lce dang lus dang yid rnams kyang / /med de yongs su brtags pa yin/ /gang zhig rang bzhin dngos med par/ /
tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed pa/ /de yi mig la 'khrul pa med/ /chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /yang dag pa dang yang dag min/ /bden nam 'on te rdzun yang rung / /'jig
rten 'das dang 'jig rten kun/ /tshig gi lam gyis brjod pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal la 'di
skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sems can thams cad sems can med mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems can 'dul ba'i dus la ji ltar 'bab
pa dang / sems can gyi tshe ji lta ba dang / lus ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang / mtshan ma ji lta ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba
dang | sems ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi sems can 'dul ba'i phyir mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal gyis byang chub
sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang rnams rab tu zhi spyod cing / /thos dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yin/ /'di don ci 'dra de bzhin du/ /'jam dpal
bdag las mnyan par gyis/ /bdag gi lus la su gnas shes/ /gang gis nad ni rab shes pa/ /yang dag yod dam med pa'i don/ /des ni rab tu shes pa yin/ /lus
kyi rnam par dgod pa ni/ /phyogs na mi gnas brjod pa yin/ /de bas shes pa de gnas la/ /nam yang chags par mi byed do/ /lus ni rnam par spyod pa yis/ /dngos po kun
kyang rnam par bsgoms/ /sems ni phyir ldog mi 'gyur te/ /dngos po kun ni brtags pa'o/ /gang gi tshe ni rjes su 'brang / /gang gi tshe ni phyir ldog 'gyur/ /ji ltar mgal
me 'khor lo yi/ /thog ma tha ma 'khor ba bzhin/ /dngos po thams cad mi rtag par/ /skye bo gang rnams rtog pa yang / /lus la bdag kyang med pa'i phyir/ /'du shes phyir yang
ldog par 'gyur/ /bdag med rmi lam lta bu yi/ /las ni kun tu rab tu 'byung / /rnam par smin pas rab tu 'byung / /phyi ma ji bzhin sngon de bzhin/ /sems ni dbang byed yin par
bshad| |dad pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du/ /tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log/ 'jig rten thams cad ston par byed/ /ji snyed 'jig rten brda yod pa/ /de dag thams cad brtags
pa ste| |chos nyid de ni nam du yang / /chos gcig la yang mi gnas so/ /rkyen rnams la ni rten bcas te/ /chos rnams so sor rab tu 'byung / /de dag ldog par de bzhin
'gyur| |phyi ma ji bzhin sngon de bzhin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i
sras dag/ sems can thams cad kyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams yongs su 'dzin pa med cing bdag gi med la mnyam pa yin yang 'on kyang bde ba'i tshor ba dag kyang snang /
sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag kyang snang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa dang / nang du byed pa dang / phyi rol tu byed pa dang / tshor ba
chung ba dang / tshor ba che ba dang / tshe 'di la myong ba dang / tshe gzhan la myong ba dag kyang snang la/ chos kyi dbyings la ni/ yid du 'ong ba'am/ yid du mi 'ong ba yang med pa 'di
ci zhig |de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar las rnams byas gyur pa/ /tshor ba de
bzhin 'byung 'gyur gyi/ /'di la byed pa gang yang med/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/ /shin tu phyis pa'i me long la/ /de ni ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin/ /de la de ni de
bzhin snang / /chos kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar zhing dang sa bon dag /gcig gis gcig ni mi shes kyang / /rang bzhin nye bar ston par byed/ /las kyi rang
bzhin de bzhin no/ /sgyu ma byed pa mkhas pa zhig /lam po cher ni song 'dug ste/ /gzugs rnams ston par byed pa bzhin/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar
shing gi 'khrul 'khor rnams/ /sna tshogs sgra mang rjod byed kyang / /de ni bdag dang bdag med min/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar bya rnams mang po yi/ /
sgo nga'i sbubs ni phye ba las/ /sgra skad gzhan dang gzhan 'gyur ba/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar ma yi mngal du yang / /bu ni 'pho bar mi 'gyur te/ /'on kyang dbang
po sna tshogs 'gyur/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar sems dmyal 'jigs pa na/ /gshin rje'i ris gtogs sdug bsngal ba/ /de dag la ni 'ong ba med/ /las kyi
rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar rin chen mchog rnams dang / /lha yi bu rnams kun ldan yang / /'pho bar snang ba gang yang med/ /de bzhin las kyi rang bzhin no/ /ji ltar
'jig rten la la dag /bsam gyis mi khyab 'bar gyur kyang / /de dag 'ong ba gang yang med/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis
byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig mngon par sangs rgyas na/ 'on kyang chos tshad med
pa yang yang dag par ston zhing tshad med pa yang rnam par ston/ sems can tshad med pa yang rab tu ston/ gsung tshad med pa yang shin tu sgrog /sku tshad med pa yang shin tu ston/
bsam pa tshad med pa yang thugs su chud/ rdzu 'phrul tshad med pa yang yang dag par ston/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa yang shin tu skyong / rgyan tshad med pa yang byin gyis
rlob| spyod yul tshad med pa yang shin tu ston la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam pa tha dad du mi snang ba 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan
dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gnas 'di shes par dka' ba ste/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis bdag la dris/ /de ni mkhas pas rnam
par shes/ /yon tan mos pa dpyod par byed/ /ji ltar sa ni gcig pu yang / /sems can mang po rab tu rgyu/ /de la gcig dang tha dad med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /
ji ltar me ni gcig pu yang / /'jig rten kun na kun kyang 'bud/ /de la me lce tha dad med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho gcig pu las/ /chu klung tshad
med 'bab gyur kyang / /de la chu yi bye brag med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar rlung ni gcig pu yang / /'jig rten kun tu rgyu zhing ldang / /de la gcig dang tha
dad med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /sprin chen rnams ni 'brug bsgrags shing / /sa rnams kun kyang ngoms par byed/ /de yi char la bye brag med/ /sangs rgyas chos
nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar sa ni gcig pu yang / /myu gu sna tshogs 'byin cing ston/ /sa la bye brag 'byed pa med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar sgrib med nyi ma
ni| |phyogs bcu kun na snang bar byed/ /de la 'od zer tha dad med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i zla ba ni/ /'jig rten kun la rab tu snang / /gnas nas
'gyur ba gang yang med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar tshangs pa mi mjed bdag /stong gsum na ni 'dug mod kyi/ /de la lus ni bye brag med/ /sangs rgyas chos
nyid de bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs
pa la dge ba bskyed par gcig kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can rnams gzugs sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / rigs sna tshogs dang /
dbang po sna tshogs dang / longs spyod sna tshogs dang / dbang sna tshogs dang / 'khor sna tshogs dang / phyug dbul sna tshogs dang / yon tan sna tshogs dang / shes rab sna tshogs
su'ang snang la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gang la'ang mi mnyam pa'am/ tha dad du dgongs pa gang yang med na 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal gyis
byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar sa ni ro gcig kyang / /sa bon tshul bzhin myu gu ston/ /byams dang sdang bar sems pa med/ /
sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no/ /ji ltar chu ni ro gcig kyang / /snod kyi dbang gis rnam par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ /rgyud kyi rnams
la rnam par 'gyur/ /ji ltar sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ni/ /rtag tu 'khor kyang mgu bar byed/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ /shin tu sbyangs pa dga' bar byed/ /ji ltar
mkhas pa'i rgyal po dag/ 'gro ba mang po shes par byed/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ /ji ltar bskyed bzhin shes par byed/ /ji ltar dri med me long la/ /ci 'dra'i
gzugs rnams de bzhin snang / /de bzhin sems can bsam tshul du/ /sangs rgyas yon phul rnam dag 'gyur/ /ji ltar dug phan sman gyi rnams/ /dug nad thams cad
sos par byed/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ /nyon mongs dug ni chen po sel/ /ji ltar nyi ma shar ba ni/ /'gro ba 'di dag snang bar byed/ /mun pa dag kyang rnam
par sel/ /sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no/ /ji ltar zla ba dri med pa/ /kun tu mnyam pa nyid byas te/ /sa ni rab tu snang bar byed/ /sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no/ /
ji ltar chu yi stobs shugs kyis/ /sa ri thams cad g.yo 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin du/ /srid gsum 'khor ba rnams kyang skyong / /'bar dang 'od 'phro
bcas pa'i me/ /thams cad dag tu sreg pa'i dngos/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ /'du byed thams cad sreg par byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis
byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa gcig na/ thams cad lta ba mthun pas nyon mongs
pa thams cad spong bar ci'i phyir mi 'gyur/ de dag kun la yang gzugs ni/ gzugs nyid du zad/ tshor ba yang tshor ba nyid du zad/ 'du shes kyang 'du shes nyid du zad/ 'du byed
rnams kyang 'du byed rnams nyid du zad/ rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa nyid du zad/ 'dod pa'i khams kyang 'dod pa'i khams nyid du zad/ gzugs kyi khams kyang
gzugs kyi khams nyid du zad/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyang gzugs med pa'i khams nyid du zad/ ma rig pa yang ma rig pa nyid du zad/ sred pa yang sred pa nyid du zad la/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang phan par byed pa'am/ gnod par byed pa ma yin na/ de ci'i phyir/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal gyis byang chub sems
dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ de ltar khyod kyis gang dris pa/ /la la myur du rnam grol zhing / /la la dka' bar 'grol 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas sras po
bdag la nyon/ /'di ni dpag tu med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bstan gyi nyes ma yin/ /dad dang brtson 'grus nan tan gyis/ /rtag tu khyad par 'gyur ba yin/ /
ji ltar rtsa dang shing gsher ba/ /mer bcug shin tu nyam chung zhing / /ring por mi thogs 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar gtsubs nas gtsubs pa'i
tshe| |ma byung ba ni myur bteg na/ /myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ba bzhin/ /de ltar le lo bstan pa la/ /nyi ma'i nor bu lci ba la/ /yang dang yang bzhag bteg pa ni/ /de la me
'byung mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i tshe/ /byis pa rnams ni mig btsums shing / /mi mthong ci phyir zhes smra ba/ /de bzhin le lo bstan
pa la| |rkang lag med par skyes pa'i mi/ /ji ltar smyig mnga' kha bug gis/ /sa ni dbug par 'dod pa bzhin/ /de ltar le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar byis pas rgya mtsho las//
yang dang yang du bcus byas shing / /skam par la la 'dod pa ltar/ /de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar bum pa chus bkang bzhin/ /bskal pa'i me ni byung ba'i tshe/ /la la
gsad par 'dod pa ltar/ /de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar la la phyogs bcu yi/ /nam mkha' ji snyed tha mal pa'i/ /gzugs kyis rgyas par dgang smra ba/ /de bzhin
le lo bstan pa la/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ chos kyi tshul nyon mongs pa
thams cad skem pa 'di nyid blangs kyang sems can la la 'dod chags kyi dbang du 'gro/ la la zhe sdang gi dbang du 'gro/ la la gti mug gi dbang du 'gro/ nga rgyal gyi dbang du 'gro/ 'chab pa'i dbang
du 'gro/ 'khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang du 'gro/ phrag dog gi dbang du 'gro /ser sna'i dbang du 'gro /sgyu'i dbang du 'gro zhing / g.yo'i dbang du 'gro la/ chos de dag kyang sems med par gzung du yang
mi nus te/ nyon mongs par gdags pa kun gyi rnam pa kun tu sems kyi rgyud du zad na/ de ji lta bu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang gi don du dris pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas sras po nga las nyon/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di/ /thos pa tsam gyis mi 'grub bo/ /la
la stobs med chu klung gis/ /nad kyis khyer bar gyur pa dag /skom zhing shi bar gyur pa bzhin/ /ma bsgoms chos kyang de bzhin no/ /ji ltar 'gro ba mang po la/ /zas dang
skom dag sbyin byas kyang / /bdag nyid bkres pas shi ba ltar/ /de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o/ /ji ltar sman pa la la zhig /sman rnams thams cad bdog bzhin du/ /
lto yi nad kyis shi ba bzhin/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /ji ltar dbyig gi mdzod dag tu/ /rin chen mang po bgrang byed kyang / /nam phyed tsam yang
mi 'thob pa/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /ji ltar bde ba kun ldan pa'i/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor skyes kyang / /zas dang skom dag mi bdog pa/ /de bzhin chos la ma
bsgoms pa'o/ /ji ltar 'on pa rol mo yi/ /sil snyan glu la mkhas pa zhig /gzhan dag de yis dga' byed pa/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /ji ltar dmus long ri
mo mkhan/ /tshong dus dbus su 'brir 'jug kyang / /bdag nyid kyis ni mi mthong ba/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /ji ltar mtsho chen mnyan pa zhig /skye bo mang po
sgrol byed kyang / /bdag nyid de nang 'chi 'gyur ba/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /ji ltar lam gyi bzhi mdor yang / /phun sum tshogs pa kun brjod cing / /bdag gis
thob par mi 'gyur ba/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras
so| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni/ ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la la la ni/ sbyin
pa brjod pa mdzad/ la la la ni/ tshul khrims/ la la la ni/ bzod pa/ la la la ni/ brtson 'grus/ la la la ni/ bsam gtan/ la la la ni/ shes rab brjod pa mdzad/ la la la ni/
byams pa/ la la la ni/ snying rje/ la la la ni/ dga' ba/ la la la ni/ btang snyoms brjod pa mdzad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni/ chos gcig 'gas
'byung bar mi nus so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sems can gzhan gyi bsam shes pa//
ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste/ /de ltar gang gi don dris pa/ /sangs rgyas sras po bdag las nyon/ /smra ba'i mchog ni gang yang rung / /chos gcig gis ni byung ba med/ /gang yang
'byung ba yod pa min/ /'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin med/ /skal pa gang la gnas pa yi/ /bsam pa mkhyen nas don mdzad cing / /gang la ci dag tshul mthun pa/ /de bzhin
chos kyang bstan pa mdzad/ /ser sna can la sbyin pa brjod/ /tshul khrims ngan la tshul khrims rnams/ /mi bzod la ni bzod dang des/ /brtson 'grus 'byor pa le lo la'o/ /
rnam par 'khrugs la bsam gtan brjod/ /shes rab 'byor ba shes med la'o/ /gdug pa'i sems la byams pa bshad/ /'tshe ba rnams la snying rje ste/ /zhum pa la ni
dga' ba bshad/ /'khor ba'i sems la btang snyoms te/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyang / /rim pas de ltar 'byung ba yin/ /ji ltar sa la
