las bya ba/ /khyim gyi dngos la rim pa yin/ /de bzhin sbyin pa tshul khrims dag /byang chub sems dpa'i thog mar 'gro /rgyal ba'i gnas dang grong rdal rnams/ /rub pa'i
phyir ni ra ba ste/ /de bzhin bzod pa brtson 'grus dag /byang chub sems dpa' rub phyir ro/ /ji ltar gdugs gcig rgyal po ni/ /sa rnams thams cad skyong bar byed/ /
de bzhin bsam gtan shes rab dag /byang chub sems dpa'i skyabs bzhin no/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/ /bde ba thams cad ster ba ltar/ /de bzhin tshangs
pa'i gnas rnams kyang / /byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba 'byin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'byung ba gcig na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dag 'di ltar
'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can 'dul ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / tshe'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'od kyi
dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'khor tshogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / bstan pa'i tshul rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos
kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam pa tha dad pa dag ci'i phyir snang bar gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ chos kyi rgyal po'i chos nyid
ni| |'jam dpal rtag tu gcig pa ste/ /bsgribs pa med pa gzigs pa yi/ /'byung ba de yang gcig pu 'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sku gcig ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos
kyi sku| |shes rab thugs kyang gcig pa ste/ /mi 'jigs stobs kyang de bzhin no/ /sngon chad byang chub zhugs pa'i tshe/ /ji ltar yongs su bsngo mdzad pa/ /'khor du chos rnams
bstan pa dang / /de dag zhing yang de bzhin 'gyur/ /zhing gi phun sum gang yod pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams la thams cad 'grub/ /sems can ji ltar sbyangs pa rnams/ /de yi rnam
pa de ltar mthong / /ji ltar sangs rgyas chos nyid du/ /kun gyis sangs rgyas mi mthong ste/ /sangs rgyas zhing dang sku dag dang / /'khor du chos bstan de bzhin no/ /gang rnam
smon lam mthun ldan zhing / /sngon chad bsam pa yongs sbyangs pas/ /thams cad gzigs pa'i tshul gyi rnams/ /ji lta ba bzhin thams cad mthong / /sems
can bsam pa ji bzhin dang / /las dang stobs kyang ji bzhin pa/ /de lta de ltar mthong 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam 'phrul lo/ /sangs rgyas zhing la rtog mi mnga'/ /
de dag byams sdang yod pa min/ /bsam pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du/ /srog chags rnams kyis de bzhin mthong / /rnam pa tha dad 'jig rten khams/ /de ltar snang bar gyur
pa de| |drang srong chen po kun gzigs pa'i/ /nyes pa'i skyon las gyur pa med/ /gang na 'dul ba yod pa yi/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/ /skyes bu drang srong
rnams kyang snang / /de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bdag cag gis rang rang gi spobs pa bstan pa rnams smras pa yin na/ da khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul las brtsams te
spobs par gyis shig /sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi yul ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshogs ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gro ba ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul
la 'jug pa ni/ ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud pa'i shes pa ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su 'gro ba ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul shin tu bstan pa ni/ gang / sangs
rgyas kyi yul shes par byed pa ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rtogs pa ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshul ni/ ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ ji tsam du yangs/ de nas byang
chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ nam mkha'i yul dang 'dra ba ste/ /kun tu 'od la 'dra ba med/ /sems
can thams cad 'jug pa ste/ /chos nyid la ni 'jug pa med/ /tshogs rnams thams cad bstan par ni/ /bskal pa bye bar mi nus te/ /ji snyed rgyal ba'i tshogs mnga' ba/ /de ni
sangs rgyas yul yin no/ /blo gros sems kyang de bzhin du/ /sems can thams cad rab tu 'jug/ de la bstan pa thogs pa med/ /de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no/ /'jig
rten thams cad 'jug pa dang / /'jig rten rgyu ba gang yod pa/ /de dag kun la ye shes gnas/ /gzugs su snang ba ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas ye shes chags med de/ /dus
gsum kun la chags pa med/ /nam mkha' 'byung dang mtshungs pa yin/ /de ni ye shes yul yin no/ /chos kyi dbyings ni tha mi dad/ /sems can khams rnams rtogs
par mkhyen/ /dbyings rnams thams cad rab tu brnyes/ /de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no/ /sgrar gdags ji snyed yod pa dang / /sems can kun gyi sgra
skad du| |sgra la mkhyen pa thugs chud kyang / /rnam par rtog pa gang yang med/ /rnam shes rnam par shes bya med/ /sems kyis brjod pa'ang ma yin te/ /ye shes rang
bzhin shin tu dag/ sems can rnams la'ang rab tu bshad/ /nyon mongs med cing las med de/ /dngos po med cing gnas pa med/ /snang ba med cing rgyu ba med/ /
'jig rten dag tu'ang mnyam par spyod/ /sems can kun gyi sems kyi rnams/ /dus gsum kun tu rab yangs pa/ /sems gcig la ni rab 'jug pas/ /sangs rgyas
rnams kyi ye shes 'jug/ de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / chos kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / las kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang /
'jig rten gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / lus kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / dbang po'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / skye ba'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa
dang | tshul khrims log pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur te/
ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rab tu snang bar gyur pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs
med pa| bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis
klas pa| nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad na yang sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar
du de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du
byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
dang | de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam
gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i
dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du de
dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpa'
dris pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bco lnga pa'o// //bam po bco brgyad pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa'
'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar na kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yi/ kha na ma tho
ba med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par ma nyams
pa yin| yid kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ lus kyi las ma smad pa yin/ ngag gi las ma smad pa yin/ yid kyi las ma smad pa yin/ lus kyi las mi 'phrog
pa yin| ngag gi las mi 'phrog pa yin/ yid kyi las mi 'phrog pa yin/ lus kyi las mi zlog pa yin/ ngag gi las mi zlog pa yin/ yid kyi las mi zlog pa yin/
lus kyi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ ngag gi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ yid kyi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ lus kyi las bsngags pa yin/ ngag gi las bsngags pa yin/ yid
kyi las bsngags pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par dag pa yin/ yid kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/ lus kyi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med
pa yin| ngag gi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ yid kyi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ ngag gi las ye shes sngon
du 'gro ba yin/ yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rus phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin/ gzugs phun
sum tshogs pa yin/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ dran pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/
dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros mchog tu gyur pa yin/ blo gros dam par gyur pa yin/ blo gros rab tu gyur pa yin/ blo gros
tshad med pa yin/ blo gros grangs med pa yin/ blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ blo gros mtshungs pa med pa yin/ blo gros gzhal du med pa yin/ blo gros brjod
du med pa yin/ rgyu'i stobs can yin/ bsam pa'i stobs can yin/ sbyor ba'i stobs can yin/ rkyen gyi stobs can yin/ dmigs pa'i stobs
can yin/ dbang po'i stobs can yin/ rnam par lta ba'i stobs can yin/ zhi gnas kyi stobs can yin/ lhag mthong gi stobs can yin/ nges par rtogs pa'i
stobs can yin/ phung po la mkhas pa yin/ khams la mkhas pa yin/ skye mched la mkhas pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'dod pa'i
khams la mkhas pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams la mkhas pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la mkhas pa yin/ 'das pa la mkhas pa yin/ ma 'ongs pa la mkhas
pa yin| da ltar byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la
mkhas pa yin/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ rab tu byang ba
yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan
lag la mkhas pa yin/ stong pa nyid yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ mtshan ma med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ smon pa med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
pa yin| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ btang snyoms kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa shes par bya ba khong
du chud pa yin/ dbang po dang / brtson 'grus tha dad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa khong du chud pa yin/ khams sna tshogs dang / khams du ma'i shes
par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsam gtan
dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba shes par bya ba khong du chud pa
yin| bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i mig chags pa med pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/
bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ klu'i dbang pos yongs su bzung
ba yin| gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ dri za'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ nam mkha'
lding gi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi'am ci'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos yongs
su bzung ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lha'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ klu'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos bkur
ba yin| dri za'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ nam mkha'i lding gi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ mi'am ci'i dbang pos bkur ba
yin| lto 'phye chen pos dbang pos bkur ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa
yin| skyabs su gyur pa yin/ dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin/ mgon du gyur pa yin/ sgron mar gyur pa yin/ snang bar gyur pa yin/ 'od du gyur pa yin/ 'dren par gyur pa
yin| rnam par 'dren par gyur pa yin/ yongs su 'dren par gyur pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa yin/ gtso bor gyur pa yin/ thu bor gyur pa yin/ rab tu
gyur pa yin/ dam par gyur pa yin/ phul du gyur pa yin/ bla na med pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyam pa med pa yin/ de skad
ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ khyod de ltar skye bo mang
po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bde bar rnam par gzud pa'i
phyir zhugs shing / de ltar khyod rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas dag yongs su dri bar sems pa ni/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ legs so/ /legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub
sems dpa' dag gi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur
pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa
dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi lam du 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems kyang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta
ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba yang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur
ba dang / kun tu bzang zhing kun tu mdzes pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing srog chags thams cad la ston pa
gnyis par 'gyur ba'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang
ldan pas/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
sras| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe sems can thams cad rang bzhin shes pa dang ldan pas/ khyim gyi thibs pos zil gyis mi non par
gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /pha ma dang 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad/ skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang
'grogs par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /bu dang bu mo dang 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa dang shin tu bral bas dga' ba dang / mi
dga' ba dang / rnam par bral bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol
tu phyin pas 'dod pa'i gsal shing rnam par sel bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /glu dang / gar dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
sems can thams cad gar mkhan gyi tshon lta bur mthong ba dang ldan zhing chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i brjod pa rab tu thob par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /chung ma'i 'khor
gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i gsal shing dang bral zhing / 'phags pa'i sar tshud par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /rgyan
gyis brgyan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad srid par 'byung ba 'jig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khur bor bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /khang thog
tu phyin pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par khong du chud cing / chos kyi khang steng du phyin par gyur cig/
ces sems bskyed do/ /sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdag gir bya ba med de/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems med cing bdag gi thams
cad yongs su gtong bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /ma bral zhing 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar
phyin te| 'du ba dang shin tu bral bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /btson ra la kha na ma tho bar mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas
med pa la spyod cing gang du dga' bar 'dong bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /khyim nas khyim med par 'byung ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
sems bcings pa dang grol ba med cing / chags pa med de/ mi dgos pa dang bral bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /dge 'dun gyi ra ba'i mtshams 'da' ba'i
tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gal ba med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing mthun par 'gro ba mang po dang ldan par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /mkhan
po dang slob dpon gyi drung du 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la rtsom zhing cho ga la mkhas par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /rab tu 'byung bar
gsol ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bar chad med cing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /gos dkar po 'dor ba'i tshe byang
chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sdig pa la brtson pa spangs te dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu sbyangs par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /skra dang kha spu 'breg pa'i tshe byang
chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing nyon mongs pa med par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /gos ngur smrig gon pa'i tshe byang chub sems
dpas sems can thams cad drang srong chen po'i sems dang ldan zhing rnyog pa med par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /rab tu 'byung ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
sems can rnams skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas la skyabs su
'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dge ba la mos pa mngon par bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad pa'i don du brtson par gyur cig /ces
sems bskyed do/ /chos la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos kyi gter rab tu thob par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed
do| |dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chags pa'i gnas dang bral zhing dge 'dun yongs su sdud par gyur cig /ces
sems bskyed do/ /bslab pa'i tshig yang dag par len pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad tshul bzang po la yang dag par spyod cing / bslab pa thams
cad shin tu bslab par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad log pa ma yin pa'i las
la spyod cing tshul dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /mkhan pos bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing mi skye ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems
dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin te thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /gtsug lag
khang du 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'phrog pa'i chos can du gyur te bla na med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do//
stan 'ding ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing legs par bkod pa'i chos can du gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /'dug
pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi gnas pa'i sems kyis snying po byang chub la 'dug par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /skyil mo krung 'cha' ba'i
tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi g.yo ba'i sa la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /zhi gnas yongs su sbyor bar byed
pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa la brtson zhing zhi ba dang / dul ba la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /
lhag mthong yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos can du gyur te/ chos yang dag pa ji lta ba
bzhin du mthong bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /skyil mo krung 'jig pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par gzhag cing 'du byed
thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa rnam par mthong bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /rkang mthil gzhog pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad sems rnam par grol ba mi 'khrugs pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /rkang mthil 'degs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan pa thob ste 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba las 'thon par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /smad g.yogs gyon pa'i tshe
byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang ldan zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed
do| |ska rags 'ching ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu 'brel bar gyur cig /ces
sems bskyed do/ /bla gos gyon pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste gong nas gong du dge
ba'i rtsa ba thob par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /sbyar ma gyon pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te
thabs dam pas mngon par bkab par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /so shing len pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dngos po
thob pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /so shing za ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa shin
tu bcom ste sems dul zhing sems dag par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /dben par 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang /
zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs te sdig pa'i chos thams cad spangs par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /chu ngogs su 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu byang bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /gtsang sbra'i las byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
shin tu dag pa'i dngos pos gtsang zhing nges pa dang ldan par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /lag pa 'khru ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs
rgyas kyi chos thams cad gzung zhing bcang ba'i phyir bkra shis kyi lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /ngo 'khru ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa dang bral zhing / chos thams cad kyi sgo rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /'khar
ba len pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mchod sbyin byas shing lam ston par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed de/ /lhung bzed len pa'i tshe byang
chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis mchod par 'os shing snod du gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /spyod yul du mngon par zhugs
pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la mngon du phyogs par gyur cig /ces sems
bskyed do/ /lam du zhugs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad phyi na ma lus par 'gro zhing sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs par gyur cig /ces sems
bskyed do/ /'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos bsgribs pa med pa grub par gyur pas chos kyi dbyings mtha'
dang dbus med pa khong du chud par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /lam mtho ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu zhum pa
med de khams gsum las gyen du 'phags par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /lam dma' ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dge ba'i
rtsa bas shin tu brtan cing sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu 'dud par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /lam nyam nga ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can
thams cad lta ba yo zhing mi drang ba dang bral te nyam nga ba yongs su spangs par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /lam drang po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad g.yo med cing sgyu med de sems drang po dang ldan par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /lam rdul chen po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can
thams cad shin tu rdul med pa'i chos yang dag par thob ste 'dod chags par gyur pa'i chos las rnam par grol bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /rdul med pa'i
lam mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa dang ldan zhing sems 'jam par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed
do| |g.yang sa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa rtogs par khong du chud cing sdig pa'i chos thams cad bsal te dge ba'i
chos la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /'khor mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dus
gsum du gtogs pa'i chos zab mo bstan pa dang mthun par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /ka ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
khro zhing 'khon du 'dzin pa dang bral te khengs pa dang / 'khrug pa dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems
dpas sems can thams cad lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /ri mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
sems can thams cad thob par dka' ba dang / thibs po med pa rab tu thob cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par gyur cig/ ces sems
bskyed do/ /shing tsher ma can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug med cing tsher ma dang bral bar
gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /shing lo ma can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting
nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis rab tu g.yogs par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /me tog mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
cad chos thams cad mngon par shes pa'i me tog rgyas pas me tog lta bur gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /me tog gi shing mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi me tog shin tu rgyas par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /shing tog mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad snying po byang chub tu gzhol zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba thams cad 'bras bu yod de/ 'bras bu'i dam pa rab tu thob par gyur cig /ces sems
bskyed do/ /chu klung mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyams su myong ste chos kyi rgyun la mnyam par gzhag par gyur cig/ ces
sems bskyed do/ /lu ma mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis khong du chud
par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /rdzing bu mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi tshig shin tu bstan pa la mkhas shing chos
thams cad kyis rgyas pa'i tshig gi las dang ldan par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /khron pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad chos thams cad 'byor pa dang ldan zhing spobs pa mang bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /mtsho mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can
thams cad gong nas gong du dmigs pa la rab tu brtson zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /zam pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
sems can thams cad skye pa thams cad yongs su bsgral ba la zam par red par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /yur ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can
thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi sems dang bsam pa la mkhas shing / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas 'khor ba med par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /ra ba mthong ba'i
tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la sred pa rab tu byang bar gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /mya
ngan med pa'i nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa shin tu med cing mya ngan med pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ ces sems
bskyed do/ /bza' shing gi ra ba mthong pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su mi gtang ba la shin tu brtson par gyur cig/ ces
sems bskyed do/ /sems can rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par gyur
cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /rgyan med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas rgyan med par
gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /dga' ba mang ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' zhing mos pa dang / spro bas
dga' ba mang bar gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /mi dga' ba mang ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dus byas kyi dngos po
thams cad la mi dga' ba mang bar gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /sems can bde ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i
yo byed thams cad rab tu thob pas shin tu bde bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
ye shes kyi rtsa ba rab tu thob ste sdug bsngal zhi bar byed par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /nad med pa ma yin pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe
byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan med pa'i chos can du gyur te tha dad pa med pa khong du chud par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /sems
can sdug gu mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mos pa mang bar gyur cig/ ces sems
bskyed do/ /mi sdug pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bya ba la mos pa chung bar gyur cig/ ces
sems bskyed do/ /drin gzo ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mdzad
pa shes par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /drin gzo ba med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lta ba la drin
du gzo ba med par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /dge sbyong mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson
zhing zhi ba dang / dul ba la gzhol bar gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /bram ze mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dam par gyur te sdig pa
spangs par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /dka' thub can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson zhing dka' thub
la shin tu gzhol bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /brtul zhugs la zhugs pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su
mi gtong ba'i phyir brtul zhugs dam por gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /go gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad rang byung gi
chos yongs su btsal ba la go cha bzang po shin tu bgos par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /go ma gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can
thams cad mi dge ba'i las bya ba thams cad la go gyon pa med par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /rgol ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can
thams cad phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /'tsho ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
cad spyod lam bcos pa med cing 'tsho ba dag par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /rgyal po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
cad thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /rgyal po'i bu mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
cad sangs rgyas kyi sras chos las skyes pa'i chos kyi sprul par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /khyim bdag mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
rnam par gdon mi za ba'i blo can du gyur te grong gi chos spangs par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /blon po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
cad mi dge ba'i chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la bzang po yid la byed par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /grong khyer mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
cad gdul dka' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ mthu bo che'i lus dang 'dra bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /rgyal po'i gnas mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems
dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi rjes su 'brang bar mthun pa la mos pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /nags tshal gyi 'dabs
mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bsngags par 'os par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /slong du 'gro ba'i tshe
byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings su chud par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /sgor phyin pa'i tshe byang chub sems
dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sgor phyin par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /nang du phyin pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
cad sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dus gsum du mnyam pa nyid kyi nang du phyin par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /mi sbyin no/ /zhes ma byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad bsod nams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing spangs pa med par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /mi sbyin no/ /zhes byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las phyir spangs par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /lhung bzed stong pa mthong
ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis stong par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /lhung bzed gang ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub
sems dpas sems can thams cad chos dkar po thams cad kyis yongs su rgyas par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /rim gror byas pa'i tshe byang
chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la rim gro byed par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /rim gror ma byas pa'i tshe byang chub
sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos mchod pa thams cad la rag ma lus par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /khrel yod pa'i sems can mthong
ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dbang po dben pa'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing khrel yod par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /ngo tsha med pa'i sems
can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad byams pa la gnas shing ngo tsha med pa yongs su spangs par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /kha zas
bsod pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing smon lam thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ ces
sems bskyed do/ /kha zas mi bsod pa thob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin nyams su bde ba thams cad thob par gyur cig/ ces
sems bskyed do/ /kha zas snum bag thob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sems 'jam par gyur
cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /snum bag med pa'i kha zas thob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi sred pa dang bral te snum bag med pa'i
sems su gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /kha zas za ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' bas yongs su rgyas shing
bsam gtan gyi zas za bar gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /ro myang ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i ros ngoms par gyur cing skyes bu chen
po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /zan zos pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi pha rol tu phyin
cing bya ba byas par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /chos ston pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol
zhing spobs pa mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /phyir 'byung ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyams su
myong ste khams gsum thams cad nas 'byung bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /chu 'bog pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
cad dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'bog par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /khrus byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can
thams cad 'od mtha' yas pa dang ldan zhing lus dang / sems dri ma med par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /dro ba la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad mu med par phyin te yongs su gdung ba sel bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /bsil ba la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
cad shin tu bsil bar gyur te bla na med pa'i bsil ba'i dngos po kho 'du chud par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /chos thob par byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gtam gyi rjes su 'gro zhing chos kyi dbyings dang 'dris par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba'i tshe
byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob ste bsgribs pa med pa'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces sems
bskyed do/ /mig mi 'gebs par blta ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kun tu mdzes pas kun tu bzang por gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /mchod rten
mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os shing mchod rten lta bur gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /blta ba'i tshe byang chub
sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis blta bar gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /spyi bos thug pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can
thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis spyi gtsug bltar mi snang bar gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don dang mthun par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /lan gsum du bskor ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can
thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mos pa'i rab dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yon tan mi zad par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /mtshan rnams brjod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
sems can thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la gzhol zhing yan lag dam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cing / /ces sems bskyed do/ /rkang pa 'khru
ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dri ma med pa'i mthar phyin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /lus smyong ba'i
tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsam pa la rnyog pa med cing lus kyi 'du byed shin tu bde bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /gnyid sad pa'i tshe byang chub
sems dpas sems can thams cad phyogs bcu thams cad du mthu chen po thob par gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs
rgyas su gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas
yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang / gzhan thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur zhing / lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa
dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / skye rgur bcas pa dang / lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su
bcas pa thams cad kyis mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba rnams so/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal
po che zhes bya ba las/ spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste/ bcu drug pa'o// //bam po bcu dgu pa/ yon tan yangs pa'i spyod yul yongs dag pa/ /de skad smras nas
sems can dri med pa/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub yon tan rnams/ /sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal la dris/ /spyod yul yongs dag rgyal ba'i spyod pa rnams/ /
bdag gis rgyal sras rnams la 'dir bshad do/ /yon tan spyod pa ji snyed gang yod pa/ /rgyal sras rnams la nga ni khyod kyis shod/ /bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras nyon/ /
yon tan mtha' yas de dag yon tan las/ /mtsho las thigs pa ji bzhin nyung shes shig /mgo smos tsam du chung zad brjod par bya/ /byang chub don du rang byung 'gyur bya zhes/ /thog
mar byang chub sems skyes gyur pa yi/ /yon tan brjod pa'ang mtha' yas dpag tu med/ /dpe zla med pas brjod kyang zad ma gyur/ /pha rol phyin dang sa yi yon tan la/ /bskal pa
mang por spyad pa ci zhig smos/ /de dag yon tan chu bo thams cad ni/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bstan kyang zad mi 'gyur/ /yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan las/ /dpe tsam
cha shas chung tsam brjod par bya/ /mkha' las 'dab chags lam ltar shin tu chung / /sa chen lhun las rdul phran gcig kyang 'dra/ /byang chub yon tan
bsam pa'i sems skye ba/ /rgyu med ma yin rkyen las 'byung ba yin/ /rgyal pa rnams dang bde gshegs chos rnams dang / /dge 'dun rnams la dad pa bskyed pas skye/ /de yang
'dod pa'i sred pa rgyal srid dang / /bdag bde'i don dang grags dang snyan phyir min/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus gzhil ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten phan skyed sems ni yongs su
skye| |de ni sems can rtag tu bde don dang / /zhing sbyangs sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa'i rgyur/ /yongs su chos 'dzin byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing / /ye shes rnam par sbyong ba'i sems
skye 'o| |rgyal ba kun dang chos dang dge 'dun dang / /de bzhin bla mar gyur pa thams cad la/ /dad dang mos pa dga' ba bskyed byas te/ /sri zhur mchod byas byang chub sems kyang
skye| |rgyal ba bde gshegs chos la yid ches nas/ /rgyal sras spyod pa rnams la yid ches te/ /byang chub bla na med la yid ches shing / /skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi sems skye 'o/ /
dad pa sngon 'gro ma ltar bskyed pa ste/ /yon tan thams cad yongs su skyong zhing 'dren/ /nem nur rnam sel nad las rab tu sgrol/ /dad pa bde ba'i grong du phyin par byed/ /dad pa
sems gsal rnyog pa med pa ste/ /nga rgyal rnam spangs sri zhu'i rtsa ba yin/ /dad pa spyod mchog nor dang gter yin te/ /lag pa lta bur dge sdud rtsa ba yin/ /yongs su gtong la dad
pa dga' bar byed/ /rgyal pa'i chos la dad pa spro ba skyed/ /yon tan ye shes khyad par dad pa byed/ /sangs rgyas lam la ston pa'ang rnyed par byed/ /dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal ba
dang / /gzhan gyis mi thub dngos la dad pa stobs/ /nyon mongs thub pa med la gnas yin te/ /dad pa rang byung yon tan tshol ba yin/ /dad pa chags pa'i sgo dang mi 'grogs te/ /
mi khom spo zhing 'du 'dzin med par byed/ /dad pa bdud kyi lam las zlog pa ste/ /thar lam dam pa yongs su ston pa yin/ /yon tan rgyu yin sa bon ma rul bzhin/ /dad pa byang chub
shing rab rnam par skyed/ /ye shes khyad par sgo rnams 'phel bar byed/ /dad pa rgyal ba rnams kyi ston pa yin/ /de bas dad mos khyad par dga' ba la/ /spyod pa rim gyis rnam par
brjod par bya/ /chos tshul 'di 'dra 'jig rten rnams na dkon/ /rin chen seng+ge'i rgyal po ji bzhin no/ /dad pas sangs rgyas sri zhu gang byed pa/ /de dag tshul khrims slob pa mi
gtong ngo / /tshul khrims slob pa gang rnams mi gtong ba/ /de dag yon tan gnas pas yon tan ldan/ /tshul khrims byang chub shes rab ston pa ste/ /bslab pas sa yi yon tan
legs la brtson/ /tshul khrims bslab pa yongs su ma btang na/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags par 'os/ /dad pas sangs rgyas sri zhu gang
byed pa| |de dag rgyal ba'i mchod pa yangs pa byed/ /rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa su byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas mos pa bsam mi khyab/ /dad pas chos la phu dud gang byed pa/ /
de dag rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms nyan/ /rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms su nyan pa/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos la mos/ /dad pas dge 'dun phu dud su byed pa/ /de
dag mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la mos/ /mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la su mos pa/ /de dag dad pa'i stobs kyis phyir mi ldog /dad pa'i stobs kyis gang rnams mi ldog pa/ /
de dag dbang po rab tu gsal zhing rno/ /gang rnams dbang po rab tu gsal rno ba/ /des ni sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs/ /gang gis sdig pa'i grogs po rnams spangs pa/ /
de dag chos kyi bshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin/ /chos kyi bshes gnyen gang gis yongs bzung ba/ /de dag dge ba rgya chen yongs su gsog /dge ba rgya chen yongs su gang gsog
pa| |bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyu mthu ldan/ /bdag nyid che ba rgyu mthu gang ldan pa/ /de dag mos pa'i khyad par yangs pa 'thob/ /mos pa yangs pa'i khyad par sus thob pa/ /de
dag rtag tu rgyal bas byin gyis brlab/ /rgyal ba'i byin gyis gang rnams brlabs gyur pa/ /de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye/ /byang chub don du gang gis sems skyes pa//
de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson/ /drang srong chen po'i yon tan su brtson pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan skyes/ /sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan gang skyes
pa| |de dag 'du dang 'bral ba rnam par spangs/ /'du dang 'bral ba gang gis rnam spangs pa/ /de dag bsam pa dang zhing rnam par dag /gang gi bsam pa dang zhing rnam dag pa/ /de
dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa'i mchog /lhag bsam dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa/ /de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin la spyod/ /pha rol phyin la rtag tu su spyod pa/ /de dag theg pa chen
po 'di la spyod/ /theg pa chen po 'di la su spyod pa/ /de dag nan tan dam pas sangs rgyas mchod/ /nan tan dam pas sangs rgyas su mchod pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas rjes dran phyed pa
med| |sangs rgyas rjes dran gang la mi phyed pa/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong / /rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas sus mthong ba/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mi
'grogs min/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas mi 'grogs su ma yin/ /de la chos nub 'gyur ba nam yang med/ /gang la chos nub 'gyur ba med gyur pa/ /de dag spobs pa sgrib pa med dang
ldan| |spobs pa sgrib pa med dang su ldan pa/ /de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yang yas/ /gang gis chos rab bstan pa mtha' yas pa/ /de dag 'gro la
byams pas phan pa tshol/ /'gro la byams pas phan pa su tshol ba/ /de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan/ /snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba sus brtan pa/ /de dag chos kyi dga' bas
dbang po dga'/ /chos kyi dga' bas dbang po gang dga' ba/ /de dag 'du byed nyes la btang snyoms so/ /'du byad nyes pa gang gis btang snyoms pa/ /de dag nga rgyal rlom
sems bag med spangs/ /nga rgyal rlom sems bag med sus spangs pa/ /de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson/ /bdag dang gzhan don rtag tu sus brtson pa/ /de dag
'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med/ /gang la 'khor bas yongs su skyo med pa/ /de dag brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang ldan/ /brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa/ /de
dag mngon shes rnam dag mngon par skye/ /gang gis mngon shes rnam dag mngon skyes pa/ /de dag spyod pa mchog gi dra bar zhugs/ /spyod mchog dra bar gang rnams bzhugs
gyur pa| |de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin par mkhas/ /'gro ba yongs su smin par gang mkhas pa/ /de dag 'gro sdud ye shes tshul la mkhas/ /'gro sdud ye shes tshul la su
mkhas pa/ /de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson/ /bsdu dngos bzhi la gang rnams brtson gyur pa/ /de dag 'gro ba'i don mang mtha' yas byed/ /'gro ba'i don mang mtha' yas su
byed pa| |de dag shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog ldan/ /shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog su ldan pa/ /dpa' bo de dag bla med lam la gnas/ /bla med lam la dpa' bo gang
gnas pa/ /de dag bdud kyi dpung gis thub pa min/ /gang rnams bdud kyi dpung gis thub min pa/ /de dag bdud lam bzhi las yongs su 'das/ /bdud lam bzhi las yongs su su
'das pa/ /de dag phyir mi ldog gi sar yang phyin/ /mi ldog sar ni gang gis phyin gyur pa/ /de dag mi skye'i bzod pa thob pa yin/ /mi skye'i bzod pa gang gis thob gyur pa/ /'jig
rten sgron de rgyal bas lung yang bstan/ /'jig rten sgron ma rgyal bas lung bstan pa/ /de dag rgyal ba kun dang mngon du gnas/ /rgyal ba kun dang mngon du su gnas pa/ /de dag rgyal
ba'i 'phrul pa gsang la mkhas/ /rgyal ba'i 'phrul ba gsang la su mkhas pa/ /de dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs pa yin/ /gang rnams rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa/ /de dag
sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyis brgyan/ /sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyis su brgyan pa/ /de dag bsod nams dam pas lus kyang sbyangs/ /bsod nams dam pas gang gi lus
sbyangs pa/ /de dag gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar/ /gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba/ /de dag mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan/ /mtshan rab sum
cu gnyis dang su ldan pa/ /de dag dpe byad bzang pos lus kyang bris/ /dpe byad bzang pos gang gi lus bris pa/ /de dag lus 'od kun tu mtha' yas so/ /gang gi lus 'od
kun tu mtha' yas pa/ /de dag 'od zer rgyan kyang bsam mi khyab/ /gang la 'od zer bsam yas rgyan yod pa/ /de dag 'od las pad+mo mang po 'byung / /gang gi 'od las pad+mo mang
'byung ba/ /de dag rgyal ba pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu yang / /don yod rnam par spyod cing sems can 'dul/ /gang rnams rgyal pa
pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu yang / /don yod rnams spyod sems can 'dul byed pa/ /de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yang
yas/ /gang gi mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing / /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab dgar byed pas/ /bsam gyis mi
khyab zhi bo'i rnam par spyod/ /gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab zos ston cing / /bsam yas sems can dga' bar su byed pa/ /de dag bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten na/ /
tha dad yang dag shes mthus sems can 'dul/ /tha dad yang dag shes pa'i ye shes mthus/ /bsam pa ji bzhin sems can su 'dul ba/ /de dag lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su/
ye shes sngon du 'gro bar shin tu 'byung / /gang gi lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro bar rab 'byung ba/ /de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci dga' bar/ /sems can
rgyud du gzugs mang yongs su ston/ /smon lam stobs gyis gang rnams ci dga' bar/ /sems can rgyud du gzugs mang ston byed pa/ /de dag tshig du brjod cing ci smra yang / /sgra la
dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam mi khyab/ /tshig tu brjod cing ci dang ci smra yang / /gang gi sgra dbyangs yan lag bsam yas pa/ /de dag 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi/ /bsam pa'i sems
rnams yud kyis rnam par shes/ /gang gi ma lus 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam shes pa/ /de dag skye dang 'chi 'pho nam yang med/ /nyon mongs rgyu
ba'ang de bzhin skye ba med/ /skye dang 'chi 'pho gang la med gyur cing / /nyon mongs rgyud kyang de bzhin skye med pa/ /de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus/ /chos kyis smos par 'jig
rten kun tu spyod/ /yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus ldan zhing / /chos kyis smos par 'jig rten su spyod pa/ /de dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu yi/ /pha rol phyin mchog rnam par
thar la spyod/ /gang rnams bcu dbang rnams bcu po yi/ /pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar spyod pa/ /de dag mngon shes rgyan gyis rnam par 'phrul/ /
ting 'dzin dam pas rnam par spyod pa thob/ /mngon par shes pa'i rgyan gyis rnam 'phrul zhing / /ting 'dzin mchog gis rnam spyod sus thob pa/ /de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams
cad las/ /dbang bskur rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su nod/ /gang rnams phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las/ /dbang bskur rgyan rnams thams cad mod byed pa/ /de dag spyi
bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /phyag mthil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang yang bskur/ /gang gi spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /phyag mthil bdud rtsis mngon par
dbang bskur ba/ /de dag ma lus nam mkha' rgyas byas shing / /phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brtan gnas pa byed/ /gang rnams nam mkha' ma lus rgyas bkang zhing / /phyogs rnams
kun tu mthu brtan gnas byed pa/ /dpe med de dag spyod yul shes par ni/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas pas mi nus so/ /dpe med gang gi spyod yul shes bya bar/ /'jig rten lha
dang bcas pas mi nus pa/ /de dag brtson 'grus thams cad don kyang yod/ /mthong dang ming thos spobs pa'ang don yod do/ /gang rnams brtson 'grus thams cad don yod cing //
mthong dang mi thos spobs pa don yod pa/ /skyes chen de dag sbyin bdag gtong ba yi/ /sbyin pa'i gnas te thams cad don kyang yod/ /skyes su dam pa de dag byin mthu yis/ /dam chos
tshul ni mi 'jig brten par gnas/ /dge ba'i las lam dam pa mchog rnams kyang / /rin chen 'dra mthus kun na rgyu zhing gnas/ /rdo rje stug po'i rin chen tshogs yod pas/ /de yi mthu
yis rgya mtsho'i rin chen rnams/ /mi zad 'phel zhing 'grib pa gang yang med/ /de bzhin yon tan mtha' yas yon tan mtsho/ /sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing rnams gang yod pa/ /de dag
kun tu byang chub sangs rgyas ston/ /phyogs rnams gang na dam chos med gyur pa/ /de dag kun tu'ang chos kyi gter ston to/ /de dag mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ /lhun gyis grub par phyogs
rnams thams cad du/ /zla ba lta bur gzugs brnyan ston byed cing / /thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul ba byed/ /de dag skad cig re rer byang chub tu/ /rnam par sangs rgyas phyogs
bcu kun tu ston/ /'khor lo bskor dang mya ngan las 'das zhi dang / /sku gdung rgya chen de bzhin dpa' bo ston/ /mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgyan rnams
mtha' yas pa/ /yongs su ston cing bskal pa bsam yas su/ /theg pa gsum gyi sgo nas sems can 'dul/ /khye'u dang bu mo de bzhin bud med lus/ /skyes pa lha dang lha min klu rnams
dang / /gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs/ /mos pa thams cad tshul mkhas yongs su ston/ /ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rgya yi sgo dag nas/ /
'gro ba'i gzugs mang rgyud ni ji snyed dang / /cha byad spyod pa sgra dbyangs tshul gyi rnams/ /thams cad ma lus dpa' bo ston pa byed/ /de dag zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ phyogs
bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad mchod pa byed/ /de dag 'od zer mang po bsam mi khyab/ /sems can 'grel ba'i ye shes mtha' yang yas/ /tshig gi rnam 'phrul ye shes rnam 'phrul
dang / /lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims rnam par 'phrul ba dang / /bzod pa brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /de dag bsam gtan
shes rab rnam 'phrul dang / /thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas tshogs kyi ting 'dzin sgo dag nas/ /yon tan kun gyi rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas/ /
de dag rdul phran kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing / /rdul phran rtse gcig bsam yas zhing rnams la/ /ston pa byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba med/ /rdul gcig rtse la'ang sangs
rgyas bzhugs zhing dang / /sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing yang de bzhin ston/ /la la nyon mongs rnam dag dog pa dang / /yangs shing phra dang che ba'i zhing yang ston/ /zhing rnams la
la 'jig cing 'du ba dang / /la la spyi'u tshugs rim gyis gnas par ston/ /la la snel zhi smig rgyu lta bu ste/ /de bzhin gzhan rnams mig 'phrul lta bur ston/ /de dag rdul gcig
rtser ston ji bzhin du/ /ma lus rdul rnams kun la de bzhin te/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /mtha' yas grags pa'i rnam thar de 'dra'o/ /rgyal ba mchod pa'i rnam 'phrul
ting nge 'dzin/ /rgyal ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed kyang / /lag pa'i mthil gyis stong gsum rgyas bkang zhing / /skyes bu chen po rnams la mchod pa byed/ /phyogs bcu kun na me tog
phreng ba dang / /spos dang byug pa rin chen rin che ba/ /de dag byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yi/ /rgyal ba mchod phyir lag pa'i mthil nas 'gyed/ /na bza' phye ma rin chen ji snyed dang / /rgyal
mtshan ba dan gdugs dam sna tshogs dang / /gser gyi rgyan dang rin chen bla re dag /lag mthil de nas char du mngon par 'bebs/ /phyogs rnams mtha' yas kun gyi yo byad rnams/ /drang
srong che la mchod par gang 'os pa/ /de dag lag mthil de nas char du 'bebs/ /byang chub shing drung rgyal ba mchod pa byed/ /rol mo'i rnam pa phyogs na ji snyed pa/ /rnga chen rnga dang pi wang sgra
snyan dang / /rol mo brdung dkrol gling bu sgra rab rnams/ /de dag lag mthil de nas sgra yang sgrog /phyogs bcu'i dpe med ji snyed bzhugs pa yi/ /bde gshegs yon tan legs pa sna
tshogs dang / /bstod pa'i tshigs bcad sgrub pa sna tshogs kyang / /lag mthil de nas sgra rab snyan par 'byung / /de dag 'od zer las dges yongs bsags
pa| |lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyed byed cing / /rgyal ba'i zhing rnams spos chus ma lus par/ /kun tu btab cing 'jig rten sgron ma mchod/ /'od zer yid 'ong snang zhing rgyan
ldan pa| |lag pa'i mthil bkye pad+mo bsam mi khyab/ /pad+mo rgyan 'phyang mtshan sdug du ma'i gzugs/ /mang po bkye zhing rgyal ba mchod pa byed/ /'od zer me tog rgyan rnams rab
bkye zhing / /me tog rgyan dang me tog bla re dang / /me tog sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer spos kyi rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /
spos kyi rgyan dang spos kyi bla re dang / /sna tshogs spos kyis kun tu yongs bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer phye ma'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /phye ma'i
rgyan dang phye ma'i bla re dang / /phye ma sna tshogs kun tu yongs su bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer na bza'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /na bza'i rgyan dang na
bza'i bla re dang / /na bza' sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer rin chen rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /rin chen rgyan dang rin chen

bla re dang / /rin chen sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer pad+mo'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /pad+mo'i rgyan dang pad+mo'i bla re dang / /pad+mo sna tshogs

kun tu yongs bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer phreng ba'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /phreng ba'i rgyan dang phreng ba'i bla re dang / /phreng ba sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang
zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer rgyal mtshan mchog rgyan rab bkye zhing / /de dag rgyan mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang / /sngo dang sna tshogs rnam mang rgyan can gyis/ /
rgyal ba'i zhing rnams kun nas brgyan pa byed/ /de dag de gshegs dbu la gdugs kyi mchog /rin chen dra ba sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa/ /dar gyi lda ldi ba dan yongs dpyangs shing / /dril
phreng rgyal ba'i gsung sgrog 'dzin pa byed/ /lag pa'i mthil nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /mchod pa rgyal ba gcig la byed pa ltar/ /ma lus rgyal ba rnams la'ang de bzhin te/ /drang srong ting
'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /de dag 'gro ba yongs sdud ye shes kyis/ /rnam par 'phrul ba'i ting 'dzin mngon bsgrubs shing / /bya ba'i tshul dang yon tan thams cad du/ /thams mang stong gis
sems can 'dul ba byed/ /la la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang / /sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong ba'i sgo/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun gyi tshul khrims sgo/ /bzod pa mi zad mi sgul
sgo dag dang / /la la brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson 'grus sgo/ /bsam gtan rab tu zhi gnas sgo dag dang / /don dam rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab sgo/ /tshul
rnams kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang / /tshangs pa'i spyod pa dag dang mngon shes sgo/ /bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan tshol sgo dag dang / /bsod nams yongs su bsags dang ye shes sgo/ /
bden pa rten pa'i rnam thar sgo dag dang / /la la stobs dang dbang po lam gyi sgo/ /nyan thos theg pa rnam grol sgo dag dang / /rang rgyal theg pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo/ /theg pa dam pa
rnam 'phrul sgo dag dang / /la la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal sgo/ /la la bdag med srog med sgo dag dang / /mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags 'bral ba'i sgo/ /la la zhi 'gog ting
'dzin sgo dag tu/ /'gro ba'i spyod sgo ji snyed yod rgyu ba/ /de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab tu zhugs te/ /de dag kun gyi chos nyid sgo dag nas/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can
'dul| |gang rnams kun gyi sgo yi sgo dag nas/ /bsam pa ji bzhin sems can 'dul byed pa/ /de dag mtshan ma gzung bar mi nus te/ /ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul tshul ni de 'dra'o/ /de
dag dga' ba'i rgyan gyi ting 'dzin mchog /'gro ba thams cad yongs smin byed mthun pa/ /dga' ba de spro ba rab dga' kun ldan pas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab yongs ston sems
can 'dul/ /gang tshe lo nyes thams cad dkon gyur pa/ /de tshe 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad rnams/ /thams cad bsam pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing 'gro don
byed| |de dag zas mchog skom dang ro mchog dang / /gos dang dgab pa rin chen sna tshogs dang / /rgyal srid nor dang bdag sdug yongs btang bas/ /sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba
byed| |de dag mtshan rab kun gyis lus brgyan cing / /gos dang rgyan mchog yongs su bgos btags te/ /phreng bas rnam brgyan spos kyis bskus byas pa'i/ /gzugs rnams yongs su
bstan pas sems can 'dul/ /mthong bas dga' bde rab tu mos pa la/ /de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang cha byad mdzes/ /gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing / /gzugs
la mos pa'i sems can 'dul ba byed/ /de dag ka la ping+ka'i sgra snyan dang / /ko kil kun la ngang pa'i sgra dbyangs dang / /rnga dang tshangs pa mi 'am ci yi sgras/ /mos pa thams cad tshul bzhin
chos kyang ston/ /de dag stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po/ /gang gis rgyal ba 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/ /chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /
de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byang / /don dang don med grogs kyang de bzhin te/ /sems can dgos la grogs su 'gyur byas shing / /grogs kyi sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul/
sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams/ /grogs kyi don du de dag bzod par byed/ /'gro ba kun la phan don bde don du/ /de dag grogs don mi bde
nyams su len/ /gang na 'byung ba med cing chos med de/ /dgon pa'i yon tan thar pa mi dmigs pa/ /de dag kun tu rgyal srid che spangs shing / /zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon
par 'byung / /de dag khyim gyi btson ra srid gnas pa'i/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i rgyur/ /'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par/ /mngon par byung zhing thar pa
yongs su brjod/ /de dag spyod pa bcu rnams spyod byed cing / /skyes chen rnams kyi chos la de dag spyod/ /drang srong spyod pa thams cad ma lus par/ /yongs su sgom zhing 'gro ba'i don
kyang byed/ /gang na sems can tshad med tshe ldan pa/ /bde ba phun ldan nyon mongs chung yod pa/ /de dag kun tu nad gzer na bu can/ /bdag la dbang med tsam gyi dbang sgyur ston/ /'dod
chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang 'bar gyur te/ /gti mug rgyu las 'jig rten mer 'bar zhing / /rga shi nad kyis rab tu 'bar gyur pa'i/ /'jig rten bstan cing sems can 'dul ba
byed| |de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi/ /chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang / /sangs rgyas bdag nyid che brjod byed cing / /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams
kyis 'gro don byed/ /de dag yongs ston rdzu 'phrul rjes ston gyi/ /gzugs rnams byin rlob mthu yis mthu che ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing / /rdzu 'phrul rnam par
'phrul bas sems can 'dul/ /de dag thabs kyi tshul mang sna tshogs kyi/ /'gro ba'i don du 'jig rten rim gror byed/ /'jig rten mi chags chu la pad+mo bzhin/ /dga' ba mos pa skye
bar rnam par spyod/ /de dag rjod byed brjod pa'i rgyal ba byed/ /gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan/ /mdzes shing sdug par bzhad gad byed pa dang / /sgyu mkhan gzugs med kun
tu ston par byed/ /grong ba grong dpon kha lo sgyur ba dang / /ded dpon tshong dpon khyim bdag de bzhin te/ /rgyal po blon po mnga' rab pho nya dang / /sman pa mi 'jigs gtsug lag mkhas pa
byed| |de dag nags tshal sdong po chen por 'gyur/ /sman dang rin chen mi zad gter dag dang / /yid bzhin nor bu 'dod pa 'byin shing dang / /lam gol 'khyams la de bzhin lam ston
'gyur| |'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cing / /sems can las kyi tshul la mi shes pa/ /de dag kun la rmos thabs tshong thabs dang / /sna tshogs bzo rnams kun kyang rjod par byed//
'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba rnams/ /sems can bde skyed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa/ /rig mthu sman dang gtsug lag sna tshogs rnams/ /kun kyang drang srong de dag rnam par
brjod| |drang srong rnams kyi spyod pa dam pa'i mchog /gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten dad gyur dang / /brtul zhugs dka' spyod dka' thub mchog gi rnams/ /
kun kyang mkhas pa de dag ston par byed/ /de dag rgyu dang kun rgyu mu stegs can/ /dka' thub spyod yul mi smrar spyod pa dang / /sgren mo gos med ri yi dge sbyong la/ /mu stegs can gyi
mkhan po mkhas pa byed/ /de dag yongs 'tsho chos la spyod pa dang / /bla na yod dang bla na med pa'i rnams/ /ral pa ring dang byis pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /de dag tu yang de dag mkhan
por 'gyur/ /nyi ma'i rjes spyad dka' thub lnga ldan dang / /khyi dang ba lang brtul zhugs ri dwags spyod/ /gle'u can mu stegs bcu gsum spyod pa'i rnams/ /de dag kun na'ang de dag
slob dpon 'gyur/ /lha rnams ye shes tshul la dga' ba dang / /mu stegs khrus byed yul du rgyu ba dang / /rtsa ba 'bras bu chu la spyod pa'i rnams/ /chos sems nang na de dag dam par
'gyur| |gnas btegs gnas dang gcig tu spyod pa dang / /tsher ma rtswa dang thal ba'i mal can dang / /dbyig pa'i mal can gcig pu spyod pa'i rnams/ /de dag kun tu'ang de dag
slob dpon 'gyur/ /phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas nas/ /sgrub dka' mi bzad drag shul dka' thub kyi/ /mu stegs can gyi sdug
bsngal spangs pas 'dul/ /'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas/ /lta ba ngan la zhen pa'i mu stegs can/ /kun la phra ba'i tshig dang thabs tshul gyis/ /bden pa ston pa
de dag kun tu byed/ /la lar dra byi la yi sngags tshig tu/ /shin tu gsang ba'i tshig gis bden pa ston/ /la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis/ /la la dag la lha yi gsang tshig
gis| |la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang / /don nges rtogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang / /rgol ba 'dul ba'i ye shes tshig rnams dang / /brtan pa thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ /
la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang / /kun la 'jug pa'i tshig nges tshig rnams dang / /la la dag la lha'i tshig nges tshig dang / /klu yi tshig nges gnod sbyin tshig rnams kyis/ /la
la dag la srin po 'byung po dang / /dri za grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i tshig /mi ci lha min nam mkha' lding tshig gis/ /bden pa bstan cing thar par 'dren par byed/ /de dag bden pa'i
nges tshig tshul shes bzhin/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i/ /chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas ston/ /de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o/ /de dag 'gro bde
mchog gi ting nge 'dzin/ /'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing / /'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste/ /'od zer bkye nas sems can de dag 'dul/ /'od zer mthong na legs
pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer de shes pa/ /de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu/ /sangs rgyas
bstan te chos rnams yongs bstan nas/ /dge 'dun bstan nas mi rnams lam bstan te/ /rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan pas na/ /des ni mthong na legs pa'i 'od
zer grub/ /lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa yi/ /'od zer 'od byed rab tu bkye byas shing / /mun pa kun dang rdul rnams kun bsal te/ /'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu snang / /'od
des sems can ji snyed yongs bskul ba/ /de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar 'dzin/ /rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar bzung byas pas/ /'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /
'bru mar me mar mar gyi me mar dang / /shing dang rtswa dang smig ma spa yi sgron/ /spos dang ro mchog rin chen sgron ma dag /rgyal ba rnams gsol 'od byed de thob bo/ /'od zer sgrol zhes
bya ba rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer nges bskul ba/ /de dag sred pa rnam yangs srid pa'i mtshor/ /sems can bsgral don go cha brtan pa gyon/ /gang rnams sred pa
rnam yangs srid pa'i mtshor/ /sems can bsgral phyir go cha brtan gyon pa/ /de dag chu bo bzhi las sgrol bar byed/ /mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong yang ston/ /stegs dang zam pa
gcig min byas pa dang / /chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru byin te/ /'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba bsngags pas na/ /des ni sgrol ba'i 'od zer de grub bo/ /'od zer skom pa sel ba rab bkye zhing //
sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /'dod pa'i yon tan sgom pa rab spangs shing / /chos kyi rnam grol ro la don du gnyer/ /'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs te/ /chos kyis
grol ba'i ro la don gnyer bas/ /sangs rgyas bdud rtsi char pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten sred pa'i skom pa rnam par sel/ /rdzing dang chu klung khron pa lo ma dang / /mtsho rnams byang chub
don du byed btsud de/ /'dod pa rnam smad bsam gtan bsngags pas na/ /skom pa rnam sel de ni des sgrub pa/ /'od zer dga' bar byed pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer
des bskul ba/ /dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don du/ /rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do/ /thugs rje mnga' rnams sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa/ /pad+mo'i gdan
la bzhugs pa byas bsgrubs shing / /rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan brjod pas na/ /dga' ba byed pa'i 'od ni des sgrub bo/ /'od zer mos par byed pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed
'od zer des bskul ba/ /de dag thams cad sangs rgyas mos pas dga'/ /chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos pas dga'/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mos dga' ste/ /chos la
mos dga' dag 'dun mos dga' bas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun dang / /rtag tu 'grogs 'thob bzod pa bla med 'thob/ /sangs rgyas rjes
dran chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /sems can mang po bskul cing dran byas te/ /byang chub sems kyi yon tan bstan pas na/ /des ni 'od zer mos par byed pa grub/ /'od zer bsod
nams bsags pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing / /sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma yongs su gtong / /de dag mchod
sbyin lhug pa byed pa'i tshe/ /slong mo ba yi bsam pa rdzogs byas te/ /bsam pa kun tshul sbyin pa byin pas na/ /des na 'od zer bsod nams bsags grub bo/ /'od zer ye shes ldan
pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /chos gcig sgo nas chos gcig min pa yi/ /chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis rjes dran nas/ /chos kyi bye brag sems can
'dzin btsud de/ /nges rtogs don gyi ye shes rnam phye zhing / /chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pas na/ /des ni ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer grub/ /'od zer shes rab sgron ma rab
bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung ba'i/ /rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug /bdag po med chos stong pa byed
med pa| |sprin dang smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba'i dngos/ /rmi lam lta bu gzugs brnyan rang bzhin rnams/ /bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub bo/ /'od zer chos kyis rnam 'phrul rab bkye
zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /mi zad gzungs kyi mdzod rnams rab thob cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin/ /chos 'chad rnams la yongs su
phan btags te/ /drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrungs byas shing / /'gro pa kun la chos bzhin phan btags pas/ /'od zer chos kyis rnam 'phrul de grub bo/ /'od zer gtong dang
ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can 'jungs pa ji snyed des bskul ba/ /skyed pa mi brtan mi rtag shes gyur nas/ /de dag rtag tu sbyin mos dga' bar 'gyur/ /'jungs pa gdul dka'i
sems can ma dul dang / /nor rnams rmi lam sprin tshul shes gyur nas/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis sbyin pa rnam spel bas/ /gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo/ /'od zer yongs su
gdung med rab bkye zhing / /tshul ngan sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ /tshul khrims rnam dag rab tu gnas gyur te/ /rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems skyed do/ /dge ba'i las lam
yongs su dag pa dang / /tshul khrims bzang la sems can mang bskul cing / /byang chub sems la yang dag bskul byas pas/ /yongs su gdung med 'od zer des grub bo/ /bzod pas
rnam brgyan 'od zer rab bkye zhing / /mi bzod sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ /khro ba'i tha ba nga rgyal yongs spangs shing / /de dag bzod mos rtag tu dga'
bar 'gyur/ /sdig sems ldan la nyes pa bzod byas te/ /byang chub don du 'khrug pa ma byas shing / /bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu brjod byas pas/ /des ni bzod pas rnam brgyan de
grub bo| |'od zer brtson dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /le lo'i sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ /rigs par brtson zhing dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ /sbyor ba skyo med mchod pa
'byed par 'gyur/ /rigs par brtson pas dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ /sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas/ /de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las yongs 'das te/ /myur du byang
chub bla med rab tu thob/ /sems can mang po brtson 'grus bskul byas te/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas/ /tha ma'i dus su dam chos yongs bzung bas/ /des
ni brtson ldan 'od zer de grub bo/ /'od zer zhi bar byed pa rab bkye zhing / /rnam 'khrugs sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ /de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /nyams
su mi gnod mnyam gzhag sems su 'gyur/ /sdig to'i grogs po nyes ldan spyod can dang / /'du 'dzi yongs su rnam par spangs byas te/ /bsam gtan zhi ba'i dgon pa rang
bsngags pas/ /des ni zhi byed 'od zer de grub bo/ /'od zer shes rab rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing / /shes rab 'chal ba ji snyed des bskul ba/ /bden dang brtan dang rnam thar tshul rnams
dang / /dbang po'i rgyus la rtogs par shes gyur cing / /nyi ma sgron ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas/ /shes rab 'od gsal mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs
yongs btang ste/ /byang chub don du chos rnams gang btsal ba/ /de dag rim gror rab tu brjod byas pas/ /shes rab rnam brgyan 'od zer des grub bo/ /'od zer sangs rgyas ldan pa rab
bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab shin tu mang / /pad+mo mchog la bzhugs par rab tu mthong / /sangs rgyas bdag nyid che dang rnam
thar dang / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas yongs bstan te/ /sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul brjod byas pas/ /sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo/ /'od zer mi 'jigs
sbyin pa rab bkye zhing / /'jigs mnar sems can ji snyed des phog pa/ /'byung po bza' dang bsad cing brdeg pa dang / /nad kyi 'jigs pa kun las rab tu 'grol/ /mi 'jigs sbyin
pas sems can bskyabs pa dang / /srog gcod las las sems rgyud phyir bzlog cing / /'jigs pas skyabs tshol rnams la bskyabs byas pas/ /'od zer mi 'jigs sbyin pa des
grub bo| |'od zer thams cad bde ba rab bkye zhing / /nad pa na ba ji snyed des reg pa/ /thams cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par 'grol/ /bsam gtan ting
'dzin bde ba rnams kyang thob/ /nad gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang / /rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa dang / /bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang / /'bru mar zas skom
byin pas de grub bo/ /'od zer sangs rgyas ston pa rab bkye zhing / /tshe zad mthar ni ji snyed des bskul ba/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de dag shi
'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs zhing 'gro /'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te/ /dgar 'gyur rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing / /'chi khar sangs rgyas skyabs su btang
byas pas/ /sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer des thob bo/ /'od zer chos rab brjod pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /chos nyan rjod cing de bzhin
'dri ba byed/ /chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi mu ge'i dus su chos brjod de/ /chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing / /mos pa bskyed de chos
la brtson gyis zhes/ /brjod pa chos rab rjod pa des thob bo/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir/ /'od zer dbyangs dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /khams gsum
sgra rgyud ji snyed yod pa dag /kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos/ /gsal ba'i dbyangs sgrar drang srong cher brjod de/ /rol mo sgra chen dril gyi sbyin pa rnams/ /'gro ba kun
la rgyal ba'i gsung don du/ /yongs su btang bas 'od zer dbyangs ldan thob/ /'od zer 'chi med sbyin pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /bag med spyod pa
thams cad rnam spangs te/ /yon tan kun la rnal 'byor nyams su len/ /'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste/ /sdug bsngal 'tshe ba mang pos yongs su gang / /'gog pa rtag tu bde zhing
zhi dga' zhes/ /brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de thob bo/ /'od zer khyad par ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /tshul khrims khyad par ting 'dzin khyad par
dang / /shes rab khyad par rgyal ba rnams la nyan/ /tshul khrims 'phags pa ting 'dzin 'phags pa ste/ /shes rab 'phags pa thub pa'i rgyal chen zhes/ /byang chub don du bsngags
shing bstod byas pas/ /des ni 'od zer khyad par ldan pa thob|/'od zer rin chen rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /rin chen gter mang mi zad
thob gyur te/ /drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /rin chen phul zhing 'gro ba nyon mongs la/ /rin chen bsdud de rin chen sbyin
btang bas/ /rin chen rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer grub/ /'od zer spos mchog snang ba rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /mi la
med pa'i spos dri tshor gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur/ /mi dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis/ /mi yi gtso la mchod pa rab byas te/ /spos kyis rgyal ba'i sku
gzugs mchod rten dag /byas pas 'od zer spos mchog snang ba grub/ /'od zer sna tshogs rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs mchog /rol mo
sgra snyan spos dang bdug spos kyis/ /pho brang dam pa yongs brgyan me tog 'gengs/ /sngon chad rgyal ba rol mos bsu byas te/ /me tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma dang / /gdugs dang
rgyal mtshan ba dan mchog dag gis/ /mchod pa byas pas sna tshogs rgyan grub bo/ /'od zer shin tu dar byed rab bkye zhing / /sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed/ /mchod
rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyangs byas pas/ /des ni 'od zer shin tu dang byed grub/ /'od zer chen po'i sprin ldan rab bkye zhing / /spos kyi char 'bebs sprin rnams kun nas gnas/ /
mchod rten gam yo spos chus yongs btab pas/ /'od zer sprin dang ldan pa rab tu thob/ /'od zer lhab lhub rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing / /gos med gos yod rgyan dang ldan par
'gyur| |gos dang bgo ba phreng ba sna tshogs dag /yongs su btang bas lhab lhub rnam brgyan grub/ /'od zer bro mchog ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /bkres pa kha zas bro mchog thob par 'gyur//
zas dang skom dang bro mchog sna tshogs rnams/ /byin pas bro mchog ldan pa'i 'od kyang thob/ /'od zer nor ston rab tu gyes byas shing / /phongs pa rin chen gter rnams thob par 'gyur/ /
gnas dang gter rnams mi zad dkon mchog gsum/ /gsol pas nor ston 'od zer de thob bo/ /'od zer mig sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /long ba de tshe sna tshogs gzugs mthong 'gyur/ /
rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /mar me gsol bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub/ /rna ba rnam sbyong 'od zer rab bkye zhing / /rna ba nyams pa sgra mang thos par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang
rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /sil snyan phul bas rna ba rnam spyod thob/ /'od zer sna sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /sngon chad ma tshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i
mchod rten la/ /spos zhim gsol bas sna sbyong 'od zer grub/ /'od zer lce sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /sgra snyan yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas bstod/ /mi snyan brlang bar smra ba rnams
spangs te/ /'jam par smra bas lce sbyong 'od zer grub/ /'od zer lus sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod
rten la| |lus kyis rab btud lus sbyong 'od zer thob/ /'od zer sems sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /smyos pa thams cad rang bzhin sems su 'gyur/ /
ting 'dzin rjes su sems 'gro rab byas pas/ /des ni sems sbyong 'od zer de grub bo/ /'od zer gzugs sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /bsam yas sku mnga' mi yi dbang po
mthong / /sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang / /mchod rten rgyan byas gzugs sbyong thob par 'gyur/ /'od zer sgra sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /sgra ni sgra min stong par rab tu
shes| |rkyen las byung bas sgra brnyan 'dra 'o zhes/ /sgra rnams bstan pas 'od zer de grub bo/ /'od zer dri sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu
'gyur| |spos mchog rab chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag /khrus byas byang chub shing gi 'od de yin/ /'od zer bro sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /dug can dug med ro yi mchog tu
'gyur| |sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la/ /bro mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de yin/ /'od zer reg sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /reg na mi bde thams cad 'jam
bder 'gyur/ /tri shul mdung dang ral gri mda' yi char/ /phreng ba yid 'ong ut+pal pad+mor 'gyur/ /gos mang 'jam pa reg na bde ba'i rnams/ /rgyal ba gshegs pa'i lam du
bting bkram ste/ /me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam pa dang / /phreng ba bla re gsol ba'i 'od de yin/ /'od zer chos sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /ba spu kun nas 'jig rten phan mdzad pa'i/ /
bsam yas chos mang 'byung ba thos par 'gyur/ /mos pa'i lam tshul bzhin du dga' bar byed/ /rkyen las byung bas ma skyes rang bzhin yin/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni chos kyi sku yin te/ /chos
nyid nam mkha' bzhin du rtag gnas zhes/ /brjod pas chos sbyong 'od zer de thob bo/ /'od zer sgo mo de dag la sogs pa/ /drang srong rnams kyi ba spu'i sgo gcig nas/ /gang+gA'i bye ma snyed
kyi 'od zer byung / /kun kyang tha dad las kyi tshul can no/ /ji ltar ba spu gcig gi sgo gcig nas/ /'od zer gang+gA'i bye snyed yongs 'byung ba/ /de bzhin ma lus spu rnams thams cad nas/ /
drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o/ /yon tan gang gis 'od zer grub 'gyur ba'i/ /yon tan de la bstad grogs sus byas pa/ /de dag 'od zer de dag nyid kyang 'byung / /drang srong
ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o/ /de dag bsod nams bstad grogs byas pa la/ /rjes su yi rang smon lam sus btab dang / /gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pa/ /de dag kun
kyang 'od zer de dag shes/ /gang gis bsod nams byas shing dge bsags te/ /sangs rgyas yang dang yang du mchod byas shing / /sangs rgyas yon tan 'dod cing don gnyer ba/ /de dag
kun la 'od zer de dag skul/ /dmus long rnams kyis nyi ma mi mthong yang / /de med ma yin 'jig rten kun tu 'char/ /mig dang ldan pas shar bar shes
gyur nas/ /kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug /de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kyang / /med pa ma yin kun tu 'phro ba ste/ /de dag mos med log pas mnar ba yin/ /phal
