gyis mi mthong blo gros yangs la mos/ /rgyan dang nor bu gzhon pa gzhal med khang / /rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa'i rnams/ /de dag che bar gyur la yod mod kyi/ /nyon
mongs phongs pa rnams la yod pa min/ /gang gis 'od zer bye brag 'di thos te/ /dad pa yid ches mos pa skyes gyur na/ /bdag ni yon tan chen po'i rgyal mtshan du/ /mi 'gyur
snyam du nem nur des mi bskyed/ /de dag 'khor gyi rgyan du rnam 'phrul bar/ /ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed kyi/ /phyogs bcu kun tu dpe zla med pa yi/ /rgyal sras 'khor
rnams yongs su ston pa byed/ /de dag pad+mo mdzes pa stong gsum tsam/ /'od kyis rnam brgyan byin gyis brlabs byas shing / /lus gcig skyil mo krung gi pad+mo de/ /yongs su
rgyas ston ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul/ /de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad+mo gzhan/ /'khor dang bcas pa byin gyis brlabs byas shing / /rgyal sras kun gyis kun nas yongs
bskor ba/ /de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par spyod/ /drang srong des ni yongs su smin byas te/ /rgyal ba'i legs la yongs su gang bsgrubs pa/ /de dag pad+mo chen po'i 'khor byed
cing / /kun kyang thal mo sbyar te ngor yang lta/ /skyes bu chen po'i chos nyid de 'dra ste/ /gang rnams ting 'dzin rnams spyod zhugs gyur pa/ /kun kyang rang rang slob mas bskor 'gyur te/ /
zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba bzhin/ /de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig 'jug byed cing / /sangs rgyas sras kyi 'khor rnams ston byed pa/ /de bzhin ma lus phyogs rnams thams
cad du| |ston te ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /de dag ting 'dzin rab rnams mngon sgrub cing / /phyogs kyi dra bar snrel zhir spyod pa byed/ /la la mnyam bzhag la la rnam langs
par| |rang rang lus kyang phyogs rnams kun tu ston/ /de dag shar gyi phyogs su mnyam bzhag cing / /dpa' bo de dag nub kyi phyogs nas ldang / /nub kyi phyogs su de bzhin mnyam
bzhag cing / /shar gyi phyogs nas bdag nyid che ba ldang / /de bzhin phyogs bcu kun tu 'jug byed de/ /phyogs rnams gzhan du mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /ye shes yon
tan mang po gzhan las ldang / /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /shar phyogs zhing grangs ji snyed yod pa rnams/ /ma lus de dag kun gyi rang byung gi /spyan snga zhabs kyi
drung na ting 'dzin la/ /zhi bar rnam par spyod par de dag snang / /der ni mnyam bzhag sems can bstan byas nas/ /nub kyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo
rnams| |langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na/ /mchod pa rnam mang du ma byed par snang / /nub kyi zhing grangs ji snyed yod pa rnams/ /ma lus de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi/ /
spyan snga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la/ /zhi bar rnam par spyod par de dag snang / /der ni mnyam bzhag sems can bstan byas nas/ /shar gyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo rnams/ /
langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na/ /mchod pa rnam mang du ma byed par snang / /phyogs bcu'i zhing du 'jug pa de 'dra ste/ /phyogs rnams kun tu ma lus dpa' bo rnams/ /la la
mnyam bzhag la la rnam par langs/ /'jig rten sgron ma kun la mchod byed snang / /de dag mig gi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid che ba gzugs kyi lam las
ldang / /'jig rten lhar bcas myos par 'gyur ba yi/ /bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs kyang kun tu ston/ /gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /dran dang
ldan pa mig gi lam las ldang / /mig ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par ston par byed/ /de dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid che ba
sgra yi lam las ldang / /sgra dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan bzhin du shes/ /'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur/ /sgra yi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /dran dang
ldan pa rna ba'i lam las ldang / /rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par ston par byed/ /de dag sna yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid che ba dri yi lam
las ldang / /dri rab mchog la 'jug par rab tu zhugs/ /'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur/ /dri yi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /dran dang ldan pa sna yi lam
las ldang / /sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te| /stong pa byed pa med par ston par byed/ /de dag lce yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /bro mchog kun gyi lam las ldang bar byed/ /bdag
nyid che ba de dag bro mchog shes/ /'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur/ /bro ba'i mchog la mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /dran dang ldan pa lce yi lam las ldang / /lce ni ma skyes ma
byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par ston par byed/ /de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid che ba reg gi lam las ldang / /'jig rten bde ba skyed pa'i reg la zhugs/ /
'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur/ /reg gi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas cing / /dran dang ldan pa lus kyi lam las ldang / /lus ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed
pa med par ston par byed/ /de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid che ba chos kyi lam las ldang / /chos sgrub 'jug par bya la rab tu zhugs/ /
'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur/ /chos kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /dran dang ldan pa sems kyi lam las ldang / /sems ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin
te| |stong pa byed pa med par ston par byed/ /byis pa'i lus su de dag mnyam bzhag cing / /gzhon nu dar la bab pa'i lus su ldang / /gzhon nu dar la bab par mnyam bzhag cing / /
rgan zhing 'khogs pa'i lus su rnam par ldang / /rgan zhing 'khogs pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /dge bsnyen dad ma'i lus su rnam par ldang / /dge bsnyen dad ma'i lus
su mnyam bzhag cing / /dge bsnyen dad pa'i lus su rnam par ldang / /dge bsnyen dad pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /dge slong ma yi lus su rnam par ldang / /dge slong ma yi
lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /dge slong mang du thos pa'i lus su ldang / /dge slong mang thos lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /slob dang mi slob lus su rnam par ldang / /slob dang mi slob
lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /rang rgyal lus las de dag rnam par ldang / /rang rgyal lus la de dag mnyam bzhag cing / /sangs rgyas sku mchog phul du rnam par ldang / /sangs rgyas
sku mchog phul la mnyam bzhag cing / /lha yi lus su de dag rnam par ldang / /lha yi lus su de dag mnyam bzhag cing / /'phrul chen klu yi lus su rnam par ldang / /'phrul chen klu yi
lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus su rnam par ldang / /'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /'byung po kun gyi lus su rnam par ldang / /'byung po
kun gyi lus su mnyam bzhag cing / /spu rtse gcig gi sgo nas rnam par ldang / /spu rtse gcig gi sgo la mnyam bzhag cing / /spu rtse kun gyi sgo nas rnam par ldang / /spu rtse kun gyi sgo nas mnyam
bzhag cing / /skra rtse gcig gi sgo nas rnam par ldang / /skra rtse gcig gi sgor ni mnyam bzhag cing / /skra rtse kun gyi sgo nas rnam par ldang / /skra rtse kun gyi sgor ni mnyam bzhag cing / /rdul
phran gcig las de dag rnam par ldang / /rdul phran gcig la de dag mnyam bzhag cing / /rdul phran ma lus kun las rnam par ldang / /rdul phran kun la de dag mnyam bzhag cing / /
rgya mtsho rdo rje gzhi las rnam par ldang / /rgya mtsho rdo rje gzhi la mnyam bzhag cing / /rin chen shing gi 'bras las rnam par ldang / /rin chen shing gi 'bras la mnyam bzhag cing / /rgyal

ba'i 'od zer rnams las rnam par ldang / /rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgor ni mnyam bzhag cing / /rgya mtsho'i chu dang chu klung kun nas ldang / /rgya mtsho chu klung kun la mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid che ba
me yi lam las ldang / /me yi lam la de dag mnyam bzhag cing / /dran dang ldan pa rlung gi lam las ldang / /rlung gi lam la de dag mnyam bzhag
cing / /bdag nyid che ba sa yi gzhi las ldang / /sa yi gzhi la mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /lha yi gzhal med khang nas rnam par ldang / /lha yi gzhal med khang du mnyam
bzhag cing / /dran dang ldan pa klu yi gnas nas ldang / /yon tan mtha' yas bsags pa de dag gi /ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam mi khyab/ /rgyal ba kun gyis bskal pa
bsam yas su/ /bsten par mdzad kyang zad par mi rung ngo / /rgyal ba kun gyis de skad ma gsungs min/ /'gro ba'i las kyi rnam smin bsam mi khyab/ /klu yi rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas
rnam 'phrul dang / /bsam gtan pa yi rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /de dag la yang dpe bstan brjod par bya/ /de la 'dra ba'i dpe lta yod min te/ /mkhas shing gsal ba'i skye bo
dpe rnams kyis/ /bsten na myur du rnam par don shes 'gyur/ /sems kyi lam la rnam thar brgyad gnas pa'i/ /nyan thos gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur/ /mang por gyur cing de
bzhin gcig gyur te/ /nam mkha' 'di la bsam gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar/ /'og nas me 'bar steng nas chu yi rgyun/ /steng nas me 'bar 'og nas chu yi rgyun/ /'gro 'dug nyal
zhing 'greng ba de bzhin te/ /skad cig gcig la lus 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /de ni snying rje chen po ldan ma yin/ /byang chub mi tshol 'jig rten yal bar gzhog |'on kyang lus 'phrul
bsam gyis mi khyab ston/ /'jig rten phan tshol ci phyir de mi ston/ /nyi zla mkha' las rnam par rgyu 'dong zhing / /phyogs rnams kun gyi mtsho dang lu ma dang / /lteng ka khron pa rin chen rgya
mtsho'i snod/ /chu klung kun tu gzugs brnyan ston par byed/ /de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs kun kyang / /skyes bu dpa' bo de dag phyogs bcur ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi
tshul la mkhas/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dpal/ /mtsho gsal dang bar yan lag bzhi yi dpung / /so sor rang rang gzugs brnyan tshul bzhin mthong / /ral gri shang lang sog
ka mde'u thung mda'/ /bzhon pa theg pa go cha bcas pa mthong / /gang gi gzugs dang cha byad ci 'dra ba/ /chu gsal de la de bzhin ma nor mthong / /chu la zhe sdang byams pa rtog pa med/ /drang
srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o/ /rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra dang ldan yod pa/ /sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes pa rnams/ /de dag sgra yi yan lag dbyings tshul shes/ /sgra skad kun tu rang
rang skad du brjod/ /dbyangs ldan de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang can/ /'on kyang sgra kun dbyangs kyi tshul la mkhas/ /gzugs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob rnams/ /'jig rten lhar bcas
ci phyir mgur mi byed/ /dga' byed chung ma sgra snyan ldan pa mo/ /tshangs pa'i bu mo sems las byung ba ste/ /dam tshig bden sgrub mi tshe dga' ba yin/ /sems
yid ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa byed/ /sgra snyan ldan pa 'dod chags zhe sdang can/ /brtul zhugs grub la dbyangs kyi rjes su 'brang / /'jig rten yid 'ong sgras kyang tshim par byed/ /
ye shes yon tan mang ba cir mi ston/ /sngags kyi tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang / /sna tshogs mtha' yas gzugs mang ston pa byed/ /nyin mtshan yud dang zla ba lo brgya dang / /khyim
bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes pa ston/ /'dod chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang / /sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten dga' bar byed/ /bsam gtan mngon shes rnam 'phrul rab
byang ba| |spyod pa'i tshul mkhas ci phyir dga' mi byed/ /lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe/ /lha min lha yang rung ste gang pham pa/ /de dag bzhon pa theg pa gdugs bcas par/ /
go cha gyon bzhin 'jigs pas kun tu byer/ /lha dbang de dag 'dod chags sdang ldan yang / /lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ston/ /dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang gnas dbang
po rnams/ /lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i glang po shugs ldan pa/ /'phrul chen glang chen dbang po'i 'khor gyur pas/ /mgo mang sum cu rtsa gnyis sprul
pa byed| |mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste/ /so rnams re re kun la'ang rdzing gi rnams/ /bdun bdun chus rgyas yongs su sprul pa byed/ /rdzing rnams re re kun tu pad+mo rnams/ /bdun
bdun rgyan gyis rnam brgyan sprul pa byed/ /pad+mo re re lha yi bu mo dag /sgyu rtsal kun mkhas bdun bdun sprul pa byed/ /de dag rtsed mo glu gar tshul la mkhas/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dbang po de

dang rtse| |glang po de yang klu yi lus btang zhing / /lha rnams kun dang mnyam zhing 'dra bar rdzu/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang ldongs spyod kun dang mthun/ /glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrul ci 'dra ltos/ /de ni
'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can/ /'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na/ /shes rab thabs kyi stobs la byang 'gyur rnams/ /ting 'dzin brgyas kyang ci rab 'phrul mi byed/ /sgra gcan ci
dga'i tshul du lus rdzu na/ /rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa'i mthil bor zhing / /rgya mtsho'i zab ring lte bar phyin tsam byed/ /ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyoms/ /de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti
mug can/ /'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na/ /'jig rten sgron ma bdun rnams yongs 'dul ba/ /rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ci rob ston mi byed/ /bsam yas brgya byin 'phrul yang
ltos shig dang / /lha dang lha dbang 'thab par gyur pa'i tshe/ /lha min bye ba 'byed pa ji snyed pa/ /de snyed brgya byin rang gi lus 'phrul byed/ /lha min dbang po lha min phal kun gyis/ /brgya
byin rang rang mdun na 'dug par shes/ /de ni rdo rje 'chang bas bzung gyur ces/ /lha min dbang po kun kyang mgo myos so/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis mig
stong rab bstan te/ /rdo rje me lce 'bar bar rab gzas shing / /lus la go bgos gzi brjid thub dka' ba'i/ /brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byor/ /de ni bsod nams phal gyi
stobs dang mthus/ /lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na/ /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi mgon gyur ba'i/ /bsod nams mi bzad rnams ko cir mi 'phrul/ /lha rnams bskul ba'i lha
rdzas lnga yod pa/ /lha yi las rnams rnam par smin pas byung / /lha rnams bag med spyod par shes gyur nas/ /mkha' las rnga yi dbyangs kyang rab tu sgrog /'dod pa thams cad mi
rtag mi brtan te/ /'jig cing mi gnas dbu ba'i rang bzhin 'dra/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu yi zla ba bzhin/ /srid pa kun kyang rmi lam sprin gyi dngos/ /bag med thams cad gcugs can mya
ngan ldan/ /chems kyi lam yin 'chi med lam ma yin/ /ji snyed bag med rnam par spyod pa rnams/ /bdud kyi chu srin chen pos zos pa yin/ /yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad sdug
bsngal rtsa/ /skye ba thams cad 'phags pa kun gyis smad/ /'dod pa'i yon tan mthar zad rang bzhin gyis/ /chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar gyis/ /brgya byin lhar bcas
rnga yis bskul byas nas/ /kun kyang chos bzang mdun sar dong phyung te/ /lha mang kun la chos gtam zhi ba'i rnams/ /'dod chags bral dang rjes su mthun pa brjod/ /rnga rab de ni
gzugs med mi mthong yang / /don chen rnga yi sgra ni sgrog byed na/ /bsam pa'i tshul bzhin gzugs mang ston byed pa/ /'gro ba kun gyi don chen cir mi byed/ /lha dang lha min 'thab par gyur
pa'i tshe/ /lha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyis/ /lha rnams bskul ba'i lha rdzas rnga yi mchog /lha rnams 'jigs sa re zhes sgra yang sgrog /rngas bskul lha rnams yongs su dga'
ba skyed/ /'jigs med stobs dang shin tu ldan par 'gyur/ /lha min dbang po 'jigs shing dngang gyur nas/ /de ma thag tu 'jigs shing kun tu 'byin/ /de bzhin rnga 'dra 'jigs med stobs pa'i
rnams/ /'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang dpung 'gyur te/ /bdud dang nyon mongs bcom pa'i snying rje can/ /zhi ba'i sgra sgrogs nyon mongs rab tu sel/ /dbang ba'i lha mo dgu bcu rtsa gnyis te/ /dbang
po sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur/ /gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin brtse bar shes/ /gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no/ /lha mo kun kyang dga' bar gnas snang yang / chos
bzang mdun sa kun na'ang de bzhin 'dug /lha rnams kun la chos rab ston par yang / /brgya byin skad cig gcig gis rnam par 'phrul/ /brgya byin 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
can| |sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na/ /'gro don mi skyo spyod pa ci yi phyir/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten dgar mi byed/ /bdud kyi
dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba/ /de yi dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dod/ /las dang nyon mongs kun tu 'khri zhags kyis/ /so so'i skye bo bdud 'khrug des kyang bcings/ /
de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can/ /'gro ba mang po bdud kyi dbang byed na/ /dbang bcu'i dbang thob gyur pa ci rab ste/ /'gro ba thams cad rang gi phyogs mi gzhog /stong gsum
bdag po tshangs pa chen po yang / /stong gsum kun gyi tshangs pa'i gnas rnams na/ /ma lus kun tu 'dug par rab tu snang / /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong rnams kyang sgrog /de ni
'jig rten pa yi lam gyis ni/ /bsam gtan mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul/ /'jig rten yongs 'das bla na med pa yi/ /bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cir mi 'phrul//
dbang phyug chen po'i ye shes rnam 'phrul ltos/ /rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis char rnams rab bkye ba/ /skad cig gcig gis thams cad 'grang ba byed/ /thigs 'ga'i zer kyang ma lus
des shes na/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab tshul bslab ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med thob rnams/ /ci rob 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi/ /skad cig gcig la sems
bsam shes mi 'gyur/ /sems can las smin bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /rlung las 'jig rten thams cad yongs su byung / /rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med dang / /sa bon rnam mang kun
kyang de las byung / /rlung las sprin 'byung char pa kun tu 'bab/ /sprin mang zhi bar 'gyur ba'ang rlung gis 'gyur/ /lo rtog rnam par 'phel ba'ang rlung gis te/ /'jig rten kun la rlung ni bde
ba skyed| |de ni pha rol phyin la ma bslab ste/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rlung gis bslab min na'ang / /'jig rten rnam grub bsam yas ston byed na/ /rang nyams thob pa ci ro ba ston mi byed/ /rgya
mtsho'i 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi chu tshogs ni/ /bya skad rnams dang ji snyed ri dwags skad/ /khye'u dang bu mo bud med skyes pa'i skad/ /thams cad skad bzhin 'gro la rnam par sgrog /de bzhin sgra
snyan rang bzhin sgra shes nas/ /sgrib pa med pa'i spobs pa rab ldan pas/ /'gro ba kun tu sgra snyan brjod byas shing / /'jig rten thams cad yid 'ong sgras tshim byed/ /rgya mtsho 'di
la ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /'gro ba thams cad rgya dang mnyam snang zhing / /chu dang 'byung po rin chen yongs mi zad/ /chu rnams bzung bas yongs su ngoms pa med/ /de bzhin de dag 'gro
kun rgyar stsal te/ /bsod nams bsam gtan rnam thar zad mi shes/ /shes rab ye shes yon tan de bzhin kun/ /bsod nams yon tan tshogs kyis ngoms pa med/ /rgya mtsho'i klu ni
rnam par rtse byed na/ /sa yi gzhi nas dbang sgyur gnas kyi bar/ /gling bzhi bcas par sprin chen rgyas par 'gengs/ /de dag kun kyang rgyan mang sna tshogs
ldan| |de ni dbang sgyur gnas su 'dzam bu chu klung gi /gser gyi mdog tu sprin mang rnam par sgrub/ /'phrul dga' mu tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu/ /dga' ldan gnas su kha ba ba mo'i
mdog /mtsher mar mthon mthing bai DUR+Ya yi mdog /sum cu gsum du asma gar+b+ha 'dra/ /rgyal chen gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bu/ /rdo rje mi phyed sra mdog rgya mtshor ro/ /mi ci
gnas su spos mchog 'dres par te/ /klu yi gnas su pad+mo'i mdog lta bu/ /gnod sbyin gnas su ngang pa chu skyar mdog /ri yi mdog tu lha min gnas su 'o/ /byang du gser gyi kha
dog 'od ston te/ /gling rnams gzhan du'ang sna tshogs rgyan du ston/ /'dzam bu'i gling du ri gnag 'dra bar te/ /sprin rnams gang rnams ji ltar grub pa bzhin/ /dbang sgyur gnas
su gser gyi sprin bstan nas/ /nyi ma'i mdog 'dra klog kyang rab tu 'gyed/ /dbang sgyur gnas su zla 'od bzang 'dra dang / /dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog ston//
kha ba ba mo'i mdog tu mtshe mar te/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su gser mdog tu/ /rgyal chen gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog /mu tig dmar po'i mdog tu rgya mtshor ro/ /
mi ci gnas su mthon mthing bai DUr+ya/ /klu yi gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog /gnod sbyin gnas su shel gyi kha dog ste/ /asma'i mdog tu lha min gnas su 'o/ /byang du ngang gis snang
ba'i rin chen mdog /gling rnams gzhan du'ang rnam phye gzhan dang gzhan/ /'dzam bu'i gling du 'od 'phro an+d+ha rnyil/ /sprin gyi mtshan nyid tshul 'thun glog kyang 'gyed/ /de ni tshangs pa'i
dbang sgyur gnas su tshangs dbyangs su/ /'brug sgra sgrog byed 'phrul dga' rnga yi dbyangs/ /rol mo'i sgrar yang dga' ldan gnas su ste/ /lha mo'i dbyangs su mtshe ma dag tu 'o/ /sum cu
gsum du mi'am ci'i skad du ste/ /rgyal chen gnas su dri za'i skad du 'o/ /ri 'thab dbyangs su rgya mtsho kun tu ste/ /mi'am ci yi gnas su gling bu'i sgra/ /klu yi gnas su thal mo brdabs
pa'i sgra| |gnod sbyin gnas su klu yi bu mo'i sgra/ /lha min gnas su lha rdzas rnga yi sgra/ /rgya mtsho'i shugs sgrar mi yi gnas su 'o/ /dbang sgyur gnas su lha rdzas gsung zhim pa'i/ /me
tog sna tshogs rgyan mang char yang 'bebs/ /zla ba bzang po'i 'od 'dra 'phrul dgar te/ /me tog man+dA ra ba'i phreng char 'bebs/ /dga' ldan gnas su rin chen chen po'i char/ /rgyan gyi dam
pa rin chen sna tshogs dang / /gtsug gi rin chen zla ba 'dra ba dang / /gser 'od zer bzang po'i char pa rab tu 'bebs/ /rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ba dan bzang po dang / /phreng ba byug pa
rgyan gyi dam pa dang / /mu tig dmar po la ltar btags mdog tu/ /rol mo yid 'ong char pa mtshe mar 'bebs/ /sum cu gsum du rin chen sna tshogs
te| |tsan+dan dam pa'i spos dang a ga ru/ /gur gum ge sar lha rdzas ta ma la/ /spos chu'i rgyun dang me tog 'dres par 'bebs/ /nyams su 'gyur ba'i kha zas skom gyi rnams/ /kha
dog dri zhim ro dang ldan pa dang / /de min rin chen char 'bab bsam yas kyang / /rgyal chen bzhi yi gnas su klu dbang 'bebs/ /de ni rgya mtsho chen por rgyun du yang / /char rgyud rgyun
mi 'chad pa gnya' shing tsam/ /mi zad rin chen shin tu rnam rgyal ba'i/ /rin chen char ni mtha' yas rgyun du 'babs/ /mi ci gnas su phreng ba sna tshogs dang / /pad+mo ut+pal
dngos dang rin chen dang / /me tog par shi ma li phye ma spos/ /pi wang rnga dang gling bu snyan par ro/ /klu yi gnas su mu tig dmar po ste/ /gnod sbyin gnas su rin chen dwangs
snang ba| |lha min gnas su ral gri mde'u thung mdung / /dgra 'dul gzhu dang ste'u ka'i char 'bebs so/ /byang du de ni phreng ba rin chen dang / /me tog par shi ma li tsam pa ka'i/ /
phreng ba bzang po ku ran muk+ta ka /gling rnams gzhan du'ang char pa sna tshogs so/ /'dzam bu'i gling du chu 'dang rab gsal gyi/ /char rnams sna tshogs shin tu phra bar 'bebs/ /
me tog 'bras bu sman dang spos dang shing / /lo las de bzhin 'jig rten bde 'phel byed/ /de ltar sprin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang / /glog dang 'brug dang char pa rnam phyed kyang / /
khyim nas mi g.yo rnam par rtog pa med/ /klu yi 'phrul yang de ltar bsam mi khyab/ /de ltar chu yi rgya mtshor gnas pa yang / /klu yi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ /chos kyi rgya
mtshor zhugs pa'i yon tan bdag /mtha' yas rnam 'phrul mang po cir mi ston/ /dper bya de dag kun gyis mgo smos tsam/ /skyes bu de dag brjod byas yangs pa ste/ /dpa' bo de
dag dpe dang rnam par bral/ /de dag de 'dra'i rnam thar dbang bsgyur ro/ /mtha' yas blo gros yangs pa'i blo gros can/ /ma nor blo gros mtha' yas blo gros can/ /ye shes mchog
dang khyad par blo ldan pa'i/ /rnam thar dam pa de 'dra'i tshul du bshad/ /gang gis rnam thar 'di dag thos gyur nas/ /yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog pa ni/ /ngo mtshar rmad kyi
chos dang de ldan te/ /mi yul kun na de ni dka' ba byed/ /'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa/ /so so skye bo'i tshogs na'ang shin tu dkon/ /dge bsags bsod nams byas pa
de dag ni/ /rgyu yi stobs kyis 'di la yid ches 'gyur/ /gang rnams nyan thos theg la'ang yid ches pa'i/ /mi rnams 'jig rten kun na dkon pa ste/ /de bas rang rgyal theg pa dad
pa dkon/ /theg chen dad byed de bas shin tu dkon/ /theg chen 'di la zhugs pa dkon pa ste/ /'di 'dra'i chos la dad pa shin tu dkon/ /'dzin cing
spel byed smos kyang ci dgos te/ /yang dag ma nor 'jug pa smos ci dgos/ /la la stong gsum ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /bskal par 'dzin cing mgo la khyer byed na'ang / /
'di 'dra'i chos la dad par byed pa las/ /de 'dra dka' bar brtsi ba ma yin no/ /la las stong gsum rdul snyed sems can rnams/ /bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur
na'ang / /'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i/ /bsod nams ci 'dra thob pa de la min/ /la la zhing bcu ri dang mtshor bcas pa/ /lag pa'i mthil gyis nam mkha'i dbyings
'dzin kyang / /'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i/ /dka' ba de 'dra de la yod pa min/ /la la zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can rnams/ /bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen
bkur kyang / /'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i/ /bsod nams ci 'dra de 'dra de la min/ /la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /bskal par bde ba kun gyis
bsnyen bkur te/ /la las le'u 'di yongs su bzung byas na/ /bsod nams 'di ni de las khyad par 'phags/ /rnam thar de dag yongs su bstan pa'i tshe/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams
thams cad g.yos par gyur/ /lha dang bdud kyi gnas rnams zil gyis mnan/ /'od mang bkye bas ngan song rab tu zhi/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi seng+ge rnams/ /thams cad kun gyis
mngon par zhal bstan te/ /phyag brkyang mtha' yas yon tan mang bdog pa/ /bzang po'i dpal gyi mgo la bzhag par gyur/ /phyag gi mthil gyis mgo la byug mdzad de/ /sangs rgyas
de dag kun gyis gsung brjod pa/ /rnam thar 'di dag khyod kyis legs bshad kyi/ /legs par bstan la rjes su nged dgyes so/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che
zhes bya ba las/ bzang po'i dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// //bam po nyi shu pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams
dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gling bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa gling bzhi pa re re na yang de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag de bzhin du bzhugs par snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston cing / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod par yang so so nas shes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de ma btul bar byang chub kyi shing
drung nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang pa rnam par rgyal ba ga la ba der gshegs par snang ngo / /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse
mar gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ste/ byin gyi rlabs snga ma dag kyang ma nyams
par snang ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa logs su mngon par gshegs pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas rnam par rgyal
ba'i khang pa'i nang du rings pa'i gzugs su rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin seng+ge'i gdan phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po can/ bog re stong phrag bcus brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra ba
stong phrag bcu kun tu bres pa/ gnam yol stong phrag bcus bla rer bres pa/ gdugs stong phrag bcu shin tu bzung ba/ dar gyi lda ldi stong phrag bcu rab tu dbyangs pa/ mu tig
gi se mo do stong phrag bcus dga' dga' ltar byas pa/ gos stong phrag bcus mngon par bkab pa/ lha'i bu stong phrag bcus mdun du byas pa/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcus
kun nas bskor ba/ 'od zer stong phrag bcus shin tu snang bar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du bshams so/ /ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i
khang pa rnam par rgyal bar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bshams pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ri rab kyi rtse mo dag tu yang
lha'i dbang po brgya byin dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan dag tshul de 'dra ba dang / rgyan de 'dra bar bshams par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan
'das kyi gdan seng+ge'i khri bcas nas rje sa dang rim gro chen pos bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ gshegs su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ gshegs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs
sam zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis spyan drangs nas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs so/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de
bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha'i khang pa dag tu'ang gshegs par snang ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang pa
thams cad du glu dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan brgya phrag mang po dag btang ste zhi bar byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snga ma dag las
dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa de dag rjes su dran nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /thugs rje chen po mnga' ba 'od srung rigs skyes pa/ /rnam
par rgyal bar gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /gser thub bsgribs pa med par rab tu gzigs pa de/ /rin
chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /bsod skyabs gser gyi ri bo 'bar ba 'dra ba de/ /rtse mo mchog
tu gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /thams cad mnga' ba dgra bcom dri ma gsum sel ba/ /mdzod spu'i rtse
mor gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor dgongs pa zil gyis mi non pa/ /rin chen sna
tshogs gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /rnam par gzigs pa skyes bu'i zla ba mi yi mgon/ /rin chen rgyan
du gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /shin tu rgyas pa don dam mkhas shing bstan pa de/ /ma la ya yi rtse mor
gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas ston mchog thogs pa mi mnga' ba/ /dri med zla bar gshegs gyur pa/ /
des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /grags pa dri ma med pa mgon po pad+mo'i bla/ /dri ma med par gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang
bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /mgon po mar me mdzad pa 'od snang mnga' ba de/ /'od zer dra bar gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis
legs gyur cig /ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa glur blangs te tshigs su bcad pa de
bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i dbang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyis yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa dag glur len cing tshigs su bcad par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs
so| |bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag gdan de dag la bzhugs
par snang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das de ltar bzhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa de yang sum cu rtsa gsum thams cad kyi khang pa dang / lha'i
ris tsam du che bar snang bar gyur te/ 'di na ji lta ba ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin no/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba
las| de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs pa'i le'u ste/ bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa'
bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas 'ongs pa sha stag
ste| byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag
thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar chos kyi blo gros dang / thams cad blo gros dang / dpal gyi blo gros dang / yon tan blo gros dang / brtson 'grus blo gros
dang / dge ba'i blo gros dang / ye shes blo gros dang / bden pa'i blo gros dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / dam pa'i blo gros dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad
kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar dbang po'i me tog dang / pad+mo'i me tog dang / rin po che'i me tog dang / ut+pa la'i me tog
dang / rdo rje'i me tog dang / spos kyi me tog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i me tog dang / 'od zer gyi me tog dang / ldum bu'i me tog dang / nam mkha'i me tog dag go /byang chub sems
dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar zla ba gzhan ma yin pa dang / zla ba ma mnyam pa
dang / zla ba mi g.yo ba dang / zla ba mi sgul ba dang / zla ba chu'i lha dang / zla ba thogs pa med pa dang / zla ba'i 'od zer dang / zla ba rdul med pa dang / zla ba rnams par grub pa dag go/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang nas gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs
su brten te/ seng+ge'i khri rnam par snang ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mo la byang chub
sems dpa' rnams lhags pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / lha'i dbang po'i khang pa kun na yang de
bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ming de skad ces bya ba sha stag go /'jig rten gyi khams kyang de skad ces bya ba nas 'ongs pa sha stag go /de bzhin gshegs pa yang
mtshan de skad ces bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs par spyod par sha stag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi mtho bong gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba phrag stong pa kye ste/ phyogs bcu
thams cad snang bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang bstan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi gling
bzhi pa thams cad dang / ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yod pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad smras so/ /snang ba dri ma med la ltos/ /ri rab rtse mo thams cad la/ /mgon po
dag ni rab tu snang / /rnam par rgyal ba kun na bzhugs/ /lha'i rgyal po thams cad kyis/ /spyan drangs shing ni gshegs par gyur/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas bcu dag gis/ /rab tu
gshegs pas mngon par bstod/ /kun gyi 'khor kyang gcig pa ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags/ /phyogs bcu dag nas 'ongs gyur cing / /yid du 'ong ba'i stan la 'khod/ /
kun gyi ming yang 'di nyid de/ /ji ltar nged la btags pa bzhin/ /'jig rten khams kyi ming dag kyang / /de skad dag nas kun kyang 'ongs/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na/ /drang srong
chen po'i mtshan kyang de/ /de na tshangs spyod bla med la/ /the tshom med par de dag spyod/ /kye ma rgyal sras khyed ltos shig /drang srong chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /'dzam bu'i gling rnams thams
cad na| |rgyal ba 'di na bzhugs snyam byed/ /bdag cag rnams ni 'di snyam du/ /ri rab rtse la bde gshegs snyam/ /'jig rten khams rnams kun na yang / /sangs rgyas ngo mtshar rmad re
che| |'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na/ /byang chub mchog tu sems btang zhing / /de dag smon lam 'di btab ste/ /byang chub spyod pa rab tu spyod/ /kha dog mdog ni tshad med pas/ /gang
zag mchog ni spyod byed kyang / /chos kyi dbyings la mi chags te/ /de dag sus kyang mi shes so/ /gang gis 'jig rten mun bsal cing / /thams cad dus su rnam snang ba/ /de la 'dra ba gang
yang med/ /de ni shes par ji ltar rung / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras so/ /'dren pa rnams ni mthong
nas kyang / /bskal pa mang po 'das gyur te/ /'jig rten mgon skyob de dag gi /chos nyid de ni shes pa min/ /mtshan ma dag la spyod pa rnams/ /gti mug dra
ba 'phel bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas gang gis ma mthong ba/ /'khor ba'i btson rar ldongs pa yin/ /chos rnams 'di dag brtags byas na/ /rang bzhin shes par mi rung ste/ /skye dang
shi 'phor gyur pa rnams/ /ming tsam du ni bstan pa yin/ /chos rnams gang yang 'pho ba med/ /gang yang de bzhin skye ba med/ /chos nyid 'di ni shes gyur na/ /sangs rgyas kun na
rab tu snang / /gzung du med cing bltar med cing / /chos kyi rnams ni rang bzhin med/ /dngos med pa yi mtha' shes na/ /sangs rgyas rnams la tshang kyang med/ /tshad med pa yi chos
rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin gang gis yongs shes pa/ /des ni ci zhig yod ces par/ /mthong bar 'gyur ba gang yang med/ /gang rnams mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang ba/ /de dag byis pa'i
chos nyid de/ /de phyir mtshan nyid kun med pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi mthong ngo / /dus gsum byung ba'i thub pa rnams/ /mtshan rab kun dang ldan pa ste/ /mi gnas tshul du bzhugs
pa yin| |chos kyi dbyings la g.yo ba med/ /la la dag gi chos nyid shes/ /la la dag ni chos kyang brjod/ /gang la the tshom mi mnga' ba'i/ /yang dag sangs rgyas de ring mthong / /
sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos nyid 'di/ /chos kyi blo gros 'dis brjod do/ /de thos nas kyang bdag gis ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsam yas shes/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
dpal gyi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /kye ma sangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba'i/ /ye
shes shes rab shin tu che/ /de la 'jig rten shin tu rmongs/ /sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab/ /tshul bzhin ma yin 'du shes kyis/ /byis pa rnams ni sems byed pas/ /de phyir
'du shes kun sbyangs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mi mthong ngo / /shes rab chung ba thams cad ni/ /phung po'i 'du shes rnams la gnas/ /phung po rnam par ma bsgoms pas/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa mi mthong ngo / /dngos med dngos su bshad pa ni/ /bdag gi dngos zhes bya ba yin/ /chos rnams thams cad shes bgyis shing / /rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ltos/ /sngon chad
phung po'i tshul bzhin du/ /ma 'ongs rnams kyang sus mthong ba/ /ma 'ongs pa yi tshul shes pas/ /sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab ltos/ /ji ltar snang ba med pa yi/ /mun pa'i nang na
gzugs mi snang / /de bzhin chos rnams bshad pa ni/ /mkhas kyang shes par mi rung ngo / /ji ltar dri ma ldan mig gis/ /gsal ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin sems
ni ma sbyangs pas/ /sangs rgyas chos ni mi mthong ngo / /ji ltar nyi ma bsgribs med pa/ /rab rib can gyis mi mthong ba/ /de bzhin phug na gnas sems
kyis| |sangs rgyas dag ni mi mthong ngo / /de bas mig ni rnam par sbyongs/ /gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par sgoms/ /chos rnams mthong ba med pa yis/ /'od mdzad rab
tu mthong ma yin/ /ji ltar sngon blos kun bshad cing / /bdag gis ji ltar thos pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mi rnyings pa/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab tu mthong / /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' yon tan blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyis mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gnas med pa yi chos rnams la/ /
gnas ni yongs su brtags pas na/ /de phyir srid pa'i brtson ra na/ /byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'khor/ /brjod pas brjod du mi rung chos/ /zlo zhan rnams kyis rnam par brtags/ /des
ni yongs su bsgribs byas pas/ /bdag gi sems kyang rab rmongs byed/ /shes rab chung la lam nor cing / /bdag gi sems la mi mkhas pa/ /phyin ci log gi blo dag gis/ /mi
bzad lus ni 'phel bar byed/ /gang gis stong pa ma mthong ba/ /de dag 'khor zhing nyam yang nga / /chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /mig kyang de la yod pa min/ /de bas mig
ni sbyang bar gyis/ /bsam pa rnams kyang rnam par sems/ /gang phyir bdag cag sngon chad du/ /bde gshegs ma mthong chud kyang zos/ /yang dag sangs rgyas mthong ba na'ang / /gang gi
sems la chags med pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas cis byung ba'i/ /chos rnams de dag rab tu mthong / /gang gis shes rab che mnga' ba/ /chos su bde gshegs mthong ba rnams/ /de dag
'jig rten mig can te/ /gang gis mthong ba mthong zhes bya/ /lhag mthong med par mthong ba ni/ /chos rnams ngan par mthong ba ste/ /lhag mthong gis ni mthong gyur na/ /thams cad
mthong ba med pa yin/ /kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni/ /yang dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad/ /de ni rang bzhin thams cad du/ /shi ba med cing 'tsho ba med/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ji 'dra
ba| |dpal gyi blos ni sngon bstan te/ /de las bdag gis thos nas kyang / /sangs rgyas chos nyid shes ma gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyis phyogs
bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rnam par rtog pa spyod pa yi/ /mig ni shin tu 'khrul pa yin/ /'khrul par mthong ba log pa ste/ /sangs rgyas
la ni log mi mnga'/ /gang gis log par shes gyur te/ /yang dag ji bzhin ma nor la/ /yang dag ma yin bden shes na/ /sangs rgyas dri med mthong ba yin/ /mthong ba dag gis dri
mar 'gyur/ /rnam par mthong na de med de/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong dang bral/ /de bas rnam par gzigs zhes bya/ /de ni 'jig rten spyod pa ste/ /'jig
rten de yang rnam par brtags/ /'jig rten 'jig pa shes gyur na/ /snang ba dag ni skye bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten rnams kyi snang pa ni/ /'jig rten mtshan nyid snang ba ste/ /yang dag
ji bzhin bsam byas shing / /de ltar mthong na mthong ba'o/ /de ltar mthong na nyon mongs med/ /dbang du gyur cing zag pa med/ /gang gis tha dad med mthong ba/ /dngos por brtags
pa ma yin no/ /rtog dang rnam par rtog pa ni/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams brjod pa ste/ /de dag yod pa ma yin pas/ /rang bzhin de phyir sbyangs pa yin/ /de dag rang bzhin rnam par dag/
nam mkha' bzhin du mtshan nyid med/ /de dag la ni ston pa med/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis de ltar ltos/ /chos rnams la ni mos med de/ /chos kyi 'du shes rnams bsgoms shing //
shes pa de yang ma bsgoms pa/ /des ni thub chen mthong ba yin/ /ji ltar yon tan blos brjod pa/ /de ltar yang dag sangs rgyas mthong / /de mthong bas na 'du byed kun/ /rang
bzhin gyis ni rnam par zhi/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
pa 'di dag smras so/ /kye ma sangs rgyas dpa' chen rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med do/ /rnam grol thugs ni sdig mi mnga'/ /'jig rten mthar phyin rgal ba'o/ /yang dag ji
bzhin ma nor bar/ /bskal pa rnams ni tshad med pas/ /ji ltar mkhas pas mthong ba bzhin/ /'jig rten sgron mas rab tu gzigs/ /'du byed thams cad skad cig ma/ /so so'i skye
bo de dag 'gengs/ /nam mkha'i khams ni bzung byas shing / /de dag de phyir khom pa med/ /khom pa med ces bya ba ni/ /ci yang brjod du med pa ste/ /khom pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /
khom pa bsam gyis mi khyab thob/ /gang la dngos po med pa yi/ /mi zad khom pa med par bshad/ /yod pa'i rang bzhin shes gyur na/ /des ni grags chen mthong ba yin/ /mthong ba med
pa mthong zhes bya/ /yod pa med pa'ang yod ces bya/ /mthong ba dag gam yod pa min/ /ma bsgoms pa ni rnam par bsgoms/ /ji ltar blta ba sus mthong ba/ /de dag gis ni lta ba bshig /
gang la sangs rgyas smos pa yi/ /de dag chos rnams zhig pa med/ /ji ltar thub pas bstan pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas yongs su sus mthong ba/ /de ni 'jig rten snang bar byed/ /rgyal ba
rnam par snang mdzad bzhin/ /chos rnams kyi ni snang ba gcig /de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu bstan/ /des ni brtson blo brtan pa de/ /chos mang bye ba rab tu ston/ /yod dang med pa shes
byas te| |gang gi 'du shes rnam bsgoms pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas mthong ba ste/ /yang dag mtha' la rab tu gnas/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes
blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di thos pas/ /snang ba bdag cag shes par
gyur| |phyogs bcu kun tu snang ba yi/ /yang dag sangs rgyas des kyang mthong / /sems can rang bzhin yod gyur pa/ /de ni sems can g.yang sa ste/ /'di la ci yang yod pa min/ /
tshig gi lam rnams bsdus pa 'o/ /byis pa 'dzin dang bcas pa rnams/ /bdag lus yang dag 'dzin pa la/ /sangs rgyas snang bar mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzung ba med/ /
yang dag sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing / /gang rnams mig yod ma yin pa/ /de skad bskal pa grangs med du/ /srid pa'i gang chen mtsho na 'khor/ /nyon mongs can ni 'khor bar bshad//
nyon mongs med pa mya ngan 'das/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yang / /rang bzhin rnyed par mi rung ngo / /'khor zhes bya ba brda yin te/ /mya ngan 'das pa brjod pa yin/ /'phags pa'i
chos rnams ma skyes pa/ /bla ma dag ni mi shes so/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rgyal ba 'di/ /'di yin 'di 'dra'i 'du shes can/ /de dag sangs rgyas mi mthong ste/ /tshul bzhin ma yin
phyin ci log /zhi ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bar/ /gang gis zhi ba shes gyur pa/ /des ni tshig gi lam 'das pa'i/ /yang dag sangs rgyas rab tu mthong / /chos rnams kun gyi spyod pa ni/ /rab
tu brjod kyang bstan pa med/ /'on kyang mnyam pa nyid du blta/ /rgyal ba chos rnams kun dang mnyam/ /yang dag sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med/ /thog ma dag dang tha mar yang / /'gal
med rtsa ba med pas na/ /de ni sangs rgyas de phyir brjod/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i
tshi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam pa'i phyir/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par/ /sems can dmyal bar gnas kyang bla/ /de ni bde ba bsam
mi khyab| |ci phyir zhe na bskal pa rnams/ /grangs med sdug bsngal sngon chad byung / /'on kyang bde gshegs ma thos pas/ /bdag cag 'khor las ma grol lo/ /de bzhin ma nor
chos kyi rnams/ /yang dag nyid du rtogs gyur te/ /gang la 'grogs pa med pa rnams/ /de dag byang chub bla na med/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon sum pa/ /sngon chad ma byung 'byung mi
'gyur| |gang phyir sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos/ /de dag mtshan nyid med pa 'o/ /chos rnams blta dka' ji bzhin du/ /gang zhig de ltar rtog pa ni/ /de dag sangs rgyas kun gzigs
pa| |yang dag lta bas shin tu mthong / /yang dag la ni yang dag gzigs/ /yang dag min par yang dag min/ /'di yi mtha' ni ston pas na/ /sangs
rgyas sangs rgyas zhes kyang bya/ /khor du ma chud chos bstan te/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu brjod/ /'di ni sangs rgyas sgom pa ste/ /gcig tu dmigs pa ma yin no/ /de ltar
mang dang gcig gnas pa/ /mang po dag tu rnam par shes/ /gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis/ /bsags pa dag kyang rab tu byas/ /byas pa med cing byed pa med/ /las kyi 'du
shes rnam bsgoms shing / /las 'di ji bzhin shes byas nas/ /rnam pa dag kyang mi dmigs so/ /gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi/ /nges pa'i gnas ni dmigs med pas/ /
gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas g.yo ba gang yang med/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur
rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sems can chen po bla na med/ /sems can 'du shes rnam par bsgoms/ /'jug par bya ba gang yang med/ /de
bas bla na med ces bya/ /gang la phra ba yod min pa/ /de la sbom pa'ang yod pa min/ /de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis brnyes/ /rnam par mi rtog 'dus ma byas/ /gang zhig sangs
rgyas spyod yul ba/ /de la phra ba yod pa min/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bgrang dang bral/ /de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do/ /mun pa rnams ni rnam gsal cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
snang / /de la snang ba gang yang med/ /mi snang ba yang ci yang med/ /thams cad chos la kun nas dga'/ /skyes pa med cing gnas pa med/ /'dod chags med cing rten pa med/ /chos nyid
de yang sbed pa med/ /gang la gnyis su bgrang med cing / /gcig kyang yod pa ma yin pas/ /ji bzhin rab tu gnas pa yi/ /shes rab chen po legs par mthong / /mi gnyis pa la
gnyis pa med/ /gnyis pa med pa stong pa ste/ /stong pa de yang khams gsum kun/ /de ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o/ /byis pas byang chub mi shes kyang / /de dag de la rab tu gnas/ /gnas
pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis/ /rang gi lus ni rjes su blta/ /lus med pa ni lus su bshad/ /'byung ba med cing bstan du med/ /'jig tshogs mang po bltar med pa/ /sangs rgyas
sku ni bla na med/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin nyid/ /de skad bden pa'i blos smras te/ /de thos pas ni mig kyang sbyangs/ /shin tu 'od kyang dang zhing snang / /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
dam pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ drin gzo med pa'i sems can phyir/ /skyes bu drang srong
mchog gi rnams/ /dpa' chen sems can gtso bo dag /'od mdzad pa ni rab tu byung / /thugs rje chen po bskyed mdzad de/ /sems can khams la rnam
gzigs kyang / /srid pa'i bcings pas sdug bsngal ba'i/ /sems can rnams ni de nas gzigs/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas pa na/ /yang dag sangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba/ /sems
can gtso bo ma gtogs par/ /skyob pa gzhan ni gang yang med/ /gal te sangs rgyas ma skyes la/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag /med na 'jig rten khams kun na/ /sems
can bde ba gcig mi 'byung / /sems can gtso bo 'dren mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skyes pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag /'byung ba 'jig rten bde ba'i rgyu/ /gang
gis de bzhin gshegs mthor ba/ /de dag 'thob pa legs par thob/ /gang gis thos shing dad 'gyur ba/ /de yang 'jig rten mchod rten no/ /gang gis sangs rgyas mthong gyur pa/ /
bdag cag rnams kyis thob legs thob/ /'di dang 'dra ba'i tshul thos pas/ /kun kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'das pa'i dus na'ang dpal 'di yod/ /byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad kyi/ /shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs bas/ /spyod yul 'di dag mthong bar 'gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad thub mthong nas/ /da dung phyir zhing dad pa skye/ /de yi ye
shes mtha' yas pas/ /da dung brjod du yod pa min/ /gang zhig mchog gi blos smras dang / /rgyal sras gzhan gyis bshad pa rnams/ /de dag da dung bdag gis kyang / /bskal pa bsam
yas bshad par bya/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ ri rab kyi rtse mor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i tshogs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u ste/ bcu dgu pa'o// //shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po nyi shu
gcig pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go /
de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i
phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun
kyang chos kyi blo gros zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag gis zhal mngon par bstan pa mthong bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal
te| chos kyi blo gros/ khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la mnyam par gzhog pa legs so/ /legs so/ /de bas
na rigs kyi bu/ khyod la phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang mtshan mthun pa sha stag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang / khyod bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar bstan pas 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bstan par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings su chud par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams rnam par bsgom pa dang / chags pa med pa nyid du chud par bya ba dang /
bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul thob par bya ba dang / kun nas sbyor ba thob par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang / chos thams cad khong du
chud par bya ba dang / dbang po thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / chos bstan pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa
bcu la rtsom par bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di la spobs
pa skyed cig /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la chags pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /thogs pa med pa nye bar sgrub

pa mdzad do/ /mchod pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /rmongs pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /tha dad pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /kha na ma tho ba med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /

dpag tu med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /zhum pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /'phrog pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i
phyir ro| |de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi spyi bo la phyag g.yas pas byug pa mdzad de/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das de dag gi phyag gis reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros ting nge 'dzin de las langs te byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang
chub sems dpa'i rigs zhes bya ba 'di ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pas shin tu yangs pa ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
ni| 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' brtson par byed pa gang las bsam ste de skad du smras pa de
dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba dag go /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod
pa dang / las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
rnam par dgod pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang /
phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
dgod pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa ste/ 'das pa dang /
ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la sems dang
po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas mdzes pa dang / bzang ba dang / mig
tu thong ba dang / kha dog rgyas pa dang / thub par dka' ba dang / mthu che bar mthong ba'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / rjes su bstan
pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'am/ sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
chos rgya chen po thos par gyur nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing / snga phyi med par byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sems bskyed pa dang po des ni/ thub par dka' ba'i gnas bcu
yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang
ba shes pa dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa yongs su rdzogs pa mchog dang tha ma shes pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa dang mos pa du ma shes pa dang / khams tha dad pa
dang khams du ma shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par
'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa dang / rjes su dran pa bsgribs pa med pa shes pa dang / chags pa med pa'i lha'i mig shes pa dang / dus
gsum mnyam pa nyid du zag pa med pa shes pa'o/ /thub par dka' ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongs su zin par 'gyur te/ de ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o//
kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa de ni/ sangs rgyas mchod pa la sbyar bar bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bsten par bde ba yang de la
brjod par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi nang na gtso bor gyur pa yang de la brjod par bya'o/ /phul du phyin pa yang de la brjod par bya'o/ /zil gyis mi non pa'i gnas kyang de la brjod par bya'o//
sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba yang de la bstan par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas tshad med pa dang 'phrad par 'gyur ba yang de la bstan par bya'o/ /rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba yang de la
brjod par bya'o/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo las ldog par 'gyur ba yang de la brjod par bya'o/ /sems can sdug bsngal ba yongs su bskyab pa yang de la brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na| sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la de bas kyang shas cher sems skye bar bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog
par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la las dang po
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la rnam pa bcur sems nye
bar gzhog ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog go /snying brtse ba'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / gnas pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems
dang / phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / yongs su srung ba'i sems dang / mnyam pa'i sems dang / slob dpon gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems nye bar gzhog go /rnam pa bcu po
de dag gis sems can thams cad la sems nye bar gzhog ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang
chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de ni/ thog ma nyid du kha ton la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /mang du thos nas dben par gnas pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /rab tu dben
par gyur nas dge ba'i bshes su 'gyur bar yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes su gyur nas nga lo bde ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /nga
lo bde bar gyur nas dus shes pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /dus shes nas mi 'jigs pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /mi 'jigs par gyur nas don shes pa la yongs
su bskul bar bya'o/ /don shes nas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /chos kyi rjes su 'gro bar gyur nas rmongs pa med pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /rmongs
pa med par gyur nas rnam par dgod pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad de la de bas kyang shes cher snying rje chen po mngon du gzhog par
bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ las
dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i rnam pa bcus chos thams cad la brtson par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mi rtag pa dang / chos
thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa dang / chos thams cad myong ba med pa dang / chos
thams cad brda med pa dang / chos thams cad gnas med pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / chos thams cad ched du byed pa med pa ste/ dmigs pa'i rnam pa bcu
po de dag gis chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tshul du brtson par byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag /de ltar rnal
'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ sems can gyi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /chos kyi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams
brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /sa'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /chu'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /me'i khams brtag pa la yongs
su bskul bar bya'o/ /rlung gi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /'dod pa'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /gzugs kyi khams brtag pa la yongs su
bskul bar bya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bas kyang chos la snang ba 'byung ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag
nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i gsung
rab la yongs su smin pa bcus skyes pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa dang / sangs rgyas la shes pas mos pa'i mthar phyin pa dang / chos nges par rtogs pa dang /
sems can rnam par bsgoms pa dang / zhing rnam par bsgoms pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgoms pa dang / las rnam par bsgoms pa dang / rnam par smin pa rnam
par bsgoms pa dang / 'khor ba rnam par bsgoms pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par bsgoms pa ste/ yongs su smin pa bcu po 'di dag gis 'phags pa'i gsung rab las
skyes pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /de ltar cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos
rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par sgom
pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pa rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par
sgrub par bya ba rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pa rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /'das pa'i
sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sgrub pa rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub par bya ba rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul
bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sgrub pa rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar
bya'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la de bas kyang sems 'jug par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring la
'jog par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i
phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can
thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems
can thams cad la gnod pa med par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad drang ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad dang bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams
cad gdul ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' ste/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni/ sems can mtha' yas pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can tshad med pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can grangs
med pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can gzugs med pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can dpag tu med pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems
can stong pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can byed pa med pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can dngos po med pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can rang bzhin med pa brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
na| de'i sems de bas kyang shas cher mngon par zhen pa la mi gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring mi
'jog par bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la bsam pa phun
sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu nyan na/ bsam pa nges pa rab tu 'thob pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/
'di ltar sangs rgyas la snyan pa'am/ mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos la snyan pa dang / mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la
bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la snyan pa'am/ mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la snyan
ba'am mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams chung ba dang / sems can gyi khams che ba brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la
bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa med par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa
nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams skyo bar sla ba dang / sems can gyi khams skyo bar dka' ba brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa
yin| chos kyi dbyings chung ba'am/ chos kyi dbyings che bar brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings 'grub pa'am/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig
par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings yod pa'am/ chos kyi dbyings med par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/
kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ de ltar bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos la 'jug pa
bcu brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang / chos
thams cad yod pa ma yin pa dang / chos thams cad rdzun pa dang / chos thams cad dben pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /
chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / chos thams cad rtog pa med pa brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i bsam pa de bas kyang shas cher mi 'phrog pa la rnam par bsgrub
par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/
bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa bcu nyan pa'i tshe brtan pa rab tu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas yod ce'am/ sangs rgyas med ce na'ang sangs
rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go /chos yod ce'am/ chos med ce na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yod ce'am/ byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa med ce na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'byung zhe'am/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi 'byung zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go /de bzhin gshegs pa 'das she'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'das shen yang sangs
rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go /de bzhin gshegs pa byon ce'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa ma yin zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go /sangs rgyas
da ltar byung ba zhe'am/ sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba ma yin zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad mi shes
so| |zhe'am/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad shes so/ /zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go /dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig ce'am/ dus gsum mtshan
nyid tha dad ce na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste/ de ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' de la ni/ chos 'byams klas pa bcu brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gcig las rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur ba brjod par bya'o/ /mang po
las tha mi dad par brjod par bya'o/ /don dang mthun pa'i yi ge brjod par bya'o/ /yi ge dang mthun pa'i don brjod par bya'o/ /dngos po med pa yod pa dang mnyam pa nyid du
brjod par bya'o/ /dngos po yod pa med pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o/ /mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o/ /mtshan ma mtshan ma med pa
dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa mtshan nyid dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o/ /mtshan nyid mtshan nyid med pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ci nas kyang de bas kyang shas cher mkhas pa thams cad la yongs su byang bar 'byung ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya dang / bdag nyid
gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
de la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' las bcu la gnas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lus kyi spyod pa
kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ ngag gi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ yid kyi spyod kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba sgrub pa yin/ sems can gzhan
gyi bsam pa shes pa yin/ gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa rtogs pa yin/ sems can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ las kyi byin gyis rlabs tha dad pa rab tu rtogs
pa yin| 'jig rten gyi khams 'grub pa dang 'jig pa yongs su 'jal ba yin/ gang dga' bar 'gro ba la myur ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ gzhon nur gyur pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni/ chos mngon par sgrub pa bcu brjod par bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
lta ste| sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su shes pa brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bskyed pa brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi byin gyis
brlabs brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par rgyu ba brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su mnan pa brjod par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams grangs med
par 'gro ba brjod par bya'o/ /chos grangs med pa yongs su dri ba brjod par bya'o/ /yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus mngon par sgrub pa brjod par bya'o/ /dbyangs kyi sbyor ba rab tu dgye
ba brjod par bya'o/ /sems bskyed pa gcig las sangs rgyas grangs med pa bsnyen bkur bar bya ba brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bas kyang shas cher chos thams
cad la mngon par sgrub pa'i mkhas pa 'byung bar bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur
bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /rgyal tshab kyi byang chub
sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi
skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rgyud rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams 'brel pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyod
yul rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ chos sna tshogs rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye
ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' shes par rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa brtag pa rtogs
par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ don dam pa'i bden pa brtag pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' ste/
byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab de la ni/ gnas bcu brjod par bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i gnas la mkhas pa brjod par bya'o/ /rgyal po'i gnas kyi
tshul brjod par bya'o/ /rgyal po'i gnas su gnas pa brjod par bya'o/ /rgyal po'i gnas su 'gro ba brjod par bya'o/ /rgyal po'i gnas su spyod pa brjod par bya'o/ /chos kyi rgyal
por dbang bskur ba brjod par bya'o/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i byin brjod par bya'o/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i mthu brjod par bya'o/ /chos kyi rgyal srid la gnas pa brjod par bya'o/ /chos
kyi rgyal po'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci nas kyang de'i sems bsgribs pa med pa mngon par bsgrubs pa la de bas kyang
shas cher gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
dag /'di ni/ rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su
bskyed pa'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa byin gyis brlab pa'i sems mang ba
yin| 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'da' bar bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyang ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs
med pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa rnam par brtag pa'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i dbang po rtogs par
bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa yongs su gzung ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa gdul ba'i sems mang ba yin te/ de'i lus ni /
byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab la gnas pa'i bar gyis kyang shes par mi nus te/ lus kyi las shes par mi nus so/ /rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par
'phrul pa shes par mi nus so/ /'das par blta ba'am shes par mi nus so/ /ma 'ongs pa blta ba'am shes par mi nus so/ /da ltar byung ba blta ba'am shes par mi nus so/ /
zhing mngon par 'du byed pa shes par mi nus so/ /sems kyi yul shes par mi nus so/ /ye shes kyi spyod yul yang byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab la gnas pa'i bar gyis
shes par mi nus te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba de la ni/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ye shes la 'jug pa bcu bka' stsal te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dus gsum gyi ye shes brjod pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi
chos kyi ye shes brjod pa mdzad do/ /chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa brjod pa mdzad do/ /chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa brjod pa mdzad do/ /'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad rgyas par dgang ba brjod pa mdzad do/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar bya ba brjod pa mdzad do/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad byin gyis brlabs pa brjod pa mdzad do/ /sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa'i ye shes brjod pa mdzad do/ /chos thams cad yongs su shes pa'i ye shes
brjod pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ci nas kyang de'i sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du de bas kyang shas cher
gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya ba'i phyir te/ kye
rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa'o/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu g.yos so/ /'gul to/ /rab tu 'gul to/ /kun tu 'gul to/ /ldeg go /rab
tu ldeg go /kun tu ldeg go /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /shig shig /rab tu shig shig /
kun tu shig shig go /sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid thob pas lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha

rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin
gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra mngon par byung bar gyur to/ /lha rdzas kyi snang ba rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /
lha rdzas kyi nga ro shin tu grags par gyur to/ /gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang phyogs bcu
rgyas par byung ste/ chos bstan pa 'di yang thams cad du byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin
tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags te phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi chos nyid de lta bu ston pa legs so/ /legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bdag cag kun kyang ming chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan
chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba sha stag gi zham ring / 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba sha stag nas 'dir phyin te/ thams cad na yang
sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di nyid 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag tu tshig 'di dag dang / yi ge 'di dag dang / khong du chud par bya ba 'di dag gis
don 'di nyid mngon par smos shing / lhag chad med par ston te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar bdag cag dbang du gyur pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
'dir phyin to/ /ji ltar bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling
bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mo'i lha'i dbang po'i khang pa dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po phyin par gyur to/ /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
pa 'di dag smras so/ /rang byung sangs rgyas thugs mchog rab mnga' ba/ /sku gzugs sku mdog shin tu mdzes ldan zhing / /mtshan bzang thub pa med pa mthong gyur nas//
byang chub don du brtan pa sems bsgyur ro/ /dpe zla med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs chen dang / /yongs su bstan dang rjes su bstan mthong ste/ /srid lam kun tu sdug bsngal gyur mthong
zhing / /byang chub don du brtan pa sems bsgyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun mnga' ba/ /kun tu bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur cing / /nam mkha' dbyings mnyam rtog
pa med pa yi/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do/ /khams gsum kun na gnas ni 'di dag yin/ /gnas min rang bzhin dag kyang 'di yin zhes/ /ma nor dngos po
khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba dang / /dkar nag las rnams ji snyed yod pa dag /de kun mnyam nyid
rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin rnam par thar pa dang / /mnyam gzhag de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs dang / /rnam
byang rnam par khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do/ /sems can kun gyi dbang po ci 'dra dang / /brtson 'grus stobs kyang de bzhin ci 'dra ba/ /rnam pa
sna tshogs de dag rtogs bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems bsgyur ro/ /sems can kun gyi mos pa ji 'dra dang / /'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /rnam
pa kun tu thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems bsgyur ro/ /'gro ba rnams kyi sna tshogs khams rnams dang / /'jig
rten kun gyi khams mang du ma dang / /khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i sems rnams ci 'dra
dang / /lam rnams ci 'dra 'dus byas 'di dag gi /ma nor rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems bsgyur ro/ /zhing rnams thams cad
mthong bar bya ba dang / /sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'khor gyur ces/ /chags med mig ni rnam par dag bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /'das
pa'i dus su gang rnams ci byung yang / /mtshan nyid gang yin ji 'dra ci dgongs pa/ /sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur
ro| |'jig rten kun na kun sbyor ji snyed dang / /don gyi mtshams 'brel bag chags de bzhin te/ /nyon mongs zad bya mthar thug shes bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan
pa sems bsgyur ro/ /'gro ba rnams kyi tha snyad gdags pa dang / /tshig lam skad du brjod pa ji snyed pa/ /brda yi bden pa rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du
sems bsgyur ro/ /chos rnams ji ltar brjod du med pa dang / /stong pa byed med rang bzhin dben pa'i rnams/ /de dag dngos nyid khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems
bsgyur ro/ /zhing rnams thams cad rab tu bskyod pa dang / /rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su bskam bya bar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rtogs bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub
don du sems bsgyur ro/ /spu rtse re re'i sgo nas 'od zer rnams/ /phyogs bcu kun tu ji ltar dgye bya ba/ /de 'dra'i rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems
bsgyur ro/ /zhing rnams brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /bdag gi lag pa'i mthil du gzhag bya bar/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du
sems bsgyur ro/ /ji ltar zhing gi sems can yangs pa kun/ /gnod pa med par skra rtser gzhog byed par/ /srog med chos rnams khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don
du sems bsgyur ro/ /rgya mtsho thams cad chu chen gang rgyas pa/ /skra rtses blangs shing kun tu dor bya bar/ /mthar thug ma lus khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du
sems bsgyur ro/ /ji ltar bsam gyis mi khyab zhing gi rnams/ /phra rab rdul glags ma lus bgrang bya bar/ /rdul phran grangs rnams khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du
