sems bsgyur ro/ /'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang / /'jig rten tshig cing 'grub pa de bzhin te/ /bskal pa zad cing gnas pa shes
bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /dus gsum byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /rgyal sras rang rgyal nyan thos thams cad kyi/ /chos kyi rang
bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams/ /skra yi nyag mas bcings shing tshad gdab bar/ /
dngos po'i rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /brjod med khor yug shin tu yangs pa dag /ba spu'i khung bu ji ltar gzung bya bar/ /
phra dang yangs pa khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/ /ji ltar dbyangs gcig kun tu
grags 'gyur bar/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam dag shes bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /sems can kun gyi sgra skad ji snyed pa/ /dbyangs gcig
brjod pas ji ltar brjod bya bar/ /sgra yi rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad ma lus shes byed cing / /ji ltar 'gro
kun zhi zhes ston 'gyur bar/ /lce yangs khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /zhing rnams thams cad rab tu tshig pa dang / /kun nas gnas
pa ma lus mthong 'gyur bar/ /rnam rtogs chos ni khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /zhing rnams thams cad sangs rgyas gcig bzhin du/ /de
bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar rgyas bya bar/ /rang byung chos ni rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /zhing rnams thams cad rdul mchog phrar
glags pa/ /de snyed lus su ji ltar sprul bya bar/ /thams cad yid kyi dngos su shes bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /kun gzigs 'das pa ji snyed byung
ba dang / /ma byon sangs rgyas de bzhin bzhugs pa rnams/ /skad cig sems kyis thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /tshig gcig brtsams
te brjod cing bshad byas kyang / /bskal pa brjod med thams cad zad 'gyur bar/ /chos kyi rnam grangs khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /phyogs
bcu kun gyi 'jig rten ma lus rnams/ /'byung zhing ji ltar rjes su 'brang ba dag /sems kyi rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /lus
dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang / /phyogs kun spyod tshe chags par mi 'gyur bar/ /dus gsum stong pa khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang
chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /de ltar byang chub don du sems bskyed pa/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas brjod du med pa kun/ /mchod par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya/ /
'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go /'khor ba dag na byang chub don spyod tshe/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba ji snyed pa/ /de dag de la yongs su brjod par bya/ /'di ni phyir
mi ldog gi gdams ngag go /'jig rten gtso bo 'jig rten ji snyed pa/ /phyogs bcu'i tha dad tshad med yod pa rnams/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod/ /'di ni
phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go /mchog gi chos dang ji snyed dam pa'i chos/ /'phrul gyi chos dang bla na med pa'i chos/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan/ /'di ni
skyon med rnams kyi gdams ngag go /gzhan gyis mi thub ji snyed gnas yod pa/ /'jig rten kun gyis zil gyis mi non rnams/ /de la gnas par rgyal sras de brjod de/ /
'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan kun ldan pa/ /'jig rten mgon po'i bdag nyid che ba kun/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhag
ste| |'di ni skyes bu khyu mchog gdams ngag go /sangs rgyas grangs med brjod du med pa dang / /ji ltar 'grogs par 'gyur ba thams cad kyang / /byang chub sems dpa' de la
brjod par bya/ /'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go /ting 'dzin zhi ba ji snyed gang yod pa/ /de dag gdams ngag ji snyed ma lus par/ /byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan
par bya| |'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go /'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldog par 'gyur ba dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor bar 'gyur ba dang / /'jig rten kun gyi chags par
mi 'gyur ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan par bya/ /sems can sdug bsngal gzir ba ji snyed dang / /ji snyed ngan song gtses par gyur pa yi/ /skyabs dang mgon dang rten
du 'gyur bar yang / /byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod par bya/ /rnam pa 'di 'dras rgyal sras dang po de/ /byang chub don du sems rab skyer 'gyur te/ /de ltar gdams ngag rjes su
bstan par bya/ /'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam bkod pa 'o/ /de nas gnyis pa las kyi dang po pa/ /thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la/ /sems bcu nye bar gzhog cing smon
byed pa| |'di ni skyon dang bral ba'i gdams ngag go /phan pa'i sems dang de bzhin bde ba'i sems/ /snying rje'i sems dang de bzhin byams pa'i sems/ /srung ba'i sems
dang de bzhin mnyam pa'i sems/ /slob dpon sems dang de bzhin ston pa'i sems/ /de 'dra'i sems rnams nye bar gzhag pa dang / /kha ton lung
la yongs su bskul bar bya/ /mang du thos pa dgon par gnas par bskul/ /dben par gyur pas dge bshes bsnyen bkur bya/ /dge bshes gyur nas ngang bder 'gyur
bar bya| |ngang tshul bde bas dus tshul shes par bya/ /dus rnams shes nas mi 'jigs 'gyur bar bya/ /mi 'jigs gyur nas don la brtson par bya/ /don shes gyur nas
chos rjes shes par bya/ /chos shes gyur nas rmongs pa med par bya/ /rmongs med gyur nas legs par bshad chos la/ /rgyal sras des ni rnam par gnas par bya/ /de
tsam gyis ni las kyi dang po pa/ /byang chub don zhugs byang chub sems dpa' 'o/ /gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa'ang de yin te/ /sangs rgyas sras po de ltar slob par byed/ /
gang yang byang chub sems dpa' gsum brjod pa/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung la shin tu brtson/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal de bzhin stong pa nyid/ /bdag med de bzhin byed pa med
pa dang / /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin ro med dang / /'du byed ma yin de bzhin gnas med dang / /ched du spyod med de bzhin rtog med par/ /kun la byang chub sems
dpa' dpyod pa byed/ /de ni 'gro khams yongs su brtag pa dang / /de bzhin chos dbyings brtag par bskul bar bya/ /'jig rten khams yongs ma lus mthar thug pa/ /brtag
par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya/ /sa dang me dang de bzhin chu khams dang / /de bzhin rlung dang phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' dang / /'dod pa gzugs dang de bzhin gzugs med pa/ /
brtag par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya/ /khams rnams yangs pa de bzhin kun rtog cing / /khams kyi rang bzhin ma lus mthar phyin pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu brtson
byed pa| |des na der 'gyur gdams ngag de yin no/ /cher skyes pa yi byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /'phags pa'i gsung rab 'di las skyes pa ste/ /dngos po rang bzhin med rtogs
dran pa can/ /chos kyi rjes byung rigs ldan legs par skyes/ /de yi gnas las phyir ldog mi 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rnams la shin tu mos pa yin/ /chos rnams de bzhin
nges par rtogs pa ste/ /sems can rang bzhin med par rnam par bsgoms/ /chos dang 'jig rten de bzhin zhing rnams dang / /rnam smin 'khor ba de bzhin mya ngan 'das/ /rnam
bsgoms rgyal sras de ltar cher skyes pa/ /thugs las byung ba'i sangs rgyas sras zhes bya/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar byung ba yi/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rnam par bsgoms pa'i
phyir| |yongs su bsdu ba ci 'dra mthar thug pa/ /de ltar de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs shing / /
dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes song bas/ /mnyam pa nyid la sna tshogs mi dmigs shing / /dus gsum kun la tha dad med par 'jug /de tsam gyis ni rgyal sras bzhi
pa ste| |de yi bsngags pa rnam pa de 'dra 'o/ /de ltar 'di la nan tan bsgrubs byas shing / /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog tu 'byung / /de las gzhan yang rgyal sras
lnga pa ni| |sbyor ba phun sum tshogs zhes brjod pa ste/ /thabs mkhas tshul la rjes su zhugs gyur cing / /bsod nams las rnams brtsams pa'i mthar phyin byed/ /'jig rten
dag na bsod nams gang byed kyang / /sems can kun gyi skyabs su 'gyur ba dang / /phan tshol de bzhin bde ba skyed pa dang / /snying brtse skye rgu 'grol bar 'gyur ba dang / /'jig
rten rnams kyi gtse ba bsal ba dang / /dran zhing de bzhin dang bar bya ba dang / /sems can mang po thams cad gdul mos shing / /mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyi mthu yang che/ /
sems can thams cad kun tu mtha' yas dang / /de bzhin tshad med grangs las 'das pa dang / /bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal med dpag med pa/ /de 'dra'i chos rnams de la
brjod par bya/ /de tsam gyis na rgyal sras lnga pa ste/ /sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa snying rje can/ /de yi gdams ngag tshul ni de 'dra ste/ /yon tan thams cad mnga' bas bstan pa
yin| |gang yang bsam pa phun sum tshogs bya'i phyir/ /chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rmongs med cing / /rnam rtog rtog bral dran dang ldan pa de/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten kun gyis bslu
mi nus| |sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang / /spyod pas bsngags sam rnam par smad kyang rung / /sems can nyung zhe'am 'on tam mang ngo zhes/ /thos par gyur kyang
bsam pa zhum mi 'gyur/ /sems can nyon mongs nyon mongs med ce'am/ /gdul sla 'on tam shin tu gdul dka' dang / /chos kyi dbyings de chung ngam rgya che dang / /kun nas
'grub 'gyur rnam par 'jig ce 'am/ /chos dbyings de ni yod dam med ce yang / /byang chub sems dpa' thos gyur dus gsum tshul/ /nges par rtogs byed thams cad rnam
rtog cing / /sangs rgyas chos la bsam pa shin tu nges/ /mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid med pa dang / /dngos nyid yod min rdzun dang bden pa dang / /sgyu ma rmi lam mi rtog rang
bzhin med/ /'di 'dra'i chos tshol de dag nyan pa byed/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang / /spyod pa yod med rtag
tu rnam par bsgoms/ /'byung ngam mi 'byung zhe na'ang phyir mi ldog /de bzhin gshegs pa 'das she'am ma 'das dang / /ma byon to zhe'am ma
byon ma yin dang / /skyes so ma skyes zad 'gyur zad mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin mtshan gcig tha dad mtshan de bzhin/ /gcig pa rnam pa tha dad mang po dang / /don dang de bzhin yi ge'i dngos
rnams dang / /thams cad phan tshun yongs su 'dzud byad pa/ /mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' bstan par bya/ /mtshan ma med la mtshan ma yod pa dang / /mtshan nyid med la mtshan gyis dmigs
pa dang / /rnam phye phan tshun yongs su sbyar ba rnams/ /thos nas 'di la mthar thug 'jug pa byed/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzhon gyur pa/ /lus dang ngag dang de
bzhin yid kun gyis/ /kha na ma thor 'gyur pa nam yang med/ /ci 'dod tshul bzhin de ni skye bar byed/ /gzhan gyi bsam pa ji bzhin rab tu shes/ /de dag mos pa yongs
su rtogs par byed/ /phyogs rnams gang du yid kyis smon byed pa/ /kun tu mngon shes myur ba yid bzhin 'thob/ /bde bar gshegs pas bsngags pa'i chos thos
shing / /de la zhum pa skyed pa gang yang med/ /zhing rnams yongs su bskyod pa shes pa dang / /de bzhin byin rlabs rnam par rgyu ba dang / /sangs rgyas zhing rnams yongs su
mnan pa dang / /grangs med kun tu 'gro ba brjod par bya/ /grangs med chos rnams yongs su 'dri ba dang / /ci nas yid kyi rang bzhin lus 'gyur zhing / /dbyangs kyi rnam pa shin
tu yangs 'gyur dang / /sems gcig sangs rgyas grangs med bsnyen bkur brjod/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brjod pa ni/ /sems can rnams kyi skye ba rab tu
shes| |nyon mongs rgyud dang rnam par rgyu ba shes/ /de 'dra'i spyod yul de 'dra'i sbyor ba can/ /chos kyi rgyud mang rnam pa tha dad dang / /sngon mtha' phyi mtha' 'jig rten rnam phye
dang / /brda yi bden pa don dam bden pa dang / /ma lus rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ /de yi rgyal po'i gnas la mkhas par bskul/ /der yang ji ltar yongs su
spyad bya dang / /'gro bar bya dang gnas par bya ba dang / /rgyal po'i gnas su ji ltar rnam spyad brjod/ /de la chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur dang / /byin gyis brlabs dang de
bzhin mthu chen dang / /chos su gnas dang 'gro bar bya ba dag /brjod par bya ste rgyal tshab de 'dra yin/ /de tsam gyis na de yi mthar thug ste/ /gdams ngag des kyang rlom
sems byed pa med/ /khong du chud byed dran ldan rgyal tshab de/ /rgyal ba kun gyi drung na slob par byed/ /bde gshegs sras po gtso bor dbang bskur ba/ /thu bo mchog dang dam par
gyur pa ni/ /'jig rten khams mang grangs med bskyod pa dang / /yongs su snang bar bya ba'i sems kyang mang / /byin gyis brlabs dang yongs su
'da' bya dang / /yongs su sbyangs pa'i sems kyang rab tu mang / /grangs med 'jig rten shes par bya ba dang / /dbang po phun ldan rnam par dpyad la mkhas/ /de dag
gzud cing rnam par gdul ba dang / /thams cad mkhyen gyi sems kyang shin tu mang / /zhing mang brjod du med par 'gro byas shing / /dam chos khams rnams ma lus rnam
par dpyod/ /de yi lus dang lus kyi las rnams dang / /rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'ang shes par mi nus te/ /dus gsum shin tu rgyal ba'i sems dag kyang / /rgyal tshab gyur pa'i
bar gyis shes mi nus/ /de la thams cad gzigs pas dus gsum dang / /sangs rgyas chos shes chags med de bzhin brjod/ /chos dbyings mtha' yas mtha' dang
dbus med pa/ /rgyas par 'gengs par bde gshegs brjod pa mdzad/ /ci nas 'jig rten khams kun ma lus par/ /yongs su snang byed byin gyis rlob pa dang / /sems
can chos rnams de bzhin ma lus dang / /sangs rgyas mtha' yas de bzhin brjod pa'i mdzad/ /rgyal sras brtan pa rnam pa bcur bgrangs pa/ /rnam par dgod la gnas pa de
dag kun/ /rang rang spyod yul rab tu brtson byed pa/ /'jig rten lhar bcas kun gyis shes par dka'/ /'on kyang dang por sems bskyed mtha' yas pa/ /phyogs bcu ma
lus thams cad rgyas par bya/ /dus gsum kun tu gang tshe sems gtong ba/ /de tshe thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzigs 'gyur/ /zhing rnams kun la mu mtha' yod ba min//
sems can chos dang 'jig rten kun de bzhin/ /las dang nyon mongs gnas kyang mtha' yas te/ /byang chub sems rab de la gnas pa yin/ /skad cig sems la byang chub
gzhol ba'i sems/ /gang skyes 'jig rten kun gyis shes mi nus/ /rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos kun gyis min/ /de nas gong du spyod pa ji skad brjod/ /gang zhig phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams/ /spu gcig srang la tshad du 'jal byed pa/ /des ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas ye shes yongs su tshol/ /phyogs
bcu'i rgya mtsho ji snyed yod pa kun/ /spu rtse'i thigs kyis yongs 'jal shes byed pa/ /de ni rgyal sras spyod pa 'di 'dra dag /sems kyi skad cig gcig la sgrub par byed/ /ji ltar
zhing rnams rdul rab phrar glags shing / /sems can la la ma lus bgrang byed de/ /'di snyed yod ces grangs su gcod byed pa/ /de 'drar rgyal sras spyod pa brjod pa'o/ /'das
pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin ma byon dang / /gang rnams phyogs bcur byung bar gyur pa dang / /rang rgyal de bzhin nyan thos rab mang bar/ /rnam par dmigs
shing byang chub sems skye'o/ /sems can khams rnams ma lus rgyas bkang zhing / /byang chub don du thog mar sems bskyed pa/ /de yang bgrang bar nus pa ma yin na/ /de
las gong du ci zhig smos kyang dgos/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu bstan pa'i
le'u ste| nyi shu pa'o// //
